loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Rigoberto de 37 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos de 10 y 12 años de edad. Él es un hombre emprendedor que se gana la vida elaborando pan francés en su vivienda, actividad que realiza desde hace 26 años, por lo que cada día son más los clientes que buscan sus productos, ya que gracias a su experiencia, sus productos tiene la fama de ser de excelente calidad. Rigoberto desea experimentar nuevos productos y así extender su negocio,  elaborando pan dulce y postres por lo que solicita un  crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: harina, latas, moldes para pastel, azúcar, etc.
texts.en:
Rigoberto, age 37, lives in his own home along with his life-companion and their two children, ages 10 and 12.

He is an enterprising man who earns a living by making French bread in his home. He has been engaged in this occupation for 26 years, so every day there are more customers seeking his products, which thanks to his experience, are famous for their excellent quality.

Rigoberto wants to experiment with new products, and thus extend his business by making sweet bread and desserts. That is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in flour, trays, cake molds, sugar, etc.

loans.use: to invest in flour, trays, cake molds, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her home.

loans.name: Yamyelbenwende De Lemnoogo Group

texts.fr:
Mme BIBATA est responsable du groupe YAMYELBENWENDE DE LEMNOOGO. Mariée, elle est mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 22 ans et le moins âgé a10 ans.  04 vont à l’école. Elle a 08 personnes en charge.
Elle vend des pagnes depuis 02ans. Elle s’approvisionne en ville.
Mme veut s’acheter 10 complets pagnes de marque réal et 10 complets pagnes de marque hitarguet
Elle veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour sles besoins de la famille et pour ses petites activités. Elle ambitionne construire une grande boutique de pagnes.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bibata is the group representative for YAMYELBENWENDE DE LEMNOOGO. She is married and a mother of four. Her oldest child is 22 and her youngest is 10. All of them go to school. She takes care of eight people. 
She has been selling traditional fabric for two years, which she buys in the city. 
Mrs. Bibata would like to buy 10 units of traditional fabric from the Réal brand, and 10 from the Hitarguet brand. She wants to use the profits to meet the needs of her family, as well as her own. 
Her goal is to own a big shop where she'd sell traditional fabric.

loans.use: to buy 10 units of traditional fabric from the Réal brand, and 10 from the Hitarguet brand.

loans.name: Dehkon

texts.ru: Дехкон родился в 1996 году. Он в этом году окончил среднюю школу. Дехкон успешно учился в средней школе. Он любит такие предметы как математика, русский язык, английский язык, географию и т.п. Дехкон всегда мечтал получить высшее образование. Его родители содействовали ему реализовать его мечту, и он поступил в университет. Дехкон теперь должен оплатить за учебный договор, но его родители не имеют денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1200 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту. Этот займ поможет ему получить высшее образование.
texts.en: Dehkon was born in 1996 and graduated from high school this year. He was a successful student and loves such subjects as mathematics, Russian language, English language and geography. Dehkon has always dreamed of receiving a university education. His parents have supported him in this dream and he has started university. He now needs to pay his tuition but his parents don't have enough money. He is requesting a loan of $1,200 USD to pay his tuition. He awaits your kindness. This loan will help him to receive a higher education.

loans.use: to pay his tuition

loans.name: Mame Biram's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 34 membres fait partie du banc villageois qui a été créé le 16 juin 2013. Ce dernier regroupe des femmes très solidaires qui habitent dans le même quartier. Elles s’activent dans le commerce.
Seynabou, âgée de 37 ans, est mariée et mère d’une fille. Sur la photo, elle est en position debout et a levé la main pour se montrer car étant la vedette du groupe.
Elle fait du commerce de poisson séché, une activité qu’elle depuis 10 ans.
Avec le prêt, elle va acheter du poisson séché pour le revendre.
Avec les bénéfices elle va  prendre ses besoins personnels et renforcer son épargne dans le banc villageois.
texts.en:
This 34-member group belongs to the village association created on June 16th, 2013. This group gathers women who live in the same neighborhood and are very united. They all are active in retail.

Seynabou, who is 37 years old, is married and mother to one daughter. In the photo, she is standing and holding her hand up to be visible as the group’s star borrower.

She retails dried fish, a business she has been in for ten years. With the loan, she will purchase dried fish for resale. With the profit, she will take care of her personal needs and increase her savings in the village association.

loans.use: to buy dried fish.

loans.name: Zaratou

texts.fr: célibataire et mère avec 1 enfant en charge à 36 ans, Zaratou réside à Adidogomé. Elle vend  des plats. Elle s'approvisionne 3 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé. Elle revend par vente ambulante au marché d'asiyéyé. Zaratou sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
At age 36, Zaratou is the single mother of one dependent child. She lives in Adidogomé.

She sells dishes. She procures her supplies three times a year from the great market in Lome. She retails from a cart at the market in Asiyéyé. Zaratou requests this loan to grow her business, in order to satisfy her clientele and increase profits.

loans.use: to buy 54 dishes.

loans.name: Klavdia

texts.ru: Клавдия, 51 год, замужем, мать 2 детей. У Клавдии среднее образование, на протяжении 10 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. Сумев развить свой бизнес и обретя постоянных покупателей молока, на сегодняшний день, благодаря ее упорству и целеустремленности в хозяйстве Клавдии имеется 1 корова, дополнительно занимается полеводством, на собственной земле, мерою 5,08 ГА она выращивает клевер. Клавдия хочет и дальше приумножить поголовье скота, за счет приобретения бычка, в связи с этим она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS). На доходы от кредита Клавдия хочет увеличить поголовье скота и в скором будущем построить большой дом.
texts.en: Klavdia is 51 and married with two children. She has a high school education and has been working in animal husbandry and agriculture for 10 years. Thanks to her hard work and purposefulness and with the knowledge of how to develop her business and maintain a consistent customer base for her milk, she now has one cow as well as 5.08 hectares of her own land where she grows clover. Klavdia wants to further increase her number of livestock by acquiring a steer and therefore has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS. She intends to use profits from the loan to further increase the number of animals she has and also, in the future, to build a big house.

loans.use: to purchase a steer and invest in her business

loans.name: Adjowa

texts.fr: veuve et mère avec un enfant en charge à 31 ans, Adjowa réside à Adidogomé. Elle vend  d'huile de palme. Elle s'approvisionne 3 fois par mois à marché de Tabligbo. Elle revend sous un hangar à à domicile. Adjowa sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
At age 31, Adjowa is a widower and the mother of one dependent child. She lives in Adidogomé.

She sells palm oil. She procures her supplies three times a year from the market in Tabligbo. She retails from a shed and from home. Adjowa requests this loan to grow her business, in order to satisfy her clientele and increase profits.

loans.use: to buy 2.5 cans of palm oil.

loans.name: Muhayo

texts.ru: Мухайё трудолюбивая женщина. Она родилась в 1990 году. Мухайё замужем, но не имеет детей. Они с мужем живут уже более 6 лет и очень хотят иметь детей. Мухайё швея. Она шьёт национальные женские платья и предоставляет свои услуги уже более 4 лет. Она имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Мухайё нуждается финансовой поддержке, так как она собирается лечиться, чтобы она могла иметь детей. Мухайё запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки лекарства для лечения. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Muhayo is a hardworking woman who was born in 1990. She is married but doesn't have any children. She and her husband have been living together for more than six years and want children very much. Muhayo is a seamstress who sews women's dresses in the national style; she has been offering these services for more than four years and has regular clients. Muhayo needs financial support since she needs to receive medical treatment so she can have children. She is requesting a loan of 1,500 somoni to buy medicine. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy medicine

loans.name: Sadokat

texts.ru: Несколько 7 лет назад Садокату было очень трудно справляться с семейными расходами, так как доход мужа от парикмахерской деятельности не хватало на жизнь. Она кормилица 4 детей. Она свет в жизни детей и надежда для них. Садокат 7 лет назад она начала свой бизнес купле продажей одежды на местном рынке. Она имеет свою торговую точку на местном рынке. Садокат в основном продает женскую одежду, так как спрос на женскую одежду больше чем на мужские или детские одежды на местном рынке. Она должна обновить товар на новый сезон и привлечь больше клиентов, так как ей необходимо зарабатывать больше денег для обеспечения своих детей. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  7500 сомони для покупки женской одежды для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие. Она мечтает, чтобы ее дети были образованными людьми.
texts.en: Just seven years ago, Sadokat was having a difficult time buying everything her family needed, since her husband's income from his barber shop wasn't enough to cover living expenses. She is raising four children and is their light and hope. Seven years ago she started her own business buying and selling clothing at the local market, where she has her own retail stall. She sells primarily women's clothing, since the demand for it is higher than for men's or children's clothing. She needs to bring in new inventory for the new season to attract more customers, since she needs to bring in more income to care for her children. She is requesting a loan of 7,500 somoni to buy women's clothing for the new season. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity. She dreams that her children will become educated people.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing for the new season

loans.name: Adama's Group

texts.fr:
Crée en 2014,ce groupe est constitué de huit membres qui habitent toutes la même localité. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Adama,se trouvant debout à gauche de la photo, levant la main, est la responsable du groupe. Mariée et mère de quatre enfants, elle est caissière de profession. Cependant elle compte se lancer, grâce aux services de financement de CAURIE-MF, dans le commerce de tissus de basin.

Les bénéfices générés par son activité lui permettront de renforcer son épargne et aussi de participer à la prise en charge des besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Created in 2014, this group is composed of eight members who all live in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is trade.

Adama, who can be seen raising her hand, on the right hand side of the photo, is the group representative. She is married, a mother of four, and works as a cashier. However, thanks to a loan from CAURIE-MF, she plans to start a traditional fabric business.

The profits made from this activity will allow her to consolidate her savings as well as to take care of her family's needs.

loans.use: to start a traditional fabric business.

loans.name: Diéné's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe constitué de 23 membres a été crée depuis Décembre 2011.Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Kadidia, debout à gauche de la photo,levant le bras,est la responsable du groupe.Elle est mariée et n'a que des filles. Elle effectue comme activités l'agriculture et le commerce.

Avec son crédit,elle souhaite acheter des sacs de maïs, des sacs d'arachide pour les revendre en détail.

Les  bénéfices générés serviront à subvenir à ces besoins et ceux de ces enfants
texts.en:
This 23-member group was created in December 2011. Its main activity is retail.

Kadidia, who is standing to the left with her arm raised in the photo, is the group’s leader. She is married and has all girls. Her activities are farming and retail.

With her loan, she wants to purchase bags of corn and groundnuts to retail. Profits will be used to meet her and her children’s needs.

loans.use: to buy corn and groundnuts.

loans.name: Penda's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 19 membres fait parti du banc villageois qui a été créé le 16 juin 2013. Ce dernier regroupe des femmes très solidaires qui habitent dans le même quartier. Elles s’activent dans le commerce.
Aissatou debout sur la photo et levant la main, est âgée de 47 ans. Elle est veuve et sans enfants.
Elle fait un commerce de bananes.
Les bénéfices lui permettent de cotiser dans les tontines et de renforcer son épargne dans le banc villageois.
texts.en:
This 19-member group belongs to the village association created on June 16th, 2013. This group gathers women who live in the same neighborhood and are very united. They all are active in retail.

Aissatou, who is standing with her hand raised in the photo, is 47 years old. She is widowed and has no children. She buys and sells bananas.

Profits allow her to contribute to business associations and to increase her savings in the village association.

loans.use: to buy bananas.

loans.name: Rajaby

texts.ru: Десять лет назад Рачаби жила очень бедно. Она имела на воспитании 5 детей, а доход мужа не было достаточно, чтобы обеспечить семью со всеми необходимыми средствами. И тогда Рачаби решила начать свой бизнес и таким образом зарабатывать на жизнь. Итак, она начала свой бизнес купле продажей продуктов питания с маленьким оборотным капиталом. Постепенно год за годом она развевала свой бизнес. Данное время она имеет продуктовый магазин, где продает все виды продуктов питания. Она хочет расширить ассортимент товара и с такой целью обратилась за займом в сумме 9000 сомони. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: 10 years ago, Rajaby lived very poorly. She was raising five children and her husband didn't bring in enough income to cover the family's needs. At that time, she decided to start her own business and earn a living. She began buying and selling groceries with only a little working capital and gradually, year by year, developed her business. She now has a grocery shop where she sells all kinds of food products. She wants to expand her assortment of inventory and with this goal in mind has requested a loan of 9,000 somoni. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: to buy food products to broaden her assortment of goods for sale

loans.name: Ana Maritza

texts.es:
Ana, gracias al préstamo anterior ha logrado aumentar sus ganancias económicas        y quiere seguir aumentando y surtiendo su tienda, porque comenta que tiene mucha demanda de muchos productos que no los tiene.

Lo que más tiene de demanda son productos de la canasta básica como maíz, frijol, aceite, arroz, pastas, embutidos, verduras, etc. Y para comprar eso es que solicita este nuevo crédito.
texts.en:
Thanks to the previous loan, Ana has been able to increase her earnings. She wants to continue increasing, and stocking her store, because she says that she has a lot of demand for many products that she doesn’t have.

What are most in demand are basic food basket products such as corn, beans, oil, rice, pasta, sausage, vegetables, etc., and she is requesting this new loan in order to purchase them.

loans.use: to purchase corn, beans, oil, rice, pasta, sausage, vegetables, etc., in order to stock her store.

loans.name: Rapitbai

texts.ru: Рапитбай, 64 года, женат, имеет 2 детей школьного возраста. Рапитбай в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1995 году с 7,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Рапитбая, на данный момент в его хозяйстве имеется 1 лошадь, 3 коровы, 10 овец, также есть земельный надел мерою 1,44 ГА, где посажена люцерна и фруктовые деревья. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Рапитбай обратился в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Доходы от кредита он планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса, так как хочет дать своим детям достойное образование.
texts.en: Rapitbai is 64, married, and has two school-age children. He raises livestock as his family's main source of income, which he began in 1995 with 7,000 som (KGS). Thanks to his hard work, Rapitbai currently has a horse, three cows, and ten sheep, along with a 1.44 hectare plot of land where he plants alfalfa and fruit trees. In order to expand his business he applied for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to purchase sheep. He plans to use his profits to continue to invest in his business because he wants to give his children a good education.

loans.use: To purchase sheep in order to expand his livestock business

loans.name: Grupo Choxin Group

texts.es:
Manuela de 26 años de edad que tiene una grande aspiración de poder superarse en la vida, ella toma todos los obstáculos de la viva como un reta para poder llegar al éxito, ella tiene dos hijos los cueles se han convertido el motivo de poder superarse y buscar  la forma de cómo tener un ingreso económico. Los hijos de ella son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela que les queda cerca de su comunidad. (Manuela es la que se encuentra de 1ra de izquierda a derecha y tiene puesta una blusa morada)
	
La actividad que ella realiza es la venta de ropa y hilos, ella lleva realizando dicha actividad durante cinco años, ella se decidió a realizar dicha actividad porque por su comunidad no hay personas que realizan la venta de ropa y a ella le genera muy buena ganancia y ingresos económicos par el sostenimiento de su familia y en mejor las condiciones de vida de su familia.

Ella es un buen ejemplo y colaboradora en la comunidad  y es por ello que un grupo de mujeres se ha reunido para emprender juntas el negocio para que ellas también mejoren sus condiciones de vida de sus familias.

El uso respectivo que ella dará al crédito es para la compra de materia prima como ropa y todo tipo de hilos para surtir su mercadería para así poner a disposición de las personas que requieren de estos productos. Uno de las aspiraciones de Manuela es ver que sus hijos se conviertan en profesionales y construir casas para sus hijos para que ellos tengan la condición de vida adecuada.
texts.en:
Manuela is 26 years old and has a great aspiration to be able to better herself in life. She takes all the obstacles in life as a challenge to be able to arrive at success. She has two children, who have become her motivation to be able to improve herself and to look for the way to have an economic income. Her children are excellent students in the school that is located close to her town. (Manuela is pictured first from the left and has a purple blouse on). 

The activity that she carries out is the sale of clothing and thread. She has five years of carrying out said activity, which she decided to do because in her community there are no people that carry out the sale of clothing. She generates a very good profit and economic income for the support of her family and improvement of her family's life conditions. 

She is a good example and collaborator in the community, and it is for this that a group of women has gathered in order to undertake business together so that they also improve their families' life conditions. 

The corresponding use that she will give the loan is for the purchase of raw materials such as clothing and all types of threads in order to stock her merchandise and make them available to the people that require these products. One of the Manuela's aspirations is to see her children become professionals and to build homes for her children so that they have an adequate life condition.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: strawberries, plums, papaya, watermelon, apples, etc. he also hopes to continue investing in vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement and gravel and to pay workers so that she can plaster the walls and cement the floors of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his daughter's tuition

loans.name: Kuya

texts.fr: Kuya a 35 ans, mariée et mère de 2 enfants à Adidogomé. Elle fait le petit commerce en vendant des condiments. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et revend par vente ambulante dans les environs de son quartier et à domicile. Kuya sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Kuya is 35, married, a mother of two, and lives in Adidogmoé. She is into petty trading and sells condiments. She buys those twice a month from the big market in Lomé and resells them around her neighborhood and at home. Kuya is applying for this loan in order to expand her business and generate more profits.

loans.use: to buy two baskets of tomatoes and two bags of hot peppers.

loans.name: Marvin Walberto

texts.es: Marvin de 28 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos una niña de 8 años y una niña de 11 años de edad. Él es un hombre emprendedor que se esfuerza por sacar adelante a su familia, por lo que desde hace 3 años está prestando sus servicios de seguridad en una empresa. Marvin desea instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar: alambre, interruptores y caja térmica para instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en: Marvin, 28, lives in his own home with his life partner and their 2 children, an 8 year old girl and an 11 year old girl. He is an enterprising man who pushes himself to get his family ahead. Therefore, since 3 years ago, he has been offering his security services in a business. Marvin wishes to install electric energy in his home, which is why he is applying for a loan from FUSAI to buy wire, switches, and a thermal box to install electric energy in his home.

loans.use: Para comprar: alambre, interruptores y caja térmica para instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda.

loans.name: Florence

texts.fr: Florence a 49 ans,  veuve et mère de 2 enfants à Adidogomé. Elle fait le petit commerce en vendant des charbon de bois. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois au marché de Glinkondji vers la  ville de Kpalimé et revend en gros sous un hangar  à son domicile. Florence sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Florence is 49, widowed, a mother of two, and lives in Adidogomé. She is into petty trading and sells charcoal. She buys it twice a month from the Glinkondji market close to Kpalimé and resells it in bulk under a shed and at home. Florence is applying for this loan to expand her business and generate more profits.

loans.use: to buy six bags of charcoal

loans.name: Mary's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 22 membres fait partie du banc villageois qui a été créé le 16 juin 2013. Ce dernier regroupe des femmes d'une solidarité remarquable habitant le même quartier. Elles s’activent dans le commerce.
Marie debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est âgée de 41ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 6 enfants dont 3 garçons.
Elle est dans le commerce d’huile, une activité qu’elle pratique depuis longtemps.
Avec le prêt elle va acheter de l’arachide destinée à la transformation en huile 
Avec les bénéfices qu'elle va réaliser, elle prendra en charge les besoins de la famille surtout ceux liés à l'éducation et la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group is part of a banc villageois which was created on June 16, 2013. It is composed of 22 women who all live in the same neighborhood and show remarkable solidarity. Their main activity is trade. 
Marie, who can be seen standing and raising her hand on the right hand side of the photo, is 41. She is married and has six children, three of whom of are boys. 
She sells oil, which she has been doing for a long time. 
With this loan, she will buy peanuts, which will be used to make oil. 
She will use the profits to take care of her family's needs, particularly her children's education.

loans.use: to buy peanuts.

loans.name: Hadda Luz

texts.es: Hadda de 47 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y su grupo familiar. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se gana la vida gracias a su venta de frutas como: mamey, banano, uva, manzana, etc. Además vende verduras como: papas, tomates, chile verde, güisquiles, pipianes, etc. También su esposo aporta al gasto familiar por medio de su trabajo de jornalero. Hadda ha visto la necesidad en su vivienda de reparar una pared agrieta que se puede observar en la fotografía, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, tierra blanca y adobes para reparar una pared de su vivienda.
texts.en: Hadda, who is 47 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and family. She is an enterprising woman who sells fruit, including mammees, bananas, grapes, apples, etc. She also sells vegetables, including potatoes, tomatoes, green chilies, chayotes, pipianes, etc. Her husband also contributes to the household expenses by working as a day laborer. Hadda has seen the necessity of repairing a crack in the wall of her home, which is shown in the photo. As a result, she requests a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, white soil, and adobes to repair a wall in her home.

loans.use: to buy cement, white soil, and adobes to repair a wall in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, cinderblocks, sand, gravel, iron and labor to build a cinderblock wall in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy: floor tiles, cement and sand to install floor tiles in her home.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
En la vida hay que ser atrevidos las cosas no vienen por si sola sino uno mismo tiene que levantarse e ir por ellas es la decisión de Julian de 50 años de edad, el a pesar de su avanzada edad a tomado la decisión de emprender actividades que le generen un ingreso económico para el beneficio de su familia, el tiene 5 hijos los tres primeros hijos ya tienen familias aparte y los dos últimos son estudiantes de su comunidad.
La actividad que el dignamente realiza bajo un sol agotador es jornalero en la comunidad donde el vive, el es buscado por las personas de su comunidad para que el les realiza diferentes tipos de actividades para poder el tener un ingreso económico para el sostenimiento de su familias, el viene realizando dicha actividad desde que tenía 16 años de edad y hoy hasta la fecha lo está realizando.
El uso que el dará al crédito es para cambiar las laminas del techo de su casa porque ya lleva 20 años de uso y con el tiempo y el cambil climático la ha perjudicado y es por ello que el quiere realizar un cambio para que su familia vivan en condiciones adecuadas y no tener que sufrir en tiempos de lluvias. Uno de las aspiraciones de Julian es que sus hijos se convierten en profesionales en los diferentes campos laborales de la vida y conseguir terreno para que el también empiece a producir productos agrícolas en su comunidad.
texts.en:
In life, one has to be daring; things don’t come by themselves. Instead, one must rise and go forward to get things. This was what Julian, who is 50 years old, decided to do, in spite of his advanced age, by setting forth with activities that generate an income for the wellbeing of his family. He has 5 children; his first 3 children already have families of their own, and the younger 2 are students in the community.

He works as a day laborer under the tiring sun in the community where he lives. He looks for people in his community so that he can help them with different types of activities that allow him to earn an income for the sustenance of his family. He has been doing this work since he was 16 years old, and he is still doing it.

This loan will be used to change the roof sheets on his house, because the existing ones have been in use for 20 years, and with time and weather, they have been damaged. Because of this, he wants to change them so that his family will be able to live in suitable conditions and will not have to suffer when it rains. One of Julian’s goals is that his children become professionals in different fields and acquire land so that he can product agricultural goods in his community.

loans.use: to change the roof sheets on his house.

loans.name: Daniel Felipe

texts.es:
Daniel es un joven muy emprendedor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y progresar.

Tiene experiencia en actividades comerciales y hoy en día desea cumplir un sueño que ha perseguido durante mucho tiempo y es el poder ser independiente y tener su propio negocio.

Por esta razón ha decidido iniciar con un negocio de venta de productos de la marca Amway que son productos para el cuidado personal, es así como solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de este tipo de productos.

Este préstamo le permitirá alcanzar esa independencia que tanto ha soñado y le dará la oportunidad de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Daniel is an enterprising young man with great desires to get ahead and progress.

He has experience with business activities and now he wants to realize a dream that he's been pursuing for some time. That is to be able to be independent and have his own business.

For this reason he has decided to start a business selling Amway products, which are personal care products. This is why he is requesting a loan to purchase a stock of these sorts of products.

This loan will allow him to reach independence, which he has dreamed of, and it will give him the opportunity to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase Amway products to start his own business and achieve his dream of being independent.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails to add on a room to her house.

loans.name: Karen

texts.es:
Karen, de 19 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a culminar sus estudios para salir adelante y tener una buena vida en un futuro.

Ella se desempeña como confeccionista de distintas prendas en contratación con terceros tales como pijamas, camisetas y ropa interior.

Esta actividad la inicio con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para el sostenimiento de sus estudios y gastos con sus padres.

Es una joven emprendedora y muy disciplinada, siempre en busca de oportunidades para progresar y mejorar como empresaria.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar una maquina plana que le permita mejorar su nivel de producción y poder aumentar sus ventas.

De esta forma podría solventar todos sus gastos y podría tener esa vida plena que tanto ha soñado.
texts.en:
Karen, age 19, is very clear about what she wants for her life, and she is determined to complete her studies, in order to move forward and have a good life in the future. 

She sews different garments, such as pajamas, t-shirts, and underwear, working on contract for third parties. She started this activity with the goal of supporting her studies and helping her parents with the expenses.  She is an enterprising young woman, and very disciplined. She is always in search of opportunities to progress and improve as a businesswoman. 

She is requesting a loan in order to purchase a sewing machine that would allow her to improve her production level and be able to increase her sales.

In this way, she would be able pay all of her expenses and she would be able to have the full life that she has dreamed of so often.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine in order to increase the level of her production, support her studies, and help with her household expenses.

loans.name: Sira's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe crée depuis Décembre 2011,est constitué de 24 membres habitant toutes dans la même localité.Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Ndoungharé, sur la photo,habillée en rouge à gauche de la photo,levant la main, est la responsable du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère d'un garçon et d'une fille. Elle effectue le commerce de détail comme activité principale.

Avec son crédit,elle compte acheter des habits et des chaussures. Le reste servira à compléter ce qu'elle avait gardé pour acheter un frigo.

les bénéfices à réaliser serviront à renforcer son épargne et participer aux dépenses familiales.
texts.en:
This group has been in existence since December 2011. It is composed of 24 members living in the same area. They main work as vendors.
 Ndoungharé, the one on the left in the photo, wearing red and raising her hand, is the group's leader. She is married and has one son and one daughter. Her main business activity is retail. With her loan, she plans to buy clothing and shoes. The rest of the funds will be used to add to the sum she had saved up to buy a refrigerator. The resulting revenues will be used to bolster her savings and contribute to household expenses.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing, shoes, etc)

loans.name: Henry Alberto

texts.es:
Henry de 41 años, vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos, desde hace cuatro (4) años tiene un bar el cual atiende en compañía de su esposa (ver foto), tiene como sueño ampliar y mejorar su negocio donde distribuye productos como licor, bebidas y frituras. 

En la actualidad tiene poco surtido y esto es muy perjudicial ya que no puede suplir con muchos productos que le pide su clientela. 

Henry en vista de esto, optó en solicitar un préstamo con el fin de organizarse más y comprar al por mayor el surtido necesario de licor para incrementar su stock y poder brindar mejor atención a las personas,  esto le representaría también el aumento en sus ingresos para cumplir necesidades básicas de todo negocio como son los servicios públicos, impuestos, y demás, y también mejorar el bienestar de él y el de su familia.

Con la ayuda de este préstamo, este emprendedor podrá ofrecer un mejo9r servicio y mejorara su capacidad de trabajo.
texts.en:
Henry is 41 years old, lives in a common-law marriage and has two children. For the last 4 years he has owned a bar where he works with his wife (also in the photo). His dream is to expand and improve his business where he distributes products such as liquor, drinks and fried foods.

Currently he is not well stocked and this is very detrimental to his business since he cannot supply a lot of things his customers ask for.

In light of this, Henry decided to apply for a loan with the aim of getting himself more organised and to buy the necessary liquor supplies in bulk in order to increase his stock and so be able to offer better service to people. This would also mean an increase in his income so he can cover basic needs for any business such as public services, taxes etc., and also improve his well being and that of his family.

With the help of this loan, this entrepreneur will be able to offer a better service and improve his working capacity.

loans.use: to buy liquor stock in order to improve his business and increase sales.

loans.name: Darwin Amilcar

texts.es: Amílcar está cruzando por sus 20 años de edad,  el vive en el campo juntamente con sus padres que se dedican al trabajo del campo en la agricultura, este joven trabajador se dedica al jornal y a la crianza de animales menores, con el crédito Amílcar va a comprar chanchos para darlos a medias a otra señora y cuando ya los vende dice que se parten a mitad las ganancias, así es como trabaja Amílcar en este negocio, este joven responsable tiene el sueño de llegar a ser tripulante de cabina,  más o menos como chofer de un avión, pero cuenta que le hace falta el dinero para entrarse a este curso pero que nada es imposible en la vida.
texts.en: Amilcar is 20 years old, and he lives in the countryside with his parents, who work in agriculture. This young worker is a day laborer and raises small animals. With this loan, Amilcar is going to buy pigs to share them with another woman, and when he sells them, he said that he will split the earnings with her as well. This is how Amilcar works in this business. This responsible young man has the dream of becoming a airline crew member, more or less like an airplane pilot; however, he says that he lacks the money to begin this course, but that nothing is impossible in life.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase pigs to fatten and food to care for them in order to improve his business, which will allow him to support his family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, beams, and nails to replace the roof on her house.

loans.name: Héctor Alexander

texts.es:
Héctor gracias al crédito anterior logro comprar más artículos para su funeraria, que estaba ubicada en Honduras; pero debido a la falta de demanda la cerro. Hace aproximadamente 3 meses inicio con una venta de lácteos, verduras, pescado, en un vehículo de manera ambulante. 
 
El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar, queso, crema, guajada, requeson, para ofrecer más productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Thanks to his previous loan, Héctor managed to buy more articles for his funeral parlor, which is located in Honduras. However, due to lack of demand he closed the business. Approximately 3 months ago he started selling dairy products, vegetables, fish etc from his vehicle, moving from place to place.

The loan he is asking for is to buy cheese, cream, cheese curd, and cottage cheese, in order to offer more products to his customers.

loans.use: to buy cheese, cream, cheese curd and cottage cheese for his food business.

loans.name: Erika

texts.es:
La socia Erika se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia hace paltos como pollo al horno, sopas entre otros, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar verduras, pollo y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Erika is continuing her business selling food. Through this business, she wants to go forward. She makes dishes, such as grilled chicken and soups, among other things. Her dream is to grow her business selling food. She requests the loan to buy vegetables, chicken, and meat. 

She is happy because of the loan and promises to comply with the loan repayments.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken, and meat.

loans.name: Henriques

texts.pt:
O senhor Henriques  de 39 anos é pai de dois filhos todos a estudarem   vive na casa propria e sustenta tambem sua mae enviando lhe dinheiro.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar capim para cobertura para revender e prestar servicos de cobertura usado capim devidamente preparado para o efeito.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar a construcao de seu estabelecimento na sua casa para revender produtos de primeira necessidade.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para concretizar seus planos, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Henriques, age 39, is a father of two children, both of whom are in school. He lives in his own home and also supports his mother, to whom he sends money. With the funds from this loan, he will buy sedge grass to be resold for roof thatching. He will also offer roofing services using the grass, which he will prepare to the proper standards himself. 

In terms of projects and dreams, he hopes to finish construction of his store, located in his house, where he sells daily necessity goods. He tells us that the main challenges facing him are in securing the funds he needs to realize his projects, and that he will seek future loans to succeed in his plan.

loans.use: to buy sedge grass to be resold for roof thatching.

loans.name: Rosa Amanda

texts.es: Rosa es madre soltera tiene  60 años de edad y esa de nacionalidad colombiana, tiene 8 hijos pero solo una vive con ella ya que los demás ya son independientes, Rosa se dedica las crianza de animales menores, en esta ocasión el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos ya que comenta que el negocio de chanchos es bueno ya que para engordarlos no gasta mucho porque les da agua de los desperdicio, ella vive con su hijo en una casa por la que paga arriendo, lo que Rosa espera es mejorar su negocio ya que esta es la actividad por la que tiene sus  para seguirse ayudando en sus gastos  diarios.
texts.en:
Rosa is 60 years old and a single mother. She is Colombian and has 8 children, but only one lives with her as the rest are independent. Rosa works raising young animals. On this occasion she will invest the loan in buying pigs. Rosa says that raising pigs is a good business as it doesn't cost much to fatten them because she gives them waste water.

Rosa lives with her son in a house that she is renting. She hopes to improve her business since it means that she has an income to continue paying for her everyday expenditure.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.pt:
A Sra. Teresa de 58  anos de idade, casada e mae de 6 filhos que estao a frequentar a escola no ensino primario e secundario. Ela è empacotadora de banana na empresa de producao de banana a mais de 6 anos 
Com o presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar material de construcao (blocos, cimento, barrotes, area,cimento, varroes  e pagamento de mao de obra.) para dar continuidade com a construcao da sua casa.
Tem com   grande desafio melhor as condicoes de habitacao e a dieta alimentar da sua familia.
texts.en: Teresa, age 58, is married and the mother of six children, who are in grade school and high school. She has worked as a packer at a banana company for more than six years. She will use this loan to buy construction materials, such as concrete blocks, cement, rafter beams, and gravel, and to pay for manual labor to continue building her house. Her biggest challenges are in improving her living conditions and in providing a healthy diet for her children.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as concrete blocks, cement, rafter beams, and gravel, and to pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
Es un día muy caluroso, el mercado mayor de Sololá está repleto de personas que van y vienen, unos comprando otros vendiendo.  La esperanza baila entre los dos grupos.
Entre esos grupos se encuentra Paula de 40 años de edad ella con tanto esfuerzo y empeño realiza el sostenimiento de 5 hijos, los dos primeros ya tienen familias apartes y los tres últimos son estudiantes de la escuela que les queda cerca de la comunidad.
	
La actividad que ella realiza es la compra y venta de verduras en el mayoreo del departamento de Sololá, ella viene realizando dicha actividad durante 8 años ella empezó dicha actividad porque le genera una muy buena ganancia para cambiar las condiciones de vida de ella y la de su familia. La segunda actividad que ella realiza es trabajar como ama de casa.

El uso respectivo que ella le rara al crédito gestionado es para la compra de mas verduras para luego su respectiva venta por los alrededores de su comunidad y en el mayoreo de Sololá ya que es lo único que a ella le genera ingresos económicos, uno de los sueños de ella es ver que sus hijos se conviertan en profesionales en la vida y agrandar mas su negocio de venta de verduras y construir casas para sus hijos para que ellos tengan la condición de vida adecuada.
texts.en:
It is a hot day, the biggest Market in Sololá is full of people coming and going, some selling, others buying. Hope dances among the two groups.

Among these two groups you will find Paula, who is 40 years old. She has so much strength and determination as she feeds 5 children. The two oldest already have separate familites and the three youngest are students at the school near the community.

Paula buys and sells vegetables in bulk in the Sololá department. She has been doing this for 8 years, and she started this activity because it gave her a very good income so that she could change the living conditions for her and her family. The second activity she has is as a housewife.

The loan in question would be used to buy more vegetables for selling around her community and at wholesale in Sololá since it is the only source of income Paula has. One of her dreams is to see that her children become professionals and to grow her vegetable business further and build houses for her children so that they have decent living conditions.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Jose Asuncion

texts.es: José, tiene 38 años de edad, está casado, tiene 3 hijos, vive con su esposa e hijos, en el municipio de San Marcos Caiquin, Lempira. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura con el cultivo de maíz, frijol y café. Actualmente la producción de café es la fuente de ingresos mas fuerte. La producción es vendida en grano despulpado y seco en la misma comunidad. Esta solicitando un quinto préstamo que es por 20,000 lempiras, el cual invertirá en la compra de abono para fertilizar la finca de café. Así mismo le ayudará a darle un mejor mantenimiento y mejorar la producción. Tiene como meta seguir cultivando café y tener un patrimonio donde trabajar.
texts.en: Jose is 38 years old, is married, has 3 children, and lives with his wife and children in the municipality of San Marcos Caiquin, Lempire. He has always worked in agriculture by growing corn, beans, and coffee. Currently, coffee production generates the strongest income for him. His coffee is sold dried and with the pulp removed in his own community. He is requesting a fifth loan for 20,000 lempiras, which will be invested in the purchase of fertilizer for the coffee crop. This will help him better maintain the crop and improve production. He has the goal of continuing to grow coffee and have an estate where he can work.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the coffee crop.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: Sofía de 69 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 35 años de edad. Ella es una mujer tenaz que se gana la vida prestando sus servicios domésticos, además recibe ayuda de sus otros tres hijos ya casados.  Como se observa en la fotografía Sofía ya construyo las paredes de su vivienda pero le falta colocarle techo, puertas y ventanas por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina galvanizada, puertas, ventanas, polines y pines para colocarle el techo, las puertas y las ventanas a su vivienda.
texts.en: Sofía, 69 years old, lives in her own home with her husband and son, who is 35 years old. She is a tenacious woman who earns a living providing domestic services. She also receives help from her other three children who are already married. As you can see in the photo, Sofia has already built the walls of her house, but she hasn't put in the roof, doors, and windows. For this, she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner FUSAI to purchase galvanized sheet metal, doors, windows, beams, and nails to install the roof, doors, and windows in her home.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, doors, windows, beams, and nails to install the roof, doors, and windows in her home.

loans.name: Juan Raymundo

texts.es: Juan un joven de 19 años que estudia la carrera de construcción civil en un instituto superior tecnológico alemán. Desde muy niño demostró interés por las construcciones a su vez le gusta el deporte. Actualmente ayuda a sus padres en el hogar. Agradece a  sus padres por el apoyo en sus estudios. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para el pago de sus pensiones de estudio y materiales de investigación. El deseo de Juan es de terminar satisfactoriamente su carrera e insertarse al mercado laboral formando parte de una compañía de prestigio, que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus padres. Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por apoyar  a jóvenes como El.
texts.en:
Juan is a young 19 year old man. He is studying for a degree in civil construction at a German Higher Technological Institute. Since he was a boy he demonstrated an interest in construction, as well as sport. Currently Juan helps his parents at home.

Juan is grateful for his parents' support in his studies. The loan that he has applied for would be used to pay for his accommodation while he is studying, as well as investigation materials. Juan's dream is to finish his degree satisfactorily and enter the job market working for a prestigious company, which would allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his parents.

He is grateful to Kiva investors for supporting young people like himself.

loans.use: to pay for his accommodation and investigation materials.

loans.name: Feliz

texts.pt:
O senhor Feliz de 34 anos de idade é pai de tres filhos dois dos quais a estudar,  vive na casa propria e tem sua banca em casa e nao sustenta mais ninguem.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar produtos de primeira necessidade e recargas de celulares para revender.
Tem como projectos e sonhos iniciar sua obra uma vez que ja possui um espaco para tal pois onde vive usou material precario.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para concretizar seus planos, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en: Feliz, age 34, is a father of three children, two of whom are in school. He lives in his own house, where he has his store, and is the sole support for his family. With this loan amount he will buy basic needs merchandise and cell phone cards for resale. His main project and dream is to establish his business once he has made a space just for that, as the space he has now in his home is put together using whatever materials he had available. He says that the main challenges facing him are in securing the funds he needs to realize his plans and that he will seek future loans to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy daily needs merchandise and cell phone cards.

loans.name: Andre

texts.pt:
O Senhor Andre vive maritalmente e tem dois filhos menores de idade, ele é trabalhador e com presente emprestimo pretende comprar insumos agricolas (sementes, adubos) para a sua machamba.
Sonha em voltar a escola mais, tem dificuldades em continuar com os estudos, visto que ele trabalha em turnos como servente num hotel e nos dias de discanso ajuda a sua esposo na machamba.
texts.en:
Andre is married and has two underage children. He's a worker, and with the current loan he intends to purchase agricultural supplies (seeds and fertilizer) for his farm.
He dreams of going back to school, but it's difficult for him to continue his studies, This is due to the fact that he works by shifts as a hotel employee and on his off days he helps his wife in the farm.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies (seeds and fertilizer) for his farm.

loans.name: Saltanat

texts.ru: Салтанат успешно погасила предыдущий кредит, она благодарна всем, кто инвестировал в ее проект. На сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве есть 5 коров и 43 овцы, также на 1,0 ГА земли Салтанат выращивает клевер. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Салтанат обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 110,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят. Доходы от кредита Салтанат будет вкладывать в дальнейшее расширение ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Saltanat successfully repaid her previous loan and is thankful to everyone who invested in her business. She now has five cows and 43 sheep as well as one hectare of land on which she grows clover. With the goal of further developing her business, Saltanat has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 110,000 somoni to buy calves. She intends to invest profits from the loan into further expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase calves in order to invest in further growth of her business

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose es un padre de familia dedicado, tiene 25 años de edad, vive en Santiago junto a su familia.
Desde muy joven ha trabajado para apoyar a sus hermanos y ahora que tiene su familia lucha día a día para poder brindarles mayores oportunidades.
Desde hace más de 1 año trabaja como Chofer de maquinaria pesada y le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, trabajador, honesto y con muchos deseos de superación.
Jose está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá remodelar el cuarto de sus hijos y comprar juego de dormitorio, de esta manera estará mejorando su calidad de vida y seguirá trabajando para que su familia viva cómodamente.
texts.en:
Jose is a dedicated family man. He is 25 years old. He lives in Santiago with his family.

Since he was very young, he has worked to support his siblings, and now that he has his [own] family, he fights day after day to be able to give them better opportunities. For more than a year, he has worked as a heavy-equipment operator, and it is going very well for him because he is very responsible, hard working, and honest, and he wants to get ahead.

Jose is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the help that they have provided, he will be able to remodel his children's room and purchase toys. In this way, he will be improving his quality of life, and he will continue working so that his family can live comfortably.

loans.use: to remodel his children's room.

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнуре 39 лет, замужем, мать 4 дочерей. Образование- среднее, с 2005 года занимается полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Айнуры, на сегодняшний день она имеет хорошее развитое хозяйство по сбору винограда. В наличии есть 0,10 ГА поливной земли, где Айнура и выращивает виноград под реализацию. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айнура обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 5 овец. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение ее бизнеса, что позволит улучшить благосостояние семьи и дать высшее образование дочерям.
texts.en: Ainura is 39 and married with four children. She has a high school education and has been working in agriculture since 2005. Thanks to her hard work, she now has a well-developed business growing and harvesting grapes. She has 0.1 hectares of land for growing grapes for sale. With the goal of further developing her business, Ainura has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 30,000 KGS to purchase five sheep. She plans to invest profits from the loan into further expanding her business, which will allow her to improve her family's living conditions and give her daughters a university education.

loans.use: to purchase five sheep in order to be more profitable and pay for her children's education

loans.name: Leonor

texts.pt:
A senhora Leonor é viuva mae de tres filhos ja maiores de idade  vive na casa propria e sustenta quatro netos que vivem com ela.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar acucar, oleo, feijao, refrigerantes para revender na sua banca.
Tem como projectos e sonhos fazer uma dependencia para servir de local de hospedagem de suas visitas
Diz que alem desta actividade ela presta servicos de curandeirismo na sua casa e que vai pagar pontualmente e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en: Ms. Leonor is a widow and mother of three adult children. She lives in her own house and supports four grandchildren who live with her. With this loan amount she will buy sugar, oil, beans, and soft drinks to sell in her store. Her dream is to set up a guest room to host visitors. She says that in addition, she also works as a curandeira in her home and that she will make her payments on time. She will take out future loans to realize her goals.

loans.use: to buy sugar, oil, beans, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Carlos Elias

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven trabajador, tiene 20 años de edad, vive en Pisco junto a su familia.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante, desde hace varios años trabaja como Operario de Telares y le va muy bien porque siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace y es muy emprendedor y responsable. Su mayor motivación en la vida es su familia, es por ellos que siempre lucha para poder brindarles un futuro mejor.
Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá empezar a construir su cocina para que de esta manera pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Gracias a esto seguirá luchando por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young worker.  He is 20 years old, and lives in Pisco with his family.

Carlos is a person who has a strong desire to get ahead.  For a number of years, he has been working as a loom operator, and it's going very well because he always give maximum effort in everything he does, and he is very enterprising and responsible.  His main motivation in life is his family.  This is why he is always striving to provide them with a better future.

Carlos is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because with the support they are providing, he will be able to start building his kitchen.  This way, he can improve his  family's quality of life.  Thanks to this, he will continue to work for the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to build a kitchen

loans.name: Segundo Manuel

texts.es: Manuel está casado y tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 8 años  que se encuentran asistiendo  a la escuela, Manuel se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y a veces trabaja de chofer, su esposa se dedica al ordeño de sus vacas ya que esta actividad es la fuente de ingresos para su familia, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca para aumentar la cantidad de litros de leche para la venta, la mayor aspiración de Manuel es seguir trabajando para bienestar de sus hijos, darles la educación que en estos  tiempos es lo mas principal para encontrar trabajo.
texts.en: Manuel is married and has two children who are five and eight years old. They are going to school. Manuel works in farming and ranching. Sometimes he works as a driver. His wife takes care of the cows because this activity is the source of income for the family. The loan will be invested in the purchase of a cow to increase the number of liters of milk for sale. Manuel's biggest aspiration is to continue working for the well-being of his children and to give them an education, which, in these times is the main thing needed for finding a job.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Sirley Yohana

texts.es:
Sirley es una mujer de experiencia, sabiduría y mucha paciencia.
Es madre de 1 hijo y ha trabajado prácticamente toda su vida para sacarlo adelante.
Ella tiene un pequeño negocio de producción y venta de arepas caseras en su propia casa, opto por esta actividad al ver que su hijo necesitaba una buena educación y un sostenimiento muy bueno.

Trabaja todos los días de 5:00 Am  a 11:00 Am para tener su producto listo y fresco para sus clientes que en su mayoría son los vecinos del sector donde vive.

Ella desea capitalizar su negocio y mejorar su producción, es por eso que solicita un crédito para la compra de un molino manual que le permita realizar su trabajo de una manera mucho más rápida y cómoda.

Una de sus principales dificultades es la falta de dinero para invertir en su negocio pero confía en la ayuda y buen corazón de las personas para sacar su actividad adelante.
texts.en:
Sirley is a woman with experience, knowledge, and a lot of patience.

She is the mother of a child, and has worked almost all of her life to get ahead.  She has a small business making and selling home-made arepas (flatbread) in her own home.  She chose this activity seeing that her son needed a good education and support.  

She works every day from 5am until 11am so that her products are fresh and ready for her customers, who are mainly the neighbors in the area where she lives.

Sirley wants to have capital for her business and improve her production, and so she is requesting a loan to buy a hand mill.  This will enable her to do her work more rapidly and comfortably.

One of Sirley's main challenges is that she lacks money to invest in her business, but she relies on the help and good heart of the people to move forward with her business.

loans.use: to buy a hand mill to continue with her small business

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.pt:
O Senhor Gilberto vive na casa propria com a esposa e seus dois filhos, ele trabalha como segurança numa escola privada.  E com o presente empréstimo ele vai adquirir cimento, pedra, areia, para dar a continuidade com a sua obra.
O seu maior desejo é terminar a construição da sua residência e ter uma progressão no serviço.
texts.en:
Gilberto lies with his wife and two children in a house that he owns. He works as a security guard for a private school. With the current loan he'll purchase cement, rocks, and sand so that he can move forward with his construction work.
His biggest wish is to finish building his home and make progress in his career.

loans.use: to purchase cement, rocks, and sand so that he can move forward with his construction work.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy produce and traditional Capulana sarongs to increase sales at her business.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.pt:
O Senhor Jaime vive maritalmente na casa propria. Ele é servente de um hotel e agricultor por conta propria. Com o presente empréstimo ele vai adiquirir material de construção, arros de madeira, portas e tijoleiras.
Sonha em ser um empreeNdedor no sector comercial
texts.en:
Jaime is married and lives in a house that he owns. He's a hotel employee and a self-employed farmer. With the current loan he'll purchase construction supplies, wood frames, doors and tiles.
He dreams of being an entrepreneur in a commercial endeavor.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies, wood frames, doors and tiles.

loans.name: Mario Ezequiel

texts.es:
Don Mario Ezequiel es originario del municipio de Achuapa, casado, padre de familia. Se dedica al comercio como es la elaboración de lácteos queso, cuajada y crema aprovechando las bondades de su tierra que abunda la leche la cual es el principal ingrediente que llevan estos productos.
Don Mario tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio el cual le ha permitido preparar a sus hijos profesionalmente quienes ya son independientes.
Sale muy temprano a las cinco de la mañana a recorrer las diferentes comarcas aledañas para adquirir la leche y luego elaborar los lácteos los cuales los lleva a comercializar a la ciudad de Estelí transportándolos en bus colectivo.
Necesita el crédito para la compra de leche, ya que estos meses es la temporada buena donde sus clientes demandan mucho los lácteos.
Se siente muy agradecido con Kiva y Ceprodel por el apoyo que le han brindado como un pequeño comerciante, ya que estos créditos le han servido de mucho para capital de trabajo, espera seguir trabajando durante muchos años más si Dios así se lo permite.
texts.en:
Mario Ezequiel is from the municipality of Achuapa, is married, and a father. He works in a business making dairy products such as cheese, curds and cream, taking advantage of the bounty of his land that has abundant milk, which is the principal ingredient of these products.

Mario has worked for many years in this business, which has allowed him to prepare his children, who are now independent, as professionals.

He leaves very early at 5:00 in the morning to go to the different nearby regions to get milk and later to make the dairy products which he brings to sell in the city of Estelí, bringing them by bus.

He needs the loan to purchase milk, since these months are the good season when his customers' demand for dairy products is high. 

He is very grateful to Kiva and Ceprodel for the support that they have offered him as a small businessman, since these loans have served him a lot for working capital, he hopes to continue working for many more years, if God allows.

loans.use: to purchase milk.

loans.name: Bozorgul

texts.ru:
49-летняя Бозоргул - жительница города Куляб, в данный момент начинает новый бизнес в сфере животноводства. Она запаслась тремя тележками соломой и 300 вязкой сена для корма скотов. Также для содержания скотов у нее имеется старый сарай. Только для купли самих бычков ей не хватает собственного сбережения и поэтому Бозоргул обратилась за кредитом. По ее словам в новом бизнесе ей будет помогать один сын. Старший сын вместе с отцом находятся на заработках в России, а другой сын работает в микро кредитной организации.
Бозоргул говорит, что у нее есть опыт в выращивании скотов, поэтому у нее не будет трудностей в новом бизнесе. Она с нетерпением ждет поддержки.
texts.en: 49-year-old Bozorgul is a resident of the city of Kulob and is starting her own business in animal husbandry. She has stocked up on feed for the cattle and currently has three cartloads of straw and 300 bundles of hay to feed them with, as well as an old shed to keep them in. The only thing she is lacking is the money to buy the cattle and therefore she is looking for a loan. In her words, one of her sons will help her with the business. The older son is working in Russia with his father, and the other son works at a microcredit organization. Bozorgul says that she has experience taking care of livestock and therefore she won't have any difficulties with the new business. She eagerly awaits support.

loans.use: to buy three steers to start her own business

loans.name: Jairo Brayan

texts.es:
Jairo es un joven emprendedor, tiene 21 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Ica junto a su familia.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante, desde hace más de 3 años trabaja como Obrero de Campo y le va muy bien porque es muy trabajador, responsable, con muchos deseos de superación.
Jairo está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá llevar un curso de Maquinaria Pesada para que pueda tener mayores oportunidades laborales. De esta manera podrá brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y más adelante seguir otros estudios profesionales.
texts.en:
Jairo is an enterprising young man, 21 years old, and single, who lives in Ica with his family.

He is a person with a great desire to get ahead, and for the past 3 years has worked as a field worker and it is going very well for him because he is very hard-working, responsible, and with a lot of desire to improve himself. 

Jairo is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support they have offered him, he will be able to take a course of heavy machinery in order to have greater work opportunities.  In this way he will be able to offer a better quality of life to his family and in the future continue with other professional studies.

loans.use: to pay for a heavy machinery course.

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia is 40 years old and married with three children who are in school. Ofelia works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 22,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, biscuits, etc. Ofelia has been in this business for 4 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, biscuits, etc.

loans.name: Unidos Venceremos Group

texts.es:
Don Evangelista, tiene 53 años de edad, esta soltero, reside en el municipio de Taulabe, Comayagua. Toda su vida la ha dedicado a la agricultura. Hace 10 años decidió cultivar caña de azúcar. Esta producción la vende a un ingenio azucarero cerca de la zona. El préstamo es en forma grupal y lleva cinco ciclos con el actual, el cual es por 9,000 Lempiras para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para sus cultivos de caña con el fin de mejorar la producción y sus ingresos para ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
El grupo se llama Unidos Venceremos, esta integrado por 6 personas que viven en la misma comunidad y se dedican al cultivo de caña de azúcar. El préstamo grupal es por 54,000 lempiras para compra de abonos y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento del cultivo. En la foto esta Evangelista, Jose, Julio, Lionso, J Rodolfo y Reinaldo a la derecha.
texts.en:
Evangelista is 53 years old. He is single, and he lives in the municipality of Taulabe, Comayagua. All his life, he has worked in agriculture. Ten years ago, he decided to raise sugar cane. He sells the product to a sugar factory near his area. This is a group loan, and he has been with the group for five cycles. [His portion of] the loan is for 9,000 lempiras for purchasing compost and fertilizers for his cane crops, with the goal of improving production and revenues, so that he can give his family a better quality of life.

The group is named Unidos Venceremos (We Will Overcome Together). It is comprised of six people who live in the same community and farm sugar cane. The group loan is for 54,000 lempiras to purchase compost and fertilizers for maintaining crops. In the photo, there is Evangelista, Jose, Julio, Lionso, J. Rodolfo, and Reinaldo on the right.

loans.use: to purchase compost and fertilizers for his sugar cane crops.

loans.name: Neuza

texts.en:
Neuza lives in Suai and is requesting a loan of $800.00 USD to improve her business. She will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as slippers, candies, milk, cigarettes, soft and hard drinks, and other things. 

Neuza opened her kiosk in 2013 with her own working capital of $700.00. She earns a good income from this business. She is happy with the loan that offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods. She also has animals like chickens and pigs.

loans.use: to buy slippers, candies, milk, cigarettes, softs drinks, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Modesta

texts.en:
Modesta is requesting a loan of $800.00 to improve her business. She will use the loan offered from Tuba Rai Metin to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as sugar, detergent, cooking oils, biscuits, milk, water, and other things to sell.

Modesta opened her business in 2013 with her own working capital of $150.00. She is happy with the loan that is offered by Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods. With the loan she will improve her business in the future. 

In her house she also has TV and animals like cows, pigs, and chickens.

loans.use: to buy sugar, detergent, cooking oils, biscuits, milk, water, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Julio

texts.pt:
O senhor Julio de 56 anos  idade seguranca  casado e pai de 5 filhos  todos a estudar, vive na casa propria e  sustenta 4 netos que  vive com ele.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de mais dois quartos na sua casa.
Tem como projectos e sonhos concluir a construcao de sua casa e mobilar e tambem  fazer uma loja na sua casa para melhorar as suas condicões de vida colocando sua esposa  a vender.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para a conclusão de sua casa, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Julio is a 56-year-old security guard. He's married and has five children, all of whom are in school. He lives in a house that he owns and supports four grandchildren who live with him.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase cement, sand, rocks, and rods in order to build two more rooms in his house.
His projects and dreams are to finish building his house and furnish it. He also dreams of building a store at his home so that he can improve his living conditions by having his wife be the salesperson.
He states that the main challenges he has faced are financial, related to finishing his house. He also states that he'll apply for more loans in order to achieve his plan.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, rocks, and rods.

loans.name: Vania

texts.es:
Vania vive con sus padres en la ciudad de San Lorenzo, ella se dedica a hacer trabajos prácticos por computadora para los alumnos de los colegios, para poder solventar sus gastos de la universidad, su anhelo es trabajar en su profesión de psicóloga para ayudarles a sus padres.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Vania lives with her parents in the city of San Lorenzo. She makes a living from doing practical jobs on the computer for school students to be able to pay her university expenses. Her wish is to work in her profession of psychology to help her parents.

She is requesting this loan to be able to invest it in the payment of her fees, since in that way she will be able to continue with her studies as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Sadbarg

texts.ru: Садбарг как другие местные жители сельской местности занимается скотоводством. Она начала эту деятельность 2 года назад. Садбарг покупает корову, откармливает несколько месяцев и продает на местном рынке. Она имеет коровник у себя дома и сама выращивает сено для коров. Садбарг имеет хорошие условия для развития скотоводства. Она обеспечивает свою семью с дохода своего бизнеса. Садбарг имеет 3 детей. Ее муж добрый и хороший человек. Они всегда стараются обеспечить своих детей нормальным условием жизни. Садбарг планирует отремонтировать свой старый дом, который находится в аварийном состоянии. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1800 долларов США для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина, краски и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброта.
texts.en: Sadbarg does animal husbandry as other local residents of the rural region. She started this business two years ago. Sadbarg buys a cow, feeds it for several months and then resells on the local market. She has a cowshed at home and also grows own hay for the cows. Sadbarg has good conditions for breeding of cattle. She provides for her family with the income from her business. Sadbarg has three children. Her husband is a kind and good man. They always try to provide their children with good living conditions. Sadbarg plans to repair her old house which is now in a disrepair. She is asking for an amount of $1,800 USD to buy building materials such as cement, wood and paint. She awaits for your generosity.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement, wood, and paint for repairing the house.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA MILAGROSO, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia Elizabeth tiene 46 años de edad, tiene 02 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus  actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa a pedido, la socia  a la vez trabaja  en una empresa estatal, la socia lleva buen tiempo trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solcito el crédito para la compra de casacas para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Elizabeth belongs to the community bank "Senor de Huanca Milagroso," located in the province of Cusco. Elizabeth is 46 years old, she has two children, and she is married. She has two jobs: one is the sale of clothing by order, and she also works for a state business. She has been doing both of these jobs to support her family for awhile now. She wants to keep working in this way and keep helping her family. 

Elizabeth is requesting this loan so that she can purchase dress coats for her business. She is grateful for the credit extended and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: buy dress coats for her business

loans.name: Zulola

texts.ru: Зулола живет с родителями. Ее родители простые рабочие. Они всегда хотели, чтобы Зулола поступила в университет и получила высшее образование. Зулола в этом году окончила среднюю школу и поступила в университет. Ей 18 лет. Она молодая и умная девушка. Зулола поступила на первый курс Таджикского Государственного Университета Политики и Бизнеса. Она уверена, что будет учиться хорошо. В средней школе она тоже была отличницей. Зулола запрашивает займ на сумму 1200 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет и нуждается вашей поддержке.
texts.en: Zulola is 18 and lives with her parents, who are simple workers. They have always wanted her to go to university to receive a higher education. This year, Zulola graduated from high school and entered university. She is an intelligent young woman in her first year at the Tajik State University of Politics and Business. She intends to study hard and was an excellent student in high school. Zulola is requesting a loan of $1,200 USD to pay her tuition. She awaits and needs your support.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition

loans.name: Eustiquio

texts.en:
Eustiquio is 49 years old and lives in San Andres, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. He is married with 2 children now at their adult ages.

Eustiquio has been engaged in a fishing activity for 3 years already and earns approximately 7,000 PHP each month from doing this type of work. He has requested a loan to be used in purchasing construction materials for house improvements. Eustiquio has been a member of PMPC for just this year.

In the future, Eustiquio hopes to acquire an additional fishing boat and fishing equipment in order to increase their family income.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for house improvements

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her tuition and purchase materials.

loans.name: Danery Melissa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA MILAGROSO, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia Danery Melissa  tiene 26 años de edad y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando  para una empresa privada, la socia lleva buen tiempo trabajando el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma salir adelante.
La socia solcito el crédito para la compra de vivieres  para su hogar.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Danery Melissa is a member of the community bank "Señor de Huanca Milagroso," located in the province of Cusco. Danery is 26 years old and single. She alternates her daily work working for a private company. She has quite a bit of experience in this work, and it's going well for her, thanks to the drive she brings to her job every day. She wants to keep on working in this way so that she can get ahead. 

She is requesting this loan to buy household supplies for her home. She is grateful for the credit extended and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: buy home goods for her personal use

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita works hard to support her family. Teresita is married and has a business buying and selling recycled materials in the Philippines.

She requested a 25,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of recycled materials to sell. Teresita has been in this business for 4 years now.

In the future, Teresita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of recycled materials to sell
