loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is married with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Lydia is 53 years old and has one child who is in school.

She has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines. Lydia requested an 11,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional stock of dried fish to sell.

Lydia has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Lydia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Aida

texts.es:
Aida estudia los días sábados en doble turno y de lunes a viernes trabaja de empleada doméstica en una casa de familia.
Su meta es recibirse de idónea en farmacias y habilitar si es posible una farmacia, ya que ella quiere poder superarse y de esa forma ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
Agradece por esta oportunidad, ya que por medio del préstamo podrá pagar su matrícula, y seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Aida studies in double shifts on Saturdays during the day and from Monday to Friday she works as a maid in a family home.

Her goal is to be a graduate in pharmacology and help, if possible, in a pharmacy since she wants to be able to improve herself and in this way help her family and her loved ones.

She is thankful for this opportunity since through the means of this loan she will be able to pay her tuition and continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Rohilya

texts.ru: Рохиля опытный животновод из района Дж.Расулова города Худжанд. Она проживает там с мужем и детьми. В течение 15 лет Рохиля занимается выращиванием коров молочной и мясной породы. Параллельно с ведением животноводства она еще и работает в джамоате (в сельском правлении). Рохиля активная трудоспособная женщина. Сейчас ей 54 года. Однако она еще не потеряла свою физическую активность. Рохиля сама ухаживает за скотами, так как эта деятельность приносит ей только удовольствие. За счет суммы кредита Рохиля хочет купить пару скотин, а оставшуюся сумму потратить на ремонт дома. Поэтому этот кредит так важен Рохиле для ее экономического благосостояния.
texts.en: Rohilya is from the city of Khujand in the J. Rasulova region and experienced in animal husbandry. She lives with her husband and children and has been raising cattle for milk and meat for 15 years. At the same time, she also works in the town government. Rohilya is an active and capable woman of 54 who has not lost her ability to be physically active. She cares for the cattle by herself, since this occupation brings her nothing but pleasure. With the loan amount, she wants to buy a pair of cows and put what is left toward home renovations. Therefore this loan is very important for Rohilya's financial well-being.

loans.use: to buy cattle and pay some home renovation costs

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зулфия ответственная мать 2 детей. Она одна воспитывает и обеспечивает своих детей, так как ее муж бросил ее и женился на другой женщине. Зулфия последнее 2 года работает уборщицей в университете. Она чистить полы и за это получает деньги. Она вместе со своими детьми живет крайне бедно. Зулфия нуждается финансовой поддержке, так как ее 18 летний сын болен. Она должна купить лекарства для него, но не имеет деньги. Зулфия запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки лекарства. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zulfiya is a responsible mother of two children, whom she is raising and caring for on her own since her husband left her for another woman. For the past two years she has been working as a janitor in a university. She earns money cleaning floors. She and her children live rather poorly and she needs financial support since her 18-year-old son is sick. She needs to buy medicine for him but doesn't have enough money. Zulfiya is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni to buy medicine. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy medicine to treat her son

loans.name: Suhrobjon

texts.ru:
Сухробчон малый предприниматель из района Гиссар. В возрасте 37 лет он имеет собственную бильярдную, которую открыл три года назад. Сегодня бильярд это модное развлечение и увлекательный спорт, а бильярдный клуб – прибыльный бизнес. Сухробчон хорошо управляет своим бизнесом. Он всегда заботится о процветании своего бильярдного клуба. Вот и сейчас он решил расширить его. Сухробчон берет кредит, чтобы купить еще один бильярдный стол в свой клуб. Таким образом он хочет увеличить количество клиентов. В ведении бизнеса Сухробчону помогает племянник.    
Сухробчон уверен, что его предпринимательское чутье и неподдельный интерес к бильярдной игре принесут еще больший успех его бильярдному клубу!
texts.en:
Suhrobjon is a small entrepreneur from the Gissar region. He is 37 years old and has his own billiard club which he opened three years ago. Billiard is fashionable entertainment today and a fascinating sport, and a billiard club is a profitable business. 

Suhrobjon manages his business well. He always cares about the prosperity of his billiard club, and now he has decided to expand it. Suhrobjon takes a loan in order to purchase another billiard table for his club. He would like to increase the number of customers this way. Suhrobjon's nephew helps him manage the business. 

Suhrobjon is certain that his entrepreneurial flair and genuine interest in the game of billiard will bring even greater success to his billiard club!

loans.use: to purchase another billiard table to expand his small business

loans.name: Helmut Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA MILAGROSO, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
El socio Helmut Cesar  tiene 53 años de edad es casado y tiene 03 hijos, el socio alterna sus  actividades diarias trabajando  para una empresa estatal, el socio lleva buen tiempo trabajando el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma apoyar a su familia.
El socio solcito el crédito para la compra de vivieres  para su hogar.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Helmut Cesar belongs to the community bank "Señor de Huanca Milagroso," located in the province of Cusco. He is 53 years old, married, and has three children. He alternates his daily work working for a state company. He's been doing this work for some time, and it's going well for him thanks to the drive he brings to his work every day. He wants to keep working in this way to support his family. 

Helmut Cesar is requesting this loan so that he can buy household goods for his home. He is grateful for the credit extended and is committed to repaying his loan on time.

loans.use: buy household goods for his home.

loans.name: Rosana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA MILAGROSO, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia Rosana tiene 46 años de edad es soltera y tiene 01 hijo, la socia alterna sus  actividades diarias dedicándose a su negocio de venta de artesanía, la socia lleva buen tiempo trabajando el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma salir adelante.
La socia solcito el crédito para la compra de chompas, cerámica entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Rosana belongs to the community bank "Señor de Huanca Milagroso," located in the province of Cusco. Rosana is 46 years old, single, and has one child. She alternates her daily work selling crafts. She's been at the work for awhile now, and it's going well for her thanks to the drive she brings to her work every day. She wants to keep working in his way so tha she can get ahead. 

Rosana is requesting this loan to purchase sweaters, ceramics, and more. She is grateful for the extended credit and she is committed to repaying the loan within the established terms.

loans.use: buy sweaters, pottery, and more.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que esta trabajando para poder salir adelante y ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de sus estudios. Está estudiando la carrera de derecho, y quiere por medio de su profesión quiere poder servir a las demás personas.
Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso para poder pagar sus cuotas, hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, de manera a poder cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
texts.en:
Maria is a person who is working hard at her studies in order to get ahead and to help her loved ones. She is studying law, and wants to serve others through her profession. 
Maria says that she used her last loan to pay her tuition and today she requests a new loan to pay for the costs of graduation, so that she can cover this new expense.

loans.use: to cover her graduation costs.

loans.name: Dilrabo

texts.ru: Дилрабо молодая и активная женщина. Она живет вместе с родителями. Дилрабо не замужем. Она кредитуется первый раз, так как хочет организовать свой новый бизнес. Дилрабо умеет шить национальные женские платья и поэтому она хочет предоставить свои услуги местным жителям. Дилрабо с такой целью участвовала в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она будет предоставлять свои услуги дома. Дилрабо имеет старую швейную машинку, которая подарила ей ее мать, но она нуждается новой швейной машинке. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2500 сомони для покупки швейной машинки. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Dilrabo is a young and active woman. She lives together with her parents. Dilrabo is not married. She takes a loan for the first time, as she would like to set up her own business. 

Dilrabo knows how to sew women's national dresses and therefore she would like to provide this service to the local residents. With this aim, Dilrabo participated in the course "To Get Ahead", organized by the Association of Business Women, and she received a certificate. She will provide her service from home. 

Dilrabo has an old sewing machine, which her mother gave her, but she needs a new one. She requests a loan in the amount of 2,500 somoni to purchase a sewing machine. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine for setting up a new business

loans.name: Musalam

texts.ru: Мусалам жизнерадостная и добрая женщина. Она живет вместе со своей семьей в отдаленном регионе. Для того, чтобы зарабатывать на жизнь она начала свой бизнес купле продажей мужских одежд 19 лет назад. Мусалам начала бизнес с маленьким оборотным капиталом. Постепенно год за годом она развевала свой бизнес и расширяла оборотный капитал. Мусалам торгует на местном рынке. Она периодически обновляет ассортимент своего товара, чтобы привлечь покупателей. Мусалам запрашивает займ на сумму 2400 долларов США для покупки мужских одежд для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Musalam is a happy and good woman. She lives together with her family in a remote region. In order to earn money for living, she started her own business of selling men's clothing 19 years ago. Musalam started the business with very little working capital. Gradually, year by year, she developed her business and expanded her working capital. 

Musalam trades at the local market. She changes her assortment of goods periodically, in order to attract customers. She requests a loan in the amount of 2,400 US dollar to purchase men's clothing for the new season. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To buy men's clothing for the new season

loans.name: Las Del Polígono (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Las del Polígono está formado por 8 socias y 1 socio, todos ellos tienen una muy amistad, viven por los alrededores de la parroquia de Jadan en Cuenca, este lugar goza de mucha vegetación y verdes campos, por su geografía accidentada tiene varios paisajes para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su arquitectura es una mezcla de lo colonial y lo moderno. Su gente al igual que las socias son personas amables y gentiles que guardan la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, se dedican a la crianza de animales, a la agricultura, al comercio y algunos salen diariamente a laborar en la ciudad en diferentes actividades económicas.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora Lucia, tiene 27 años de edad, vive en unión libre y fruto de esa unión ha concebido 3 hijos de 8, 6 y 2 años, sus dos primeros hijos se encuentran estudiando en una escuelita de la localidad, su esposo es de profesión electricista, la casa en la que viven es propia.
Doña Lucia trabaja todos los días como empleada domestica, actividad que la realiza las 8 horas del día, este trabajo le da la oportunidad de tener su propia independencia económica. El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de materiales de construcción ya que va a ampliar su casa. Su meta es mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
The credit group "The Ones From Polígono" is comprised of 8 female and 1 male members. They're all friends and neighbors from the Jadan parish in Cuenca. It's a lush place with green fields, and through its fortunate geography, it has various landscapes where you can enjoy nature. Its architecture is a mix of colonial and modern. Its people are, like the members, kind and friendly, preserving their village's traditions and customs. They raise animals, farm, run businesses, and some even go into the city to work at different jobs.

One of the members of the group is Lucia, age 27. She lives in a common-law marriage and has three children, ages 8, 6, and 2 years. Her two older children attend school in the town, and her husband is a professional electrician. They live in their own home.

Lucia works as a maid, working eight hours every day. This work gives her economic independence. The money from her part of this loan will be invested in construction materials to expand her home. Her goal is to improve her house.

loans.use: buy construction materials

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 48 years old and married with two children, and she works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock of household goods to sell like canned goods, noodles, etc. Susana has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Susana would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of household goods to sell like canned goods, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Casimiro

texts.pt:
O senhor Casimiro de 31 anos de idade é comerciante, casado e pai de 4 filhos dos quais 2 a estudarem vive na casa propria sustenta um sobrinho que vive com ele.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar sapatos em fardos para revender reforcando assim o seu negocio.
Tem como projectos e sonhos fazer  uma ferragem na sua casa para reforcar a renda familiar melhorando assim as condicoes de sua familia.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para a conclusao de sua casa, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Casimiro is a 31-year-old vendor. He's married and has four children, two of whom are in school. He lives in a house that he owns and supports a nephew who lives with him.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase bundles of shoes for re-selling so that he can boost his business.
His projects and dreams are to build a hardware store at his house in order to increase his family's income and improve their living conditions.
He states that the main challenges he has faced are financial, related to finishing his house. He also states that he'll apply for more loans so he can achieve his plan.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of shoes for re-selling.

loans.name: Anucleto

texts.pt:
O senhor Anucleto  de 26 anos de idade é policia, casado e pai de 2 filhos ainda menores um deles a estudar e sustenta sua mae.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de sua casa.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a casa para dar um lar condigno a sua famίlia e depois adiquirir um espaco e construir sua propria casa.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para a conclusao de sua casa, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Anucleto is a 26-year-old police officer. He's married and has two underage children, one of whom is in school. He supports his mother.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase cement, sand, rocks, and rods in order to build his house.
His projects and dreams are to finish his house so that he can provide a decent home for his family. Then later on he'll acquire a space and build a house of his own.
He states that the main challenges he has faced are financial, related to finishing his house. He also states that he'll apply for more loans so he can achieve his plan.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, rocks, and rods.

loans.name: Bahtovar

texts.ru: Бахтовар молодой и трудолюбивый человек. Он родился в 1996 году. Бахтовар в этом году успешно окончил среднюю школу и поступил в университет. Он поступил в Технический Институт Технологического Университета. Бахтовар учится по специальности мировая экономика. Он очень мечтает в будущем стать высококвалифицированным специалистом и служить своему народу. Он живет вместе со своими родителями. Его родители простые фермеры и не имеют денег для оплаты учебного договора. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1100 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Bahtovar is a young and hardworking man. He was born in 1996. This year, Bahtovar succeeded in finishing high school and started university. He entered the Technical Institute of the Technological University. 

Bahtovar is specializing in global economy. He dreams very much of becoming a highly qualified specialist and serve his people. He lives together with his parents. They are simple farmers, and do not have enough money to pay for the tuition. 

Bahtovar requests a loan in the amount of 1,100 US dollar to pay his tuition. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for his tuition

loans.name: Lizza

texts.es:
Lizza quiere ser una profesional para poder ser útil a su familia e invertir en su negocio que está comenzando.
Ella está estudiando la carrera de administración agropecuaria, y está estudiando mucho para poder sobresalir en lo que escogió.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, lo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Lizza wants to be a professional in order to be useful to her family and to invest in the business that she is starting.
She is studying a career in Agricultural Management and she is studying a lot in order to excel in what she has chosen.
She is requesting this loan in order to pay her dues which will be of great help to her.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Ilhomjon

texts.ru: Илхомчон родился  1996 года. После окончания школы советом родителей он поступил в Таджикский Государственный  Университет Политики и Бизнеса. Данное время является студентом 1 курса. Он очень способный молодой человек. Илхомчон увлекается спортом и в свободное время читает зарубежную литературу.  Родители не в состоянии оплатить за его учебу в университете. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университет. Он ждет вашу доброту. Этот займ поможет молодому человеку учиться в университете и реализовать свои знания в будущем.
texts.en: Ilhomjon was born in 1996. After finishing school, with his parents' advice, he enrolled in the Tajik State University of Politics and Business, where he is a first-year student. He is a very capable young man who loves sports and in his free time reads foreign literature. His parents are unable to pay for his university tuition and so he is requesting a loan to pay for it. He awaits your kindness. This loan will help a young man study in university and become educated in the future.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes está estudiando para poder desarrollarse como profesional, ella es secretaria de una empresa desde hace varios años, dentro de unos cuantos años desea ascender en un puesto más elevado, como administradora específicamente, ya que justamente esa es la carrera que está estudiando, la de administración de empresas.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Lourdes is studying to be able to develop herself as a professional. She has been a secretary in a business for a number of years, and within some years she wants to be promoted to a higher position, specifically as an administrator, since that is exactly the degree she is studying, business administration.

She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in paying the fees for her degree, so she can continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Devorah

texts.en:
Devorah is 54 years old and lives in Guintomoyan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is single with two children, now of adult age. 
As the breadwinner, Devorah has been earning a living by selling snacks and raising hogs for three years already. She earns approximately 4,000 Philippine pesos each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to be used to purchase three sacks of booster feeds with the remaining amount as rolling capital for her snack-vending business. 

Devorah became a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) just this year. In the future, Devorah hopes to expand her hog-raising business.

loans.use: To purchase three sacks of booster feeds with the remainder as rolling capital for her snack-vending business

loans.name: Gernán

texts.es:
Al trabajar la tierra bajo un sol agotador sin embargo dispuesto a sudar todo el tiempo para brindarle un mejor futuro a sus hijos. La tierra ha sido bendecida por manos que les gusta trabajar y cuidarla,  es un oficio digno de admirar el que hombres se dediquen por años y para toda la vida.  La tierra sin la labor de hombres campesinos dedicados al cultivo de la misma, no daría los frutos que sostienen generalmente a toda generación. De 23 años de edad soltero con tres hijos que sustentar todos ellos  son estudiantes de la escuela que les queda cerca de su comunidad.
	
La actividad que don Germán realiza es la siembra de maíz para luego venderlas  en el mercado de su comunidad, para poder obtener un ingreso económico par el y su familia para mejorar las condiciones de vida. El lleva realizando dicha actividad durante cinco años y la ha generado buenas ganancias 
	
El uso respectivo que el le dará el crédito es para la inversión de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para mejorar las producciones de sus cultivos y así poder tener una condición de vida adecuada para el y su familia. Una de las grandes aspiraciones de don Germán es la siembra de 8 cuerdas de maíz para poder realizar ventas muchas más grandes con las que ahora realiza y tener un ingreso económico para la reparación de su casa.
texts.en:
He works the land under the grueling son, however he is ready to sweat constantly in order to offer a better future to his children. The land has been blessed by hands that like to work and care for it; it is work worthy of admiration, in which men work for years and for their whole lives.  The land, without the work of the farmers dedicated to cultivate it, would not produce the fruits that generally sustain an entire generation. He is 23 years old, single, with three children, all of whom he supports.  They are students in the school that is near his community.

The work that Germán does is grow corn to later sell it in the community market, to be able to have an income for himself and his children to improve their living conditions. He has done this work for five years and it has produced a good income. 

The use that he will give to this loan is to invest it in agricultural supplies and fertilizer to improve the production of his crops and in this way be able to have suitable living conditions for himself and his family. One of Germán's biggest aspirations is to plant 8 cuerdas of corn to be able to have much greater sales than he is currently making, and to have an income to repair his house.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Ivy

texts.en:
As a married mother of seven children, Ivy works hard to support her family.  Six of her children are in school.

She has a resaw business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from furniture making and rice farming businesses. Ivy is borrowing 21,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy a new engine for her resaw business.

Ivy has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy new engine for her resaw business

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
Liz comenta que con la ayuda de sus padres logró estudiar la carrera que le gusta, que es la de ingeniería Agroforestal, espera graduarse el próximo año y así para por medio de su trabajo poder ayudar a su familia y a su comunidad.
Ella es una persona que se está esforzando bastante para mejorar su vida a través del estudio.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el gasto de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Liz says that with her parent’s help she managed to study the career that she likes which is Agroforestry Engineering. She expects to graduate next year and through her job to be able to help her family and her community.

She is a person exerting herself greatly to improve her life by studying.

She is requesting this loan in order to invest it in the cost of her dues.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Las Pasionarias Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Las Pasionarias, están en su 9° ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, además están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, donde una de ellas es la Sra. Lidia quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno.
El nivel uno quiere decir que ella debe seguir esforzándose por mejorar sus condiciones de vida a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo, ella se dedica a vender frutas también se debe destacar el gran empeño que pone poder salir adelante y superarse.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas frescas para la venta, de manera a poder seguir luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
This group is called Las Pasionarias, and is in its 9th loan cycle in the women's committee program. In addition, they are completing the poverty elimination tool. One of the members is Lidia who, in her last questionnaire, showed a poverty level within level one.

Level one means that she should continue working hard to improve her living conditions through her efforts and continued work.  She works selling fruit and also the great determination that she puts into being able to get ahead and improve herself should stand out.

She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of fresh fruits to sell, in order to be able to continue fighting to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase fresh fruits for sale.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El señor Juan es cliente antiguo de la fundación paraguaya es vendedor independiente de todo tipos de productos, además comenta que se ha hecho de muy buena clientela, gracias a la variedad que siempre tiene.
Juan comenta que gracias a esta actividad ha podido salir adelante, mantener su familia y solventar cualquier gasto imprevisto. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de productos varios para la venta, como prendas, calzados y demás, de manera a seguir ganándose la vida de una manera digna.
texts.en: Señor Juan is a veteran client of the Fundación Paraguaya. He is an independent seller all types of goods, and noted that the variety that he always has on hand has helped him to build a strong, loyal customer base. Señor Juan's business has allowed him to support his family, meet unexpected expenses, and improve his financial situation. He is applying for this loan so that he can invest the funds in the purchase of goods that he can sell, such as clothing, shoes, and other items. This loan will thus enable Señor Juan to keep earning an honest living.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, and other items.

loans.name: Munavvar

texts.ru:
Мунаввар умелая портниха в возрасте 53 лет. Она занимается шитьем штор и занавесок. Мунаввар живет в городе Худжанд с мужем, двумя сыновьями и двумя невестками. Один ее сын   работает водителем маршрутного такси.
На протяжении 6 лет Мунаввар предоставляет свои услуги по пошиву штор и занавесок. Ей усердно помогают ее оба невесток. Мунаввар сейчас хочет продолжить деятельность, однако сперва ей необходимо закупить необходимые ткани. Поэтому она с надеждой обратилась за кредитом. 
В будущем Мунаввар планирует открыть свое швейное ателье.
texts.en: Munavvar is 53 and a skillful seamstress who sews blinds and curtains. She lives in the city of Khujand with her husband, two sons and two daughters. One of her sons works as a bus driver. For six years, Munavvar has been offering her services sewing blinds and curtains. Both of her daughters-in-law help her diligently. Munavvar wants to keep her business going, but first she needs to buy the necessary fabric. Therefore she is putting her hope into requesting a loan. In the future she plans to open her own sewing studio.

loans.use: to buy fabric for sewing blinds and curtains

loans.name: Yulduzoy

texts.ru: Юлдузой работает в сфере продаж уже 5 лет. Она в магазине торгует продуктами питания. Хотя Юлдузой 40 лет, но она выглядит намного моложе. У нее есть 20-летний сын и 18-летняя дочь. Оба дети помогают матери в торговле. Муж Юлдузой работает вдали от семьи, в другой стране. Юлдузой год за годом расширяет свой маленький бизнес. В будущем она хочет открыть большой продуктовый магазин в своем районе Дж.Расулова города Худжанд. Для этого она уже сейчас усердно работает. Юлдузой берет кредит для увеличения ассортимента продуктов в своем магазине. Этот кредит будет толчком к успеху в ее бизнесе.
texts.en:
Yulduzoy has worked in the retail business for five years already. She sells food products at her store. Even if Yulduzoy is 40 years old, she looks younger. She has a 20 years old son a 18 years old daughter. Both the children help their mother with the store. Yulduzoy's husband works away from his family, in a different country. 

Yulduzoy has expanded her small business year by year. In the future she would like to open a large grocery store in her region, J. Rasluov, in the city of Khujand. She still needs to work hard for this. Yulduzoy takes a loan to increase the assortment of goods in her store. This loan will trigger the success of her business.

loans.use: to purchase food products for her store

loans.name: Jahongir

texts.ru: Чахонгир кредитуется первый раз. Он молодой и порядочный человек. Чахонгир родился в 1997 году. Он живет с родителями на юге страны. Чахонгир поступил в университет. Он в этом году успешно окончил среднюю школу. Теперь он студент 1 курса. Он учится в Университете Финансы и экономика Таджикистана. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие. Будущем он мечтает стать хорошим специалистом.
texts.en:
Jahongir takes a loan for the first time. He is a young and respectable man. Jahongir was born in 1997. He lives with his parents in the south of the country. 

Jahongir started university. This year he successfully finished high school. He is currently a first year student. He studies at the Tajik University of Finance and Economy. He requests a loan to pay for his tuition. He awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity. He dreams of becoming a good specialist in the future.

loans.use: To pay his tuition

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Дилбару 38 лет. Она разведена и на воспитании имеет одну дочь. Ее дочери 17 лет. Дилбар сама вырастила свою дочь. Она уже 10 лет работает учительницей младших классов в средней школе. Она является одной из успешных работников. У нее очень хорошие и умные ученики. Ее дочь учится на 1 курсе Таджикского Государственного Университета Политики и Бизнеса. Зарплата Дилбара не хватает оплатить за учебы дочери. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы дочери в университете. Дилбар и ее дочь ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en: Dilbar is 38 and divorced with one 17-year-old daughter whom she raised on her own. For 10 years, she has been working as a teacher for the younger grades in a high school. She is among the best workers and has very good and intelligent students. Her daughter is in her first year at Tajik State University of Politics and Business and Dilbar doesn't have enough money to pay her tuition. She is requesting a loan to pay her daughter's university tuition. Dilbar and her daughter await your kindness.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's university tuition

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 51 years old and lives in Naga, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 4 children now at their adult ages.

Teresita has been engaged in a business buying and selling dried fish for 2 years already. She is earning approximately 2,000 PHP each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional stock of dried fish for retail.

Teresita has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Teresita hopes to expand her dried fish buying and selling business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of dried fish for retail

loans.name: Crestita

texts.en:
Crestita is 59 years old and lives in San Roque, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children, now of adult and school age. For her means of living, Crestita has been in a hog-fattening business for five years already. She earns approximately 5,000 Philippine pesos each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to be used to purchase five sacks of booster feeds and five piglets for her hog-fattening business. 

Crestita has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for two years. In the future, Crestita hopes to expand her hog-fattening business.

loans.use: to purchase five sacks of booster feeds and five piglets

loans.name: Martinha

texts.en:
Martinha has one child. In the house, she has many animals like pigs and goats. 

Martinha is applying for a loan of $800.00 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She has a kiosk, and she will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk, such as pots, plates, spoons, flasks, dippers, and other things to sell. Martinha opened her business in 2001 with her own working capital of $1.000.00. Martinha is earning a good income from selling kitchen tools because many people like to buy them. She is happy with the loan offered by Tuba Rai Metin, allowing her to have more working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: To buy pots, plates, spoons, flasks, dippers, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Chico

texts.pt:
O senhor Chico de 53 anos de idade é professor militar, casado pai  de 9 filhos dos quai 3 a estudar e 2 menores  vive na casa do servico de sua esposa e sustenta um neto que vive com ele.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, va.rrões para a construção da sua propria casa. 
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a sua obra,  adiquirir mais um espaco onde ira fazer outra casa e tambem comprar uma viatura para uso familiar.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao financeiros,  formar seus filhos ate ao ensino superior e  que irá solicitar mais empréstimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Chico is 53 years old. He's a military teacher and married. He has nine children, two of whom are in school and two are below school age. He lives in his wife's company housing and supports a grandson who lives with him.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase cement, sand, rocks, and rods in order to build a house of his own.
His projects and dreams are to finish the construction work, acquire another space where he'll build another house, and buy a vehicle for his family to use.
He states that the main challenges he has faced are financial, pertaining to providing his children with an education all the way to college. He also states that he'll apply for more loans so he can achieve his plan.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, rocks, and rods.

loans.name: Jhames Stephenson

texts.es: Jhames es un joven universitario de 19 años. Actualmente se encuentra cursando el quinto ciclo de su carrera de Ingieneria en agronegociacion. El decidio estudiar esta carrera porque le encanta el mundo de la negociacion. Comenta que quiere especializarse en el tema de Exportaciones. En sus tiempos libres le gusta jugar futbol. El solicito el prestamo para poder pagar sus pensiones de la universidad; ya se encuentra a dos años de terminar sus estudios. Se siente muy agradecidocon las personas que lo apoyan en el cumpliento de sus objetivos.
texts.en: Jhames is a young university student who is 19 years old. Currently, he is in the fifth cycle in his major in agribusiness engineering. He decided to study this major because he really likes the business world.  He says that he wants to specialize in the topic of exports. In his free time, he likes to play soccer. He asked for this loan to be able to pay the university fees. He is two years from finishing his studies. He feels very grateful to the people who support him in achieving his goals.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Savronbi

texts.ru: Савронби трудолюбивая женщина из района Вахш. Ей 42 года. Она родила и воспитала двоих сыновей. Сейчас ее сыновья находятся на заработках в России. Муж Савронби пенсионер. Он не работает и поэтому помогает жене в ведении животноводства. Савронби выращивает крупнорогатый скот уже 9 лет. У нее большой опыт. Сейчас Савронби решила увеличить поголовье скота. На сумму кредита она хочет купить одну дойную корову вместе с теленком. Благодара кредиту у нее будет доход и от продажи молока.
texts.en:
Savronbi is a hardworking woman from the Vakhsh region. She is 42 years old. She has given birth to and raised two sons. Currently her sons are migrant workers in Russia. Savronbi's husband is a pensioner. He does not work and therefore helps his wife manage the livestock. 

Savronbi has bred cattle for nine years already. She has large experience. Currently she has decided to increase the number of cattle. She would like to use the loan amount to purchase a dairy cow and a calf. Thanks to the loan, she will also have income from selling the milk.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow and a calf

loans.name: Nyamdavaa

texts.en:
Mr. Nyamdavaa, 34 years old, lives with his wife and child in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been working as a bus driver on contract with a bus company since 2013. His wife stays at home looking after their newly born child.

He is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to buy insulation materials such as foam, fiberglass and felt for his house. After the insulation of the home, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is needed for heating. Less coal means less pollutants in the environment.

loans.use: to insulate his house in order to reduce coal usage

loans.name: Juvencio

texts.es:
Juvencio tiene 52 años de edad, su estado civil es conviviente, vive en el Distrito de Buenos Aires, es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio cuenta con servicios básicos como son agua y luz, ubicado en la Provincia de Morropón que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Juvencio se dedica al comercio de vacas tiene muchos años de experiencia y cuenta con clientelea fija; adicionalmente se dedica al comercio de platano, actividad que es muy rentable en su zona; él ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alterntiva de 1200 nuevos soles ya que desea invertirlo en su negocio de platano, de esta manera podra generar mayores ingresos para él y su familia. Juvencio es un socio recurrente y ha demostrado compromiso en el pago de su crédito, es por ello que se propone atencerlo nuevamente.
texts.en:
Juvencio is 52, married, and lives in Buenos Aires District, which is in Morropón Province in the Piura Region along the northern coast of Peru. Many people in this region earn a living by farming, ranching, or running small businesses. People here also have basic service ssuch as water and electricity.  

Juvencio has sold cows for many years and has loyal customers, but he also grows bananas, which is profitable in this part of Morropón. Juvencio has applied for a loan of 1,200 new soles from Edpyme Alterntiva and plans to invest these funds in his banana business, increasing his and his family's income. Juvencio has taken out loans before and demonstrated his commitment to repay them, so Edpyme Alterntiva is willing to help him again.

loans.use: Solicita préstamo para invertir en la compra y venta del plantano.

loans.name: Rexie

texts.en:
Rexie, who is married and has had a fishing business in the Philippines for 14 years, works hard to support her family. She has requested a PHP 7000 loan through NWTF to buy an additional fishing net and gasoline.

Rexie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy an additional fishing net and gasoline

loans.name: Glenda Rosibel

texts.es:
Glenda tiene 25 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado de educación básica, actualmente está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura.

Glenda se dedica al trabajo artesanal, como lo es la elaboración de hamacas y tiene 17 años de experiencia en esta labor, ella aprendió en un curso que se le impartió a todas las personas de su comunidad que estuvieran interesadas en aprender, la actividad la realiza en su casa y es así como obtiene los ingresos para poder darles lo necesario a sus 3 hijos.

Ella necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas para la milpa, y así poder darle un  buen manejo para  tener mayor rendimiento en su cosecha, además invertirá en comprar más material para  la elaboración de hamacas.

Sus sueños son tener lo necesario para darles la alimentación a su familia, y además tener material suficiente para el trabajo que realiza a diario.
texts.en:
Glenda is 25 years old, and she studied through sixth grade. She is currently in a relationship, and her partner works in agriculture. Glenda works making handicrafts, such as making hammocks. She has 17 years of experience doing this, which she learned in a course that was given to all interested members of her community. She does this at her home, and that is how she earns income to be able to provide for her three children.

She needs this loan to purchase agricultural inputs for the cornfield, in order to to take care of the cornfield to have a better yielding harvest. She will also invest by purchasing more materials to make the hammocks.

Her dreams are to have everything she needs to feed her family, and to have enough material for the work that she does every day.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs for the cornfield, and to purchase more materials to make hammocks.

loans.name: Santos Mario

texts.es:
Santos tiene 38 años de edad, estudió hasta 6°grado, por motivos de escasos recursos económicos él no pudo continuar con sus estudios y decidió desde pequeño dedicarse al trabajo de la agricultura, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica al trabajo artesanal.


Él tiene 18 años de experiencia en el trabajo agrícola y lo aprendió de su padres, además trabaja en la albañilería en el cual tiene 6 años de experiencia, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 AM a 3:30 PM. 

Santos necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas para poder darle un buen manejo a su milpa y así obtener  mayor cosecha, con ello obtendrá alimentación para su familia y también para vender.

Su sueño es que a su familia no le falte nada, además  desea obtener buenos ingresos de la cosecha que vende.
texts.en:
Santos is 38 years old. He studied through the sixth grade, and because of money scarcity, he was not able to continue with his studies. He has worked in agriculture since he was young. 

He is in a relationship, and his partner works making handicrafts. He has 18 years of experience in agriculture, and he learned the skill from his parents. He also works in construction; he has 6 years of experience with this. His work day is from 6:00 am to 3:30pm.

Santos needs this loan to purchase agricultural inputs to be able to take care of his cornfield and have a better harvest. With the harvest, he will have food for his family and to sell.

His dream is that his family not want for anything, and to earn a good income from the harvest that he sells.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs to take care of his cornfield.

loans.name: Poderosas Group

texts.es:
22 mujeres son las que integran este grupo llamado “Poderosas”, lleva este nombre, ya que ellas se ven con el poder de cambiar el futuro y estilo de vida de cada una. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, donde una de ellas es la Sra. Vicenta quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que ha ido mejorando, todo a través de su esfuerzo.
 Ella se dedica a la venta de comidas que hace, y que luego sale a vender de manera ambulante. Vicenta pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras carnes, condimentos, hortalizas y demás, de manera a poder seguir con la venta de sus comidas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Twenty-two women make up the group called "Powerful Women." They wear this name proudly, as they find within themselves the power to change the future and their way of life. They are taking out this loan to eliminate poverty.

One of the women is Vicenta. Last time she took the survey, she was under poverty level three, which means she has been improving through all her hard work. She makes and sells her meals, traveling with a food cart. Vicenta is requesting this loan to buy ingredients to make her meals. She will buy vegetables, meats, condiments, seasoning, and more so that she can keep on selling her meals as she has been.

loans.use: buy ingredients to make and sell meals

loans.name: Limpia

texts.es:
Limpia es una mujer muy sacrificada que trabaja para estudiar y criar a su hijo porque hoy en día es muy difícil conseguir un empleo si uno no tiene estudios.
Quiere seguir estudiando para ofrecerle una mejor vida a su familia y ser útil a su comunidad.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su universidad, y de esa forma poder ser un profesional útil a la sociedad.
texts.en:
Limpia is a very self-sacrificing woman who works to study and to raise her son because nowadays it is very difficult to obtain a job if one has not studied.

She wants to continue studying to offer her family a better life and to be useful to her community.

She is requesting this loan in order to invest in the payment of university fees and thus be able to become a professional, useful to society.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Qurbonoy

texts.ru: Эту 58-летнюю женщину зовут Курбоной. Она вдова и живет с вместе с сыном, невесткой и внуками в районе Хуросон. Ее сын доктор. Сама Курбоной животновод. Она занимается этой деятельностью на протяжении 15 лет. Курбоной любит разводить коров и телят. Она от этой деятельности получает не только доход, но и наслаждение. В выращивании скотов ей помогают внуки. Курбоной сейчас хочет увеличить поголовье скотов. Она берет кредит для купли нескольких молодых телят для дальнейшего откорма и продажи.
texts.en:
This 58 year old woman is called Qurbonoy. She is a widow and lives with her son, daughter-in-law and grandchildren in the Khuroson region. Her son is a doctor. Qurbonoy breeds cattle. She has worked with this business for a period of 15 years. 

Qurbonoy loves to breed cows and calves. She does not only get an income from this business, but also delight. Her grandchildren help her with the cattle breeding. Qurbonoy would currently like to increase the number of cattle. She takes a loan to purchase some young calves to breed and sell.

loans.use: to purchase young calves to breed and sell

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.pt:
A senhora Beatriz de 29 anos de idade, solteira é bombeira e mae solteira de dois filhos todos a estudar  vive na casa de seus pais ajudando nas despesas de casa.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar chapas, barrotes, varroes, cimento, pedra, areia para dar continuidade a sua obra.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar a sua obra e criar um negocio para reforcar a renda familiar.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para concretizar seus planos, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Beatriz is 29 years old and single. She's a firefighter and the single mother of two children, both of whom are in school. She lives with her parents and helps them pay for household expenses.
With the amount of the loan she'll purchase plates, beams, rods, cement, rocks, and sand so she can move forward with the construction work.
Her projects and dreams are to finish the construction work and start a business in order to improve her family's income.
She states that the main challenges she has faced are financial, related to achieving her plans. She also states that she'll apply for more loans so she can achieve them.

loans.use: to purchase plates, beams, rods, cement, rocks, and sand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make wood doors and to pay the labor costs of its installation.

loans.name: Emily Karen

texts.es: Emily es una joven universitaria de 24 años. Actualmente se encuentra laborando en un estudio contable, ya que culmino sus estudios universitarios en la Carrera de Contabilidad y Finanzas. Ella decidió estudiar esta carrera porque desde muy niña le encanto las matemáticas. Comenta que quiere especializarse en el campo de Auditorias. Ademas de ser una joven muy empeñoza en sus tiempos libres le gusta distraerse con su familia. Su mayor sueño en la vida es ser una empresaria exitosa. Ella solicito el préstamo para poder sacar su Titulo de la Universidad. Se siente muy agradecida con todas las personas que la pueden ayudar al cumplimiento de sus objetivos.
texts.en:
Emily is a young, 24 year old university student. She is currently working at an accounting firm because she finished her university studies in her major of Accounting and Finances. She decided to study this major because she has loved math ever since she was young. She mentions that she wants to focus on the field of auditing. 

Other than being an enterprising young woman, she also enjoys spending time with her family during her free time. Her biggest dream is to be a successful businesswoman. 

She is requesting this loan to be able to pay the final cost of her university degree. She is very thankful to all of the people that can help her to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to pay the final cost of her university degree.

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.en:
Candelaria is 57 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children now at their adult age. 

For her source of living, Candelaria has been engaged in managing a sari-sari store selling groceries and other consumable products for 10 years already and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to purchase additional stock of groceries and other consumable goods for retail.

Candelaria has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Candelaria hopes to expand her sari-sari store business.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock of groceries and other consumable goods

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe, a married mother of two, has owned and operated a retail business in the local community for over 10 years to earn a living. Improving the business has become easier with her access to GDMPC. 

Now requesting a new loan to purchase more grocery goods and assorted drinks to sell, Fe plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery goods and assorted drinks to sell

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria, a married woman, works hard to support her family. For five years now, she has operated a bakery business in the Philippines. Gloria has requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to purchase more ingredients such as sugar, flour, yeast, margarine, etc.

In the future, Gloria would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients such as sugar, flour, yeast, margarine, etc

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Agée de 29 ans  Abla est mariée et mère de 2 enfants  résidant à Adidogomé. Elle a commencé son petit commerce en  vendant  des chaussures. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et revend sous un hangar au marché d'asiyéyé.  Abla  sollicite  un crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Abla, aged 29, is a married mother of two children residing in Adidogomé. She started her small business sell shoes. She gets her supplies twice a month at the big market of Lomé and resells her goods in stall at the Asiyéyé market. Abla is requesting a loan to expand her business to satisfy her customers and to make more profits.

loans.use: to purchase 5 pairs of women’s shoes and 7 for children.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: divorcée et mère de avec 1 enfant en charge à 34 ans, Adjo réside à Adidogomé. Elle vend  charbon de bois. Elle achète s'approvisionne 4 fois par mois à livraison à domicile suite à une commande. Elle revend sous un hangar à à domicile. Adjo sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Divorced and the mother of one child, Adjo is 34 years old and resides in Adidogomé. She sells charcoal. She purchases her supplies four times a month for delivery to her home after having received a special order. She resells her products in a shed at home. Adjo is requesting this loan to expand her business in order to satisfy her customers and to make more profit.

loans.use: to purchase 7 sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Sodbayar

texts.en: Mr. Sodbayar, 45 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He, his wife and son all manufacture and sell putty to local people. His daughter is a student studying at university. He is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy cement, sand and glue in large quantities so that his family can run their family business without worrying about an inventory shortage.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and glue in order to produce putty continually

loans.name: Osor

texts.en: Mr. Osor, 55 years old, lives with his wife and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been transporting goods among districts for more than thirty years. His wife is a sales inspector at an outdoor market. Their son is currently studying at university. He is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy building materials such as fiberglass, shingles, foam and cement for house renovation. After renovation, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and less pollutants are released into the air.

loans.use: to renovate his house in order to burn less coal

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan, a 28-year-old widowed mother of two children, both of whom are students, lives in Kampong Speu Province of Cambodia. A garment-factory worker since 2012, Chan can earn approximately $5 per day. Working far away from home, however, she has no time to take care of her children, so she wants to operate a grocery store at home. 

Chan is therefore requesting a loan to buy groceries to resell at home. This loan will help her establish the business, thus allowing her some time to take care of her children and earn more income. In the future, she plans to expand the enterprise, renovate her house and support her children so they can complete high school.

loans.use: to buy groceries to resell

loans.name: Neli

texts.pt:
A senhora Neli  de 46 anos de idade é coordenadora de projectos e mae de dois  filhos todos a estudar  vive na casa propria.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar barrotes, chapas, cimento, areia, loica sanitaria para dar continuidade a sua obra.
Tem como projectos e sonhos concluir a casa para arrendar passar a viver na dependencia reforcando assim a renda familiar.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para concretizar seus planos, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Neli is a 46-year-old project coordinator. She has two children, both of whom are in school. She lives in a house that she owns.
With the amount of the loan she'll purchase beams, plates, cement, sand, and sanitary ware in order to move forward with the construction work.
Her projects and dreams are to finish the house and rent it out, and then move into the additional room as a way of increasing the family's income.
She states that the main challenges she has faced are financial, related to achieving her plans. She also states that she'll apply for more loans so she can achieve them.

loans.use: to purchase beams, plates, cement, sand, and sanitary ware.

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est constitué de 21 femmes qui habitent dans le même quartier. Il a été crée le 05 Décembre 2005 la cohésion règne entre ses membres. 

La responsable Awa,est âgée de 57 ans ,mariée et mère de 8 enfants dont 4 filles. Elle fait du petit commerce de produits divers(eau de javel, détergent et savon). Elle est debout à droite sur la photo, la main levée.


Ce crédit vient renforcer son activité. Malgré les nombreuses boutiques qui sont dans le quartier, son activité marche bien car elle a sa propre clientèle. Elle vend à domicile et à une bonne expérience de plus de 5 ans.


Elle a pour objectif d’assister son époux à prendre en charge la famille. Elle compte aussi augmenter son épargne afin d'avoir plus de crédit au cycle prochain.
texts.en:
This group is composed of 21 women, who live in the same district. It was created on December 5, 2005. Group cohesion is absolute between its members. 

The group’s official is Awa, She is 57 years old, married, and the mother of eight, including four girls. She has a small-scale business involving various goods (chlorine bleach, detergent, and soap). She is the one with a hand raised and standing at the right in the photo.

This loan is going to bolster her business. Despite the numerous shops in her district, her business is going well, since she has her own customer base. She sells at home and has over five years of good experience. 

Her goal is to help her husband to support the family. She also plans to increase her savings in order to borrow more in the next cycle.

loans.use: to purchase chlorine bleach, detergent, and soap

loans.name: Yoni Eudelmario

texts.es:
Yoni Eudelmario tiene 44 años de edad, es conviviente, con dos hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Nueva Arica, la cual es una zona rural, que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Yoni Eudelmario se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral, hace 5 meses, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio; él solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo, pues desea arreglar el piso de su sala y dormitorios para darle más comodidad a su familia y por ende mejroar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yoni Eudelmario, age 44, lives with his partner and has two children in his care. He lives in his own home, located in the Nueva Arica district, a rural area that's part of the province of Chiclayao in the Lambayeque region along the northern coast of Peru.

Yoni Eudelmario is in the business of raising and selling pen animals. He's been in this work for five months, and his business is located in the rear part of his home. He is requesting this loan to invest in fixed assets as he wants to repair the floor of his living room and bedrooms. This will make his family more comfortable and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: fix the floor of his living room and bedrooms

loans.name: Oktyabri

texts.en: Mrs. Oktyabri, 35 years old, lives with her two children in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. She has been working as a cook at a kindergarten since 2009. Recently, she bought a house that is quite deteriorated. So, she is requesting a loan of 2.500,000 MNT to buy building materials such as cements, bricks, sands and planks for house renovation. She wants to raise her two children in a comfortable and warm place at least. The house renovation will also reduce coal usage for heating and result in fewer pollutants in the air.

loans.use: to buy building materials to renovate her house

loans.name: Elias Rafael

texts.es:
Elías Rafael tiene 48 años de edad, vive en casa familiar junto a su familia, él es soltero y sin carga familiar. Vive en una comunidad donde su población es tranquila y se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de Morropón, provincia región Piura, costa norte de Perú.

Elías Rafael se dedica a cuidar el gando vacuno de sus patrones, además tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, que le genera ingresos adicionales a su sueldo como cuidador; esta actividad la realiza desde hace más de 6 años. Él solicita el crédito para la compra de una moto lineal, la cual le servirá para transportarse mientras cuida al ganado ya que actualmente el se moviliza en sus caballos y mulos, lo que le va permitir tener una mayor comodidad para trabajar mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elías Rafael is 48, single with no children, and lives with his family members in their home, which is in a quiet community in Morropón Province in the Piura region along the northern coast of Peru. People in this area people earn a living as farmers, ranchers, and running small businesses. 

Elías Rafael has a job managing a cattle herd at a local ranch, where he's worked for over six years. He also has a small grocery store that produces additional income to supplement his salary as a ranch-hand. Elías Rafael is applying for a loan for the purchase of a motorcycle that he can ride while working with the herd. He now rides a horse or a mule, but the motorcycle will provide greater comfort and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle that he can ride while he's caring for his herd.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
Maura tiene 47 años de edad, su estado civil es conviviente, vive en el caserio de Carrasquillo a 20 minutos del distrito de Morropón, es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio sobre todo al comercio de platano o banano, su casa cuenta con servicios básicos como son agua y luz, y está ubicada en la Provincia de Morropón que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Maura se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado menor; como son patos, gallinas, pavos que las ofrece en su comunidad, actividad que realiza hace algunos años, contando con clientela fija. Ella ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para invertir en su negocio; como es compra de maíz y alimentos para engorde de sus animales, ello le permitirá ofrecer un mejor producto, por ende mejores precios e ingresos para poder mejroar su utilidad y por consecuente su caldiad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maura is 47 years old, in a common law marriage, and lives in the village of Carrasquillo 20 minutes away from the Morropon district. It's a place whose inhabitants work in agriculture, animal raising, and business, especially the sale of bananas. Her house has basic services like water and electricity, and it's located in the province of Morropon in the Piura region on Peru's northern coast.
Maura works in raising and selling small animals like; ducks, chickens, and turkeys that she sells in her community. It's an activity that she's been engaged in for a few years and she has regular customers. She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternative in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles to invest in her business by; purchasing corn and feed to fatten her animals which will allow her to sell better products for higher prices. This will enable her to increase profits and thus she and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase corn and feed to fatten the animals, which will allow her to sell better products.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia runs a tailoring business and made good use of her previous loan to buy the materials she needs to do her work. She has been in this line of work for eight years and shares her responsibilities with her husband.

She is requesting a new loan of PHP 15,000 to buy additional supplies such as fabric, cloth and thread. The profits she earns from this loan will help her meet her daily needs. She is grateful for the support she receives from Kiva lenders.

Sonia hopes to expand soon and she desires to become successful through all her hard work. She meets with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week. This is where she can draw strength and inspiration from her religion.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and to repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for tailoring materials such as fabric, needles, and thread

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
This is Thelma. Her previous loan was a big help for her business, as she was able to purchase products for her direct selling business. The loan was also useful in the education of her children. Her income from the loan assisted with their everyday expenditures at home. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan. It will be used to buy additional supplies and merchandise, such as clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics. The more items she has on display and available on hand, the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from this business will definitely help her to sustain her children’s education and daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Thelma hopes to progress more in her direct selling business. She also desires to save more for her children's future. She meets her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies and merchandise, such as clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Regina works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish. Regina is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional materials like paints, bamboo, wood, etc. for her fishing business.

Regina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 8 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like paints, bamboo, wood, etc

loans.name: María Candelaria

texts.es:
María tiene 62 años de edad,  no asistió a la escuela debido a que sus padres nunca lo consideraron necesario o importante, tuvo 3 hijos pero ya todos formaron sus familias y viven en casas distintas.

María es propietaria de una venta de tortillas desde hace 30 años; ella decidió dedicarse a este negocio tomando en cuenta que es un alimento que se vende de forma diaria y que se obtiene un buen margen de ganancias,  la venta de tortillas está sumamente cerca de su casa.

El dinero lo invertirá como capital de trabajo para su pequeño negocio. Ella comprará maíz y leña. 
María tiene la intención de incrementar su producción y tener mayores ventas.

María quiere comprar una cocina más grande para hacer muchas tortillas. Ella desea que su negocio siga siendo rentable a medida pasa el tiempo.
texts.en:
María, age 62, never went to school since her parents never considered it important or necessary. She had three children, but all are grown and have their own families and their own homes now.

María has been owning and running her tortilla sales business for more than thirty years. She decided to get into the business since it's a food that can be sold every day and one that provides good profit margins. She does her sales very close to her house. The money from this loan will be invested as working capital for her small business. She will buy corn and firewood. María intends to expand her production and have better sales.

María hopes to one day buy a bigger kitchen so that she can make many more tortillas. She wants her business to keep being profitable as time goes on.

loans.use: buy corn and firewood to make tortillas

loans.name: Arceli Josephine

texts.en:
Arceli Josephine has a business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and raising pigs. Arceli Josephine is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to buy vegetables to sell for her vegetables business.

Arceli Josephine has been sustaining her business activities through her past 9 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
José tiene 26 años de edad, estudió hasta 5°grado de educación básica, no pudo continuar por motivos de escasos recursos económicos, está soltero y actualmente vive junto a su madre, solo ella depende de él.

José trabaja en un centro de bienestar infantil de su comunidad desde hace 3 años, anteriormente se dedicaba a la elaboración de hamacas, además ahora posee una tienda, él decidió dedicarse a esto debido a que obtiene buenos ingresos para el hogar, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 de la mañana a 2:00 de la tarde.

José necesita el crédito para comprar mercadería y surtir su tienda, ya que él desea tener todos los productos necesarios de la canasta básica y así satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.

Su sueño es tener el negocio bien establecido, que le permita día con día obtener el sustento familiar.
texts.en:
José is 26 years old, and he studied through the 5th grade. He was unable to continue studying because of scarce economic resources. He is single, and currently lives with his mother. She is his only dependent.

José worked in a child welfare center for 3 years, and previously he worked making hammocks. He also has a store, and he decided to work here because he earns a good income for his home. His work schedule is from 6:00 in the morning until 2:00 in the afternoon.

José needs this loan to purchase merchandise to stock his store, because he wants to have all of the necessary basic food products to satisfy his clients' needs. His dream is to have a well-established business, which would allow him to provide for his family every day.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to stock his store because he wants to have all of the necessary basic food products.

loans.name: Aissatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 03 femmes qui sont déjà membres du Banc Villageois créé le 5 décembre 2007.

Aminata, la représentante du groupe agée de 41 ans est mariée et mère de 03 enfants dont 01 garçon. Elle mène un petit commerce de marchandises variées dans son quartier. Elle a une assez expérience de plus de 10 ans dans ce qu'elle fait. Sur la photo elle est debout à l'extrême droite.

Avec le prêt, elle va acheter du charbon de bois et des tissus teintés dans les marchés pour les revendre dans son quartier. 

Elle n'a pas beaucoup de concurrents dans son quartier, c'est pourquoi elle n'a pas de problème pour la vente surtout pour le charbon.

Avec les bénéfices, elles va épargner dans le Banc Villageois, appuyer son mari dans la gestion de la famille et gérer aussi ses besoins personnels.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three women, who are already members of the ’banc villageois’ created on December 5, 2007. 

Aminata, the group’s representative, is 41 years old and a married mother of three, including one boy. She runs a small business selling various goods in her district. She has over ten years of fair experience in what she does. In the photo, she is standing at the far right. 

With this loan, she is going to purchase charcoal and some dyed cloth at the markets and then resell the goods in her district.  

She does not have much competition in her district. This is why she has no problem making sales, especially charcoal sales. 

With the profits, she is going to save money at the ’banc villageois’, support her husband in managing the family, and also manage her personal needs.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal, firewood, and dyed cloth

loans.name: Olvin David

texts.es: Olvin, tiene 35 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene 2 hijos y reside en el municipio de Taulabe. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, anteriormente cultivaba caña. Hace 10 años se ha dedicado al cultivo de café el que ofrece en pergamino a los intermediarios de la zona. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 11,000 lempiras,  este mismo lo invertirá en la compra de abono de gallinaza y limpieza de la finca del café con el fin de darle mejor asistencia y sacar mejor producción. Su meta es comprar un lote de tierra para siembra de mas café  y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Olvin is 35 and lives in the town of Taulabe with his common-law wife, with whom he has 2 children. He has always worked in agriculture, first growing sugar cane. He has now been growing coffee for 10 years, which he sells as parchment coffee to intermediaries from the surrounding area.

Olvin is requesting a loan for 11,000 HNL to invest in buying poultry manure and to clear the land on his coffee farm in order to help him produce a better harvest. His goal is to buy a plot of land to sow more coffee plants and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy poultry manure and to clear the land on his coffee farm.

loans.name: Roselle

texts.en:
Roselle is 31 years old and works hard to support her family. She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of rice to sell.

Roselle has been in this business for 7 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of rice to sell

loans.name: Tomás  Alexander

texts.es:
Las calles de Quiché es testigo de los colores más vistosos impregnados de bolsas típicas y entre otros productos de taje típico.  Es imposible que cualquier turista deje de admirar este producto, pararse y hacer una buena compra de ello. Es la actividad que Tomás realiza de 24 años de edad, el se a decidido a trabajar por los dos hijos que el tiene, uno de ellos es estudiante en la escuela de su comunidad y el ultimo aun no estudia porque tiene 1 año de edad.
	
La actividad que Tomás realiza con tanto esmero y dedicación es la fabricación de bolsas típicas, dicha actividad lo realiza en su casa donde el vive, el viene realizando dicha actividad durante 8 años, el empezó a realizar esta actividad porque puede  tener acceso a un ingreso económico para el sostenimiento de su familia. 

El uso respectivo que el dará al crédito solicitado es par la compra de materia prima tales como telas, zíper y brochas para la confección de las bolsas tipas que el realiza para poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Una de las aspiraciones de Tomas es conseguir un local para la exhibición de sus productos para tener una mejor venta en el mercado de su comunidad y ver que sus hijos se conviertan en profesionales en la vida y que ellos tengan una condición de vida adecuada en el futuro.
texts.en:
The streets of Quiché are vibrant with the colors of regional handbags and other typical, regional textile products. Tourists can't help but stop and admire these handmade goods, and buy them for a bargain. 

Tomás has a workshop in his home, where goes about making handbags with great dedication and care. Tomás has made handbags for the past eight years; he was 24 years old and a new father when he decided to take up this work in order to earn income and support his family. Tomás and his wife now have a second child, just one year old. The older child attends the primary local school. 

Tomás is applying for a loan in order to purchase the materials he needs to make the handbags that he sells in order to provide his family a better life: fabric, zippers, and brushes. One of Tomas's goals is to set up a shop in a local market where he can display his products. He hopes that having fixed location in a market will boost sales and provide a higher income for his family. Tomás hopes that his children will achieve the education they need to make professional careers. He also hopes that they will never want for anything in the future.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for making handbags.

loans.name: Meliana

texts.en: Meliana lives in Suai and she is requesting a loan of $800 to improve her business in the future. She will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as scissors, sugar, candies, slippers, detergent, books, perfume and other things to sell. Meliana started to open her kiosk in 2010 with her own working capital of $200. She is happy with the loan offered by Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods. In the house, she has one motorcycle, one refrigerator and one television.

loans.use: To buy scissors, sugar, candies, slippers, detergent, books, perfume and other items to sell.

loans.name: Karanjung Lestari 1 Group

texts.en:
This group makes their payments. During the loan periods, they manage their businesses well. They maintain sows and pigs for fattening. One sow gave birth to 12 piglets. But not all; some also gave birth to 6 - 8 piglets, depending on the type of sow. The superior sow can give birth to more than the local sow.

Ni Made was very happy because she succeeded at keeping her pigs and she sold all of them. She keeps them for 5 months. All the profits are used as capital for her pig business.
