With the success of her fattened pigs, Ni Made continues her business as a piglets seller. Her piglets have a good quality because she keeps them well, giving them nutritious feed and vitamins. She also has become an example to other breeders not only in her group but in her village also. 

With the same loan amount, she will use her loan to purchase superior quality feed and renovate the cage. She plans to sell the pigs near the holiday to get a good price. She hopes her plan continues running well. She and the group still need advice and loan support for their businesses until they are ready and have enough capital to continue the businesses by themselves.

One member couldn't attend the meeting because her child is in hospital.

loans.use: to purchase superior quality feed and renovate the cage

loans.name: Hernan Cadiz

texts.es:
Hernan es un hombre joven de 22 años de edad, soltero sin hijos y se dedica a la fabricación de botes y balsas de totora y madera de forma artesanal.
Él es emprendedor, constante, inquieto, responsable y muy trabajador. Su trabajo lo realiza en ‘Isla Suriqui’; es una isla situada en el lago menor del lago Titicaca perteneciente a la provincia de Los Andes en el departamento de La Paz. Es un sitio turístico notable, donde se fabrican las balsas de totora, recurso natural que permitió al hombre andino navegar en el lago desde épocas remotas. La isla tiene unas dimensiones máximas de 3,7 km de largo por 2,2 de ancho y una superficie aproximada de 4,5 km².
Hernán es de tez morena, cabello corto negro, complexión delgada, su lengua natal es el aymara y utiliza el español para el comercio en la ciudad. Su trabajo es la construcción de balsas y botes; Las balsas son la unión de cinco cuerpos tubulares formados con haces de totora, unidos en forma acanalada, tradicionalmente se completa con una vela del mismo material; las más recientes llevan sólo remo de madera. El tiempo promedio de construcción de una balsa es de 15 a 25 días. En la actualidad también realiza la construcción de pequeñas embarcaciones de madera, además de las de totora.
Él sueña en mejorar su calidad de vida realizando la compra de madera para la construcción de botes y mejorando sus ingresos económicos.
Es por esos motivos que Hernan solicita un préstamo para la compra de madera para la construcción de botes y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hernan, age 22, is single and has no children. He is in the business of making craft boats and rafts from totora reed and wood. He is enterprising, steady, active, responsible, and very hard working. He does his work on Isla Suriqui, an island located in the smaller lake of Lake Titicaca, part of the Los Andes province in the department of La Paz. It's a notable tourist destination, where they make rafts from totora reeds, a natural resource that allowed the Andean peoples to navigate the lake since ancient times. The island is 3.7 km long by 2.2km wide at the largest and is roughly 4.5 km² in total area.

Hernan has brown skin, short black hair, and a slight build. His first language is Aymara, and he uses Spanish to do business in the city. He works by building rafts and boats. The rafts are made up of five cylindrical units made of bundles of totora reed, joined with grooves. These are traditionally made with a sail of the same material, but more recently they have just a wooden oar. On average, each raft takes him 15-25 days to build. He also currently makes small boats from wood in addition to totora reed.

He dreams of improving his life by buying wood to make boats and improving his economic income. That's why Hernan is requesting his loan, which he will use to buy wood, make boats, and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: buy wood to build craft boats

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando, tiene 35 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja, tiene 3 hijos y reside en una aldea de la comunidad de Taulabe.  Fernando se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos de maíz y frijoles. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 5 años, siendo su única fuente de ingresos para la familia. La producción la vende en al misma zona. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 10,000 lempiras el cual lo invertirá en la compra de abono y fertilizantes, para darle mantenimiento al cultivo de maíz y frijol. para un futuro piensa dejar un patrimonio para sus hijos.
texts.en: Fernando is 35 and lives with his common-law wife and their three children in the town of Taulabe. Fernando has grown staple crops such as corn and beans for the past five years, and sells his produce in the Taulabe area. Farming is the family's only source of income, and Fernando has applied for a loan of 10,000 lempiras that he'll use to purchase manure and fertilizers for the maintenance of his corn and bean crops. Fernando hopes to leave tangible assets and wealth to his children.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers for his corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Beatriz Adriana

texts.es:
Las calles de Sololá es testigo de los colores más vistosos impregnados en las blusas, cortes y fajas típicas.  Es imposible que cualquier turista deje de admirar este producto, pararse y hacer una buena compra de ello, es la actividad que Beatriz realiza de 20 años de edad soltera que esta decidida a luchar por la vida para ayudar a sus padres para tener un ingreso económico para el mejoramiento de la condiciones de vida de la familia.
		
La actividad que ella desempeña es la elaboración de güipiles, cortes y fajas típicas, ella viene realizando dicha actividad durante 5 años ella ha venido realizando un gran esfuerzo para poder elaborar sus actividades de la mejor calidad y diversos estilos para poder atraer a más clientes para tener un mejor ingreso económico para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El uso respectivo que ella le dará al crédito es para la compra de materia prima como hilos de diferentes colores y otros insumos que se requieren en la elaboración de su actividad para poder tener un ingreso económico. Uno de las grandes aspiraciones de Beatriz es tener un local propio para poder brindar un servicio mejor a sus clientes y graduarse en la universidad par ser alguien mejor en la vida.
texts.en:
The streets of Sololá are witness to the most pleasing colors suffusing the traditional blouses, skirts, and sashes. It is impossible for any tourist to resist admiring this product and stopping to make a good purchase of it. This is the activity that Beatriz carries out. She is 20 years old and single. She is determined to strive to make a living to help her parents to have an economic income for improving the living conditions of the family.

The activity that she carries out is making traditional "güipiles" [woven blouses], skirts, and belts. She has been doing this activity for five years. She has put great effort into being able to make her garments of the highest quality and in different styles to attract more customers in order to have a better income and improve her family's living conditions.

She will put this loan to use by buying raw materials like different colored threads and other supplies that are required in her activity in order to have a good income. One of Beatriz's greatest aspirations is to have her own commercial space so that she can provide better service to her customers and to graduate from the university so that she can be someone better in life.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for traditional clothing

loans.name: Ligaya

texts.en:
Ligaya is 61 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. 

Ligaya has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and earns an income from pre-paid mobile load.

Ligaya aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Elva

texts.es:
Elva es de la ciudad de Caaguazú, es una persona que quiere salir adelante, es por ello que se está esforzando para poder ser alguien en la vida.
Está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería agrónoma, y quiere poder ayudar a la sociedad por medio de su profesión.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Elva is from the city of Caaguazú. She is a person who wants to move forward. That is why she is trying hard to be able to be somebody in life. She is studying for a degree in agricultural engineering, and she wants to help society by means of her profession.

She is requesting this loan in order to be able to pay her fees, and in this way, she can continue studying as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Maria Belinda

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 55 años de edad, casada, madre de dos hijos y su negocio es el comercio de ropa de cama.
Ella es emprendedora, luchadora, fuerte, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona de ‘Villa Fátima’ sitio dónde se reúnen estaciones informales de transportistas para la salida a ciudades menores y poblaciones dentro del departamento (salidas a Los Yungas, Beni y Pando).
María es de tez morena, cabello largo negro, viste de manera formal, su lengua natal es el aymara el cual ya casi olvidó, por motivos de comercio dentro de la ciudad habla sólo español. Su trabajo es el comercio de ropa de cama como; edredones, cubrecamas, sábanas, etc.
Su sueño es poseer un local comercial en un lugar céntrico, con muchos empleados a su cargo. Ella desea aumentar su stock de temporada realizando la compra de mercadería por mayor para generar mejores ingresos económicos.
Es por esos motivos que María solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa de cama por mayor y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María, age 55, is married and the mother of two children. Her business is selling bed linens. She runs her business in the Villa Fátima area, a transit hub of several informal stops, taking people out to small cities or other areas within the department (departures to Los Yungas, Beni, and Pando).

María has brown skin and long black hair, and she dresses formally. Her birth language is Aymara, but she has nearly forgotten it. Since she does business in the city, she only speaks Spanish. Her business is selling bed linens, including quilts, bedspreads, sheets, etc. Her dream is to own a store in a central location with many employees under her charge. She wants to increase her seasonal stock by buying merchandise at wholesale so she can earn greater income. These are the reasons why María is seeking this loan: she will buy bed linens at wholesale and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: buy bed linens at wholesale

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 58 years old and married with one child. She earns a living by farming trees in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years, and earns additional income from a general store.

Wilma is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers, plastic bags and new seeds for her business. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, plastic bags and new seeds for her business

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling peanuts in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 3 years, and earns additional income from buying and selling coconuts and chicken.

Rosemarie is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional peanuts to sell. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional peanuts to sell

loans.name: Chantha

texts.en: Chantha took this photo with her husband. Chantha is 45 years old, a rice farmer and married woman with three children. She has been a farmer since 1985. Her husband is 65 years old, he makes bamboo baskets and small bamboo houses (for decoration) for sale. Two of her children are garment-factory workers and another is a student. Together, they can earn approximately $16 per day. Now Chantha would like to request a loan to buy a motorcycle for her children to ride to work. This loan will help reduce her family’s traveling expense. In the future, she is going to build a new house and support her youngest child to finish high school and if possible, to go to university.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for her children to ride to work

loans.name: Lannie

texts.en:
Lannie is 49-years-old from Sibul, Talavera, Nueva Ecija. She is married to Pedro who is a farmer and they are blessed with six children. 

Having farming as their source of income is kind of difficult for them, especially since they have to send their children to school. One of them is Nomer who is currently enrolled in ASKI’s Microfinance Technology Course. He wants to pursue and finish his studies to be able to help his parents. 

To help them achieve their goals, they want to avail themselves of an educational loan of 40,000 PHP from the KIVA lenders, to be used to pay for Nomer’s tuition fee.

loans.use: to pay for her son's tuition fees

loans.name: Realyn

texts.en:
Realyn lives in a simple way with her eight siblings. She wants to improve their living standards in the near future, and with this she believes that better education will lead her to the success of her dream.
 
She had joined GDMPC recently and borrowed a new loan to pay for her school tuition fees for the first semester of this current school year. She wants to become a successful businesswoman in the future. She studied Business Administration in the university and her access to GDMPC micro finance will ease her financial needs.

loans.use: to pay for her school tuition fees for the first semester of this current school year.

loans.name: Emelita

texts.en:
Emelita previously received a 15,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education and in their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan for her to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from the business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Emelita dreams to expand soon and she desires to have her own place for her business to continue operating. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en:
Mildred is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fishing materials for her fishing business.

Mildred has been in this business for 20 years. Mildred earns more income from a boarding house rental.

Mildred has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials for her busines

loans.name: Mariana

texts.en: Mariana lives in a town which is about 138 km from the capital. She has three children and her husband is a farmer. Now she is requesting a loan of $600. She is a businesswoman so she always finds ways to improve her business. Mariana has a kiosk that she opened three years ago. She started to do business with her own working capital of $80. She will use the loan offered from Tuba Rai Metin to buy some goods to keep in her kiosk such as coffee,  noodles, milk, biscuits, aqua, detergent, cigarettes, and other things to sell. She is happy with the loan from Tuba Rai Metin because with the loan she will improve her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy coffee, noodles, milk, biscuits, aqua, detergent, cigarettes, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 50 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school. Rosemarie works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.  Rosemarie has been in this business for eight years.

In the future Rosemarie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Deive

texts.es:
Deive tiene 32 años de edad, es casado, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Deive se dedica a brindar los servicios de jornalería, contando con herramientas propias, con más de 11 años de experiencia en el negocio, solicita préstamo para arreglos de vivienda, dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones y mayor seguirdad sus equipos y herramientas, con gran influencia en el negocio; Deive piensa mejorar productividad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Deive is 32 years old, married, and has 2 children. He lives with his family in Oyotun district, in a rural zone of Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru.

Deive is dedicated to offering day labor services, using his own tools.  He has more than 11 years of experience in the business. He is requesting a loan to repair his house. The investment will serve to provide improved conditions and greater security for his equipment and tools, aiding him in his business. 

Deive wishes to increase the productivity of his services and, thus, to be able to take better care of the diverse needs of his customers in the zone.

loans.use: to make home improvements so that he can have a place in better condition with greater security for his tools and equipment.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 36 años, es soltero, muy conocido en el medio, por la labor de crianza y venta de animales menores. Vive en casa propia con hija de 06 años quien estudia en colegio nacional de Cayalti. Antonio cuenta con buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinoos, él vive en una comunidad ubicada a 52 kms de chiclayo, pasando el rio Puente Fierro y la curva,es una pequeña comunidad, habitada por gente respetuosa, que se dedicadan al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia, que pertenece al distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Antonio se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cerdos, patos, etc. desde hace más de 03 años, y adicionalmente trabaja en la Agrícula Cerro Prieto, desde hace más de 10 meses. Antonio necesita el préstamo para invertir en compra de cerdos, comidas para engorde y con lo sobrante hacer unos arreglos en casa, y de esta manera aumentar sus ingresos con mayor volumen de ventas, mejorar sus ganancias y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Antonio is 36 years old. He is single and very well known in the area for his work raising and selling small animals.

He lives in his own home with his six-year-old daughter who is going to the national school in Cayalti. Antonio has good references from his neighbors. He lives in a community located 52 kilometers from Chiclayo, past the Puente Fierro River and the bend. It is a small community, inhabited by respectable people who work in business, farming, and ranching. It is in the Cayalti district in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Antonio has been raising and selling small animals such as pigs, ducks, etc. for more than three years. He has also worked in the Agricula Cerro Prieto for more than 10 months. Antonio needs the loan to invest in the purchase of pigs and food to fatten them. With the excess, he will make adjustments to his house. In this way, he will increase his income with more sales, improve his earnings, and in the end, improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and foods to fatten them, and with the excess to make some adjustments to his home.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita is 56 years old and married with nine children, two of whom are in school. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. 

Clarita is borrowing 23,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizers for her farm.
Clarita has been farming rice for 39 years and she also earns additional income from farming coconut.
She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, which is to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of fertilizers for her farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a bigger kitchen.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en:
Julita is 50 years old and from Maria Aurora, Aurora. She is married to Jimmy, who is a farmer, and they are blessed with three children.
The income they earn is insufficient for all their expenses, especially as their daughter, Aurora, is studying. She is currently enrolled in ASKI’s Microfinance Technology Course. 
To help them pay for the tuition fee and other expenses, they want to avail an educational loan of 40,000 PHP from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's tuition fee

loans.name: Aamir Haider

texts.es: Aamir es un joven universitario de 21 años. Actualmente se encuentra trabajando, ya que culmino sus estudios de Computación e Informática. El decidió estudiar esta carrera porque le gusta el campo de redes y conexión de computadoras. Comenta que como ya culmino los estudios en un Instituto ahora quiere convalidad a una Universidad  a la Carrera de Ingeniera de Sistemas.  Ademas de ser un joven muy aplicado en sus ratos libres se dedica a practicar deportes con sus amigos. Para obtener algún ingreso trabaja esporadicamente en un centro de computo reparando cualquier desperfecto . El solicito el préstamo para poder sacar el titulo del instituto donde estudio. Se siente agradecido con las personas que la pueden ayudar a cumplir sus metas.
texts.en: Aamir is a young, 21-year-old university student. He currently is working, since he finished his coursework in computer science. He decided to study this major because he likes the field of networks and computer connections. He says that since he has coursework at an institution, now he wants to transfer to a university for a degree in computer science. In addition to being a very hard-working young man, in his free time, he plays sports with his friends. To have an income, he works occasionally in a computer center repairing all sorts of problems. He asks for a loan to be able to pay the diploma fees at the institute where he studied. He is grateful to the people who help him to meet his goals.

loans.use: to pay diploma fees at his institute.

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en:
Juliana has been involved in selling new clothes since 2013, having begun her enterprise with her own working capital of $ 500.00. She has a location business in the market where she sells clothing such as shirts, blouses, shorts, and skirts. She also raises animals such as cows, chickens and pigs.

Juliana is requesting a loan of $700.00. from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business through the purchase of some additional supplies. The profits arising from this loan will enable her to accrue more working capital with which to buy other things.

loans.use: To buy shirts, blouses, shorts, skirts and other things to sell

loans.name: Allan Antonio

texts.es:
La combinación de colores, la calidad de los productos y el excelente servicio que ofrece don Allan en su negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, es lo que llama la atención de los clientes, quienes siempre resultan satisfechos por la compra realizada, razón principal por la que no dudan en volver. Tiene 44 años, está en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos. Desde hace veinte años está a cargo del negocio familiar, aún recuerda cuando desde pequeño ayudaba a su mamá a vender y cerrar el puesto, ella le enseñó cómo mantener un negocio estable y en buenas condiciones. 
Allan solicita el crédito para incrementar la producción de su capital, requiere comprar verduras y frutas, tales como tomate, bananos, pepinos, limones, cebollas, lechuga, yuca, entre otros. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que desea cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes, de manera que pueda incrementar sus ingresos y así poder ofrecerle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Es un hombre humilde y trabajador, su  principal fuente motivación son sus hijos, a quienes anhela brindarles educación y salud de calidad para que sean profesionales exitosos. Uno de sus planes futuros es mejorar la infraestructura de su negocio y seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The combination of colors, the quality of products, and the excellent service that Allan offers in his fruit and vegetable sales business are what make him stand out to his customers. They always end up satisfied with their purchases, which is the main reason that they don't hesitate to return. 

Allan is 44 years old. He is in a common-law marriage and he has four children. For twenty years, he has been in charge of the family business. He still remembers when, from a very young age, he used to help his mother with selling and closing up the shop. She taught him how to keep the business stable and in good shape. 

Allan is requesting the loan to increase the output of his capital. He needs to buy vegetables and fruits such as tomatoes, bananas, cucumbers, lemons, onions, lettuce, cassava, and more. He is placing his trust in the financing because he would like to meet his customers' demand so that he can increase his income and be able to offer his family better living conditions. 

Allan is a modest and hardworking man. His main motivation is his children, whom he yearns to provide with an education and good health so that they can be successful professionals. One of his future plans is to improve the infrastructure of his business and to keep growing.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and fruits such as tomatoes, bananas, cucumbers, lemons, onions, lettuce, cassava, and more

loans.name: Seyha

texts.en:
Seyha is 35 years old and a married teacher with two children. He is also a student at a university. He has been a teacher since 2010. His wife is 26 years old and a garment factory worker. They live in the Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. Together they can earn approximately $13.33 per day. 
Now, Seyha would like to request a loan to pay for his tuition fee. This loan will help him graduate. 
In the future, he is going to find another part-time job to earn more income and to support his children to go to university.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fee

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina, tiene 46 años de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su  familia en una aldea del municipio las Flores, Lempira. Se dedica al cultivo de café, este negocio lo tienen hace 14 años y cultiva en su propiedad. Esta producción es vendida a intermediarios de la zona. Ha solicitado cinco prestamos a la institución con este actual que es por 10,000 lempiras para fertilizar sus cultivos de café y siembra de mas plantas de cafe. Espera que esta inversión le ayude a tener en buenas condiciones su finca y obtener mejor cosecha de café. Su plan es ampliar el cultivo para obtener mejores ganancias y mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marina is 46 years old. She is married and has two children. She lives with her family in a small village in the municipality of Las Flores, Lempira. She grows coffee. She has had proprietorship of this business and crop for 14 years. The products are sold to middlemen in the area. She has requested five loans from this institution. This one is for 10,000 lempiras to fertilize her coffee crops and to sow more coffee plants. She hopes that this investment will help her have good conditions on her plantation and obtain a better coffee harvest. Her plan is to expand her crops to have better revenue and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to fertilize her coffee crops and sow more coffee plants.

loans.name: María Cosme

texts.es:
María tiene 70 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar algún nivel académico ya que en su infancia a sus padres no tenían los suficientes recursos para poder enviarla a estudiar, actualmente está soltera, vive con un hijo de 38 años quien cuida de ella.

María se dedica a los oficios domésticos desde que tenía 12 años de edad, actividad que la madre le enseñó en su niñez, actualmente tiene un pequeño negocio de frutas y verduras, ella compra el producto en otra ciudad que está a una distancia de 16 kilómetros.


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar productos como pan, galletas, churros y bebidas para abrir un chalet en una escuela.

Su sueño es que sus negocios le sigan generando las ganancias esperadas para  mejorar la calidad de vida, además desea seguir estudiando primer grado ya que a ella no le importa su edad pues piensa que nunca es tarde para aprender.
texts.en:
María is 70 years old and never had the opportunity to study at all, as in her childhood her parents did not have the economic resources to send her to school. She is currently single and lives with her 38-year-old son, who looks after her.

María has worked in domestic chores since she was 12 years old. Her mother taught her this profession when she was young. Now she has a small fruit and vegetables business. She buys her products in another city which is 16km away. 

She needs the loan to buy products such as bread, biscuits, churros and drinks in order to open a snack shop in a school. 

Her dream is that her businesses continue generating the expected income for her so that she can improve her quality of life. She also hopes to continue studying the first grade. Her age doesn't matter to her as she thinks it is never too late to learn.

loans.use: to buy products such as bread, biscuits, churros and drinks in order to open a snack shop in a school.

loans.name: Jenalyn

texts.en:
Jenalyn is 31 years old and married with two children who are in school. Jenalyn works very hard to provide for them. 

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. Jenalyn has been in this business for 8 years. In the future, Jenalyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is a hardworking entrepreneur who has been selling fruits vegetables in the Philippines for two years now. She earns additional income from a general store. 

Having repaid her previous loan, Daisy is requesting a new one for PHP 30000 through NWTF to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell. Having been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF, she dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Adela Elizabeth

texts.es:
Adela tiene 25 años de edad, estudió hasta 1° año de bachillerato, está acompañada y su pareja tiene un taxi el cual lo utiliza como fuente de ingresos para el hogar, tiene una hija de 3 años de edad, además de Adela dependen sus abuelos.

Adela  no tiene negocio, sobreviven de lo que aporta el esposo en el hogar, ella viendo la situación económica de la familia, decidió realizar una siembra de maíz y de esta forma ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar material para cultivar maíz y para pagar mano de obra que limpie el terreno en el que cultivará.

Ella sueña con que su familia viva en mejores condiciones, que su hija estudie para ser profesional, para esto Adela tener salud para apoyar a su hija en lo necesario.
texts.en:
Adela is 25 years old. She studied through the first year of secondary school. She is in a relationship and her partner has a taxi that he uses as a source of income for the household. She has one 3-year-old daughter. In addition, her grandparents depend on her.

Adela does not have a business. They survive on what her husband contributes to the household. Seeing her family's financial situation, Adela decided to plant a crop of corn in order to help her husband with the household expenses.

She needs the loan to buy supplies to grow corn and to pay for manual labor to clear the land that she will farm.

Adela dreams of her family living in better conditions, of her daughter studying to become a professional, and of having good health so she can support her daughter as needed.

loans.use: to buy supplies for growing corn and to pay for manual labor to clear the land that she will plant.

loans.name: José Javier

texts.es:
José tiene 20 años de edad, estudió hasta 3° grado, está acompañado y tiene un hijo de 4 años de edad, su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios domésticos, son los únicos que dependen de José.

José se dedica a prestar servicios en el destacamento militar desde hace doce meses, pero además realiza siembra de maíz a modo de obtener más ingresos para el hogar.

El crédito lo necesita para realizar la siembra de maíz y comprar todo lo necesario para ello como abono, abono y sulfato entre otras cosas, y de esta forma obtener una mejor cosecha.

Su sueño es tener la fuerza, salud y la posibilidad económica para darle a su hijo la educación que merece y no descuidar las cosas necesarias que él y su pareja necesitan.
texts.en:
Jose is 20 years old and has a 3rd grade education.  He lives with a partner and has a 4 year-old child.  His life partner devotes herself to the domestic chores; she and their child are Jose's only dependents.

Jose has worked for a military detachment for 12 months, but he also works cultivating corn in order to obtain more income for the household.

Jose needs this loan to plant corn and buy agricultural supplies he needs such as fertilizers, sulfates, and other supplies.  This way he can get a better harvest.

Jose's dream is to have the strength, health, and financial resources to give his son the education he deserves and to provide for himself and his partner.

loans.use: to grow corn

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Adjo a 21 ans, mariée et mère  d'un enfant à Adidogomé. Elle fait le petit commerce en vendant des pagnes. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et revend par vente ambulante  au marché de Lomé. Adjo sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Adjo is 21 years old, married and has a child. She lives in Adidogomé. She works as a vendor selling traditional "pagnes" fabric. She stocks up twice a month at the big market of Lomé and sells as an itinerant vendor in Lomé. Adjo is seeking this loan to expand her business and increase her revenues.

loans.use: to buy five sets of traditional fabric.

loans.name: Salima

texts.ru: Салима уроженка района А.Джоми. Она честная ответственная женщина. У нее только школьное образование. Шесть лет назад Салима открыла свой бизнес - откорм-продажу скотов. Сейчас ей в деятельности помогает старший сын. У Салимы четверо детей в возрасте 20, 19, 18 и 9 лет. Ее муж находится на заработках в загранице. Салима хочет улучшить финансовое положение семьи и для этого она собирается расширить свою деятельность, чтобы получить больше дохода. На сумму кредита Салима планирует купить пару молодых бычков. Она нуждается в этом кредите.
texts.en: Salima was born and raised in the A. Jomi region of Tajikistan, and has the equivalent of a high school education.  She is married, and her husband is currently abroad as a migrant worker.  She is an honest and responsible lady, and started her own business six years ago, buying cattle for fattening and reselling them for a profit.  Apart from raising cattle, Salima is a mother, and has four children ages 20, 19, 18 and 9.  One of them, her oldest son, helps her manage the business.  Salima would like to improve her family's financial situation, and is seeking a loan to buy a pair of bull calves to that end.  She needs this loan as it will allow her to expand her business and earn more money.

loans.use: buy a pair of bull calves

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana María tiene 65 años de edad, es casada, muy conocida en el medio, por la labor de crianza y venta de cerdos. Vive en casa propia con su conyuge quien percibe pension de ONP e hijo soltero sin carga familiar. Ella cuenta con buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos, vive en una comunidad ubicada a 42 kms de chiclayo, habitada por gente amigable que se dedica al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia; en la región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Ana María se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, desde hace más de 10 años, ella necesita préstamo para invertir en compra de mercaderia ya que Ana María desea abrir de una pequeña tienda (dulces, abarrotes, entre otros) en su domicilio, ya que cerca de su domicilio no hay compentencia de este rubro y para comprar se debe caminar cerca de 15 a 20 minutos, por ello inversion se nota ser rentable, y esto le generará un mayor ingreso, aumentará sus ganancias y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Ana Maria is 65 years old. She is well known in her area for her work raising and selling pigs. She lives in her own house with her husband who receives a pension from ONP (National Pension Organization), and their single son who has no dependents. She has good references from her neighbors. She lives in a community with friendly people who work in commerce, agriculture and animal husbandry, located 42 kilometers from Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, Northern Coast of Peru. Ana Maria has worked raising and selling pigs for more than 10 years. She needs a loan to invest in buying merchandise because she wants to open a small store (sweets, groceries, among others) in her house, since close to her house there is no competition in this business, and in order to buy one needs to walk around 15 to 20 minutes. Therefore, this investment seems profitable and will generate more income, will increase her earnings and her quality of life and that of her family's.

loans.use: to invest in buying merchandise for a small store (sweets, groceries, among others)

loans.name: Martín

texts.es:
La vida le dio una oportunidad para trabajar como albañil.  Era lo que él esperaba, no sólo una puerta abierta sino lo que estaba detrás de esa puerta.  Y lo que encontró fue algo que definió lo que él quería ser. Sololá se caracteriza por ser una ciudad bien poblada con casas muy bien estructuradas y modernas,  construidas con materiales muy sofisticada. El desarrollo socioeconómico ha sido un factor principal pero también la mano de obra por albañiles y constructores calificados como es el caso de Martin albañil de 31 años de edad con una familia de cinco  hijos, los dos primeros hijos ya tiene familias separadas y los tres últimos son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de su comunidad.
El motivo del por qué solicita otro crédito en ADICLA es por la misma necesidad que lo obliga a serlo para mejorar aun mas las condiciones de vida de su familia ya que tanta falta les hace para tener una condición de vida adecuada.
Antes cuando no tenía acceso a créditos las condiciones de vida de Martin no eran las adecuadas pero gracias a los prestamos que ha hecho en ADICLA a podido mejorar las condiciones de vida de el y la de su familia. 
El uso del segundo préstamo que el está realizando es para la compra de un lote de terreno que se le está ofreciendo, el no piensa desaprovechar la oportunidad que se le esta presentando para dejar un bonito recuerdo para sus hijos.
Gracias al primer préstamo que se le concedió en ADICLA las condiciones de vida de el y la de su familia han mejorado porque ahora ya tienen luz en cada rincón de su casa. Uno de las grandes aspiraciones de Martin es ver que sus hijos sean profesionales en la vida y mejorar aún más las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Life gave Martin the opportunity to work in construction.  This was what he had hoped for, not only an open door but what lay behind the door, and what he found was something that defined what he wanted to become.  

Sololá is known for being a well-populated city with homes that are well-built and modern, built with very sophisticated materials.  The socio-economic development has been the main factor, but also the work of the bricklayers and qualified builders such as Martin.  He is a 31 year-old mason who has a family with 5 children.  The oldest two children already have their own families, and the 3 others are excellent students in the local school.

The reason why Martin is requesting this loan from ADICLA is to further improve his family's living conditions so that they can have an adequate home. Before, when they had no access to loans, Martin's living conditions were not suitable.  But thanks to the loan he got from ADICLA, he has been able to improve these living conditions.

With this second loan, he will buy a lot of land that is offered for sale.  He doesn't want to miss this opportunity to have a nice property for his children to inherit.  Thanks to the first loan he was granted from ADICLA, the living conditions of Martin and his family have improved, because now they have electricity in every part of the house.  One of Martin's greatest aspirations is to see his children become professionals in life and to improve his family's living conditions even more.

loans.use: to buy land

loans.name: Karanjung Lestari 2 Group

texts.en:
With the current loan, Ni Made purchased feed for the sow and the piglets. The sow gave birth to 10 healthy piglets. When the payment time came, she sold all of her pigs and earned a satisfactory profit. She was really happy for that, because during the period, her pigs grew well, free  from diseases, and she could sell them at a high price. The profit can fulfill daily needs, the education of her children, and mostly supports the capital for her business. Now she can renovate her kitchen. She’s very grateful to MUK, KIVA, and lenders for supporting her business. She said she will always need assistance from the loan officer of MUK to give advice and solutions for the business.

The Karanjung Lestari 2 group is borrowing a new loan to purchase a superior quality of piglets and feed, and to repair cages. This pigs business has been shown to supplement the family income.

Because Ni Made already has a sow, she will use the loan to buy two superior piglets for fattening and a superior quality of feed so her pigs can grow fast. She plans to save money to develop the business, for their daily needs are met by her husband. Her husband is very supportive of the efforts made by Ni Made. She hopes all the plans will run smoothly and she can become a successful pig breeder.

loans.use: to buy two superior piglets and a superior quality of feed

loans.name: Katery Beliczabet

texts.es:
Katery Belciczabet tiene 21 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Morropón en casa familiar junto a sus padres, en una zona rural, donde su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, dicho distrito está ubicado en la Provincia del mismo nombre que pertenece a la región de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza Katery Belciczabet es la venta de abarrotes en general así como también vende gasolina, tiene una antigüedad aproximada de 2 años, el negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio. Ella solciita el crédito para invertirlo en su negocio comprando una cantidad mayor de productos ya que las ventas se vienen incrementando y de esto modo atender con mayor cantidad y variedad de productos a sus clientes. La inversión le ayudará a obtener mejores ingresos para su familia mejorando la caldiad de vida de cada uno de ellos.
texts.en:
Katery Belciczabet is 21 years old and lives in the Morropon district with her parents in the family home. This is a rural area where the population works in agriculture, commerce, and animal husbandry.  This district is located in the province of the same name, in the Piura region of the northern coast of Peru.

Katery Belciczabet has a business selling groceries, and she also sells gasoline.  Her business is about 2 years old, and is located in her home.  She is requesting a loan to invest in her business, buying a greater quantity of products, because her sales have been increasing.  This way she can serve her customers by having a greater quantity and variety of products.  This investment will help her to obtain more income for her family, improving the quality of life for each member of the family.

loans.use: to buy more products for her business

loans.name: Annaliza

texts.en:
Annaliza works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishnets and other fishing supplies.

Annaliza has been in this business for 12 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fishnets and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Lita

texts.en:
Lita is 41 years old, married, and blessed with four children. They are currently residing in a rural community managing a small retail store and rice mill. She and her husband help each other in managing their business in order to generate income. 

They aim to improve their business and increase their income to finance the education of their children. Due to inadequate capital, she would like to access financial assistance from KIVA lenders through ASKI amounting to 50,000 PHP to purchase more groceries and materials needed for her rice mill machine. Through this financial assistance, they believe that they will be able to make their business more viable and profitable.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries and materials needed for her rice mill machine

location.town: Brgy. Munguia,Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Rem

texts.en:
Rem is a 47-year-old woman. She has three dependent children who are currently in school, and she also has four married children. She lives in a small village of Pursat Province, Cambodia. In the last twenty-six years, she has been involved in the farming business. She grows rice and sells the crops to the local dealers. She is an active and honest rice farmer who can make a net profit of around USD 5.00 a day.

Rem wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine and buy its materials. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. 

She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine.

loans.name: Cristy

texts.en: Cristy is a single mom of two children. She sells charcoal in her village for a living. She often buys coconut shells in the neighboring villages to produce more charcoal and sells it in bulk in town. She joined GDMPC a year ago and is now borrowing a new loan to buy more coconut shells to produce charcoal for sale. In the future, she wants to buy farmland for her own in order to have a better source of income.

loans.use: to buy more coconut shells to produce charcoal to sell

loans.name: Hugo Fernando

texts.es:
Hugo Fernando tiene 23 años de edad, su estado civil es conviviente, vive en casa familiar en el distrito de Cayalti Provincia de Chiclayo en la Región de Lambayeque, es una comunidad tranquila, en la cual su población se dedican a la agrícultura, ganadería, y comercio.

Hugo Fernando se dedica a la venta de tamales y otros alimentos, él ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles, para la compra de materia prima para elaborar sus productos y para hacer arreglos en su casa(cocina) y de esta manera tener una mayor comodidad para poder preparar sus deliciosos productos que ofrece a su publico consumidor, lo que en un corto plazo se va a ver reflejado en la calidad del producto, por lo cual podrá venderlos a un mejor precio, generandole de esta forma mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias, y por ende una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hugo Fernando, 23, has a partner and lives in the family home in the Cayalti district of Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region  This is a tranquil community where the residents work in agriculture, animal husbandry and commerce.

Hugo Fernando has a business selling tamales and other food.  He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 2,500 Peruvian soles to buy raw materials to make his products, and also to make some repairs to his kitchen.  In this way he can have more comfort when he is preparing the delicious products that he offers for public consumption.  In the short run, this will be reflected in the quality of his products and so he will be able to get a better price for them, generating more income and earnings so that he can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and to repair his kitchen

loans.name: Aniceta

texts.en:
Aniceta is 51 years old and married with six children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell like chips, bread, coffee, eggs, etc.

Aniceta has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and earns an income from fishing.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like chips, bread, coffee, and eggs

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is married with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Cristina is 38 years old and three of her children are in school.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines. Cristina requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net.

Cristina has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Cristina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her daughter’s tuition fee

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a quintal of manure and two sacks of sulfate for his crops

loans.name: Ney

texts.en:
Ney is a 50-year-old woman. She has three dependent children who are currently in school, and she also has seven married children. She lives in a small village of Pursat Province, Cambodia. To make a living and support her family, she grows rice and sells the crops to the local dealers. She is an active and honest rice farmer who can make a net profit of around USD 5.00 a day.

Ney wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine and buy its materials. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. 

She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en: Helen is married with six children and has been helping her husband work in their own service-based business to make a living. It is their main source of income. She keeps on selling snacks in their village to cover their daily expenditures. It is her plan to buy an additional vehicle. For this reason,  she joined GDMPC and borrowed a loan to renew her vehicle registration and licenses. In the future, she wants to improve the general living situation of her entire family.

loans.use: to renew her vehicle registration and licenses

loans.name: Bahtebigim

texts.ru:
Бахтебигим 55 лет. Она в течение 10 лет своей жизни занимается животноводством. Бахтебигим разведена с мужем. Она живет в районе А.Джоми с семьей брата. Бахтебигим также работает уборщицей. А остальное свое свободное время она посвящает своему животноводческому бизнесу. Семья брата тоже помогает ей, так как доход, полученный с купли-продажи скотов является семейным. 
В данный момент Бахтебигим хочет улучшить жилищные условия. Их дом давно не видел ремонта. Поэтому Бахтебигим недостающую сумму просит в кредит, чтобы провести ремонт дома. Она очень надеется на поддержку и обещает выплачивать кредит в срок за счет животноводческой деятельности.
texts.en:
Bahtebigim is 55 and has been raising livestock for ten years. She is divorced from her husband and lives in the A. Jomi district with her brother's family. She works as a cleaner and devotes her free time to her livestock business. Her brother's family helps her, as the income from buying and selling livestock helps the whole family. 

Bahtebigim wants to improve her living conditions. Their house has not been repaired in many years and she has asked for a loan to cover the expenses of repairing the house. She hopes very much for support and promises to pay the loan back on time with the profits from her livestock business.

loans.use: to repair her house and improve her living conditions

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling ready to wear clothing in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock of ready to wear to sell. 

Cynthia has been in this business for five years and earns more income from food vending.

Cynthia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of ready to wear clothing to sell

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion is 40 years old and married with five children, four of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.   

Salvacion has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fish to sell to her customers.

Salvacion has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Salvacion would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en: Juvy is a responsible housewife who supports her husband in gaining income to sustain their family's needs. She is 26 years old and blessed with two children. She operates their motorcycle transport business while her husband works on their farm. She would like to avail herself of a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy the needed parts and accessories for her motorcycle to be able to operate it continuously. Through hard work and strong determination Juvy believes that she will provide a better service to her passengers and generate a higher income.

loans.use: to buy parts and accessories for her motorcycle.

location.town: Brgy. Malasin Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Ivy

texts.en:
Ivy is 34 years old and has four children. She lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She grows vegetables and sells them in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for more than six years and earns well to sustain their living. She successfully repaid her previous loan, used for buying fertilizer.  

To restore the farm's nutrients, she took a new loan recently to purchase organic fertilizer. 

In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer to restore the farm's nutrients.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Lilibeth has been selling food and snacks for seven years to make a living. She has successfully repaid her previous loan used for her business. Lilibeth works hard every day in order to provide income for the family and to show customers her responsibility and reliability to serve. Improving her business is now easier with her access to GDMPC micro finance services. To increase sales, she took a new loan to purchase additional raw ingredients.

In the future, she wants to improve the general living standards of her entire family.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw ingredients

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes tiene 47 años de edad, es conviviente, vive en casa propia, sin carga familiar; vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia; ubicada en el distrito de Saña, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Mercedes se dedica a la venta de alimentos preparados y servicio en un centro educativo de la zona de Saltur. Mercedes necesita el préstamo para invertirlo en arreglos de su casa; con ello tendrá un mejor espacio para la preparación de alimentos y mejorar la atención a sus clientes clientes ya que los comensales disfrutan de los alimentos preparados por Mercedes en su domicilio; y así poder generar ingresos para una mejora en calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mercedes, 47, lives with her partner in her own house, and has no family responsibilities.  She lives in a business, agriculture, and ranching community located in the Saña area of Chiclayo Province in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

Mercedes earns a living selling prepared food and providing service in an educational center in the Saltur area.

Mercedes needs the loan to invest in fixing her house.  She'll have a better space for preparing food and improving her customer service, because her guests enjoy the food Mercedes prepares in her home.  That way she'll be able to earn income to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to fix up her house and have better space for preparing food

loans.name: Azamatjon

texts.ru:
Азаматчон - мужчина 50 лет,женат. Долгое время занимается животноводством. У Азаматчона имеется много коров. Каждое утро он и его семья доят коров и продают молоко на базаре. Это молоко быстро скупается на рынке. Это дает хороший доход семье. Куплей продажей коров тоже занимается сам Азаматчон. Дети конечно же помогают ему в его деле. У него семья очень дружная, дети очень хорошо воспитанные и как сам Азаматчон говорит, "Я все делаю ради будущего своих детей".  
 После откорма коров он каждые две недели выходит на скотный базар и продает корову и взамен  на деньги покупает молодого теленка. На данный момент он хочет увеличить поголовье своего скота но на руках не имеет достаточной суммы. Поэтому Азаматчон обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Он надеется ,что Арванд откликнется на его просьбу и выделит сумму,необходимую для поддержания его бизнеса.
texts.en:
Azamatjon is a married man, aged 50. He has been raising livestock for a long time and has many cows. Every morning he and his family milk the cows and sell the milk at the market. The milk sells out quickly. Azamatjon also buys and sells cows, and of course his children help him with the business. His family is very close-knit and the children were brought up well. As Azamatjon says himself, "I do everything for the sake of my children's future."

After fattening the cows he goes out to the cattle market every two weeks to sell them and uses the money to buy a young calf. He currently wants to increase his livestock headcount but does not have enough money. This is why he turned to MDO Arvand for financial support. He hopes that Arvand will grant his request and lend him the money that is essential to sustain his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 37 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Geraldine is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to purchase additional feed for her pigs.

Geraldine has been pig fattening for four years and earns additional income from her general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for her pigs

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 59 years old and married with eight children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy and sell of nipa roofing in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of nipa to sell.

Elisa has been in this business for 20 years. 

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of nipa to sell

loans.name: Nehemias

texts.en: Nehemias has been offering a service-based business repairing home appliances and other electronic items for eight years, earning for the family. He has successfully repaid his previous loan used for buying accessories. He earns a better income from this business for he always makes sure that the services offered are of good and standard service. Recently, he took a new loan to buy additional accessories and electronic parts. These accessories would help Nehemias improve his business.  Nehemias plans to expand and improve his shop for a better source of income for the family in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional accessories and electronic parts

location.town: Bobongan, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Alvino

texts.es:
Alvino tiene 47 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico, con su conyuge y sus cuatro menores hijos de 07, 03, 04, 02 de los cuales el primero cursa primaria en colegio nacional del distrito de Pomahuaca. Cliente vive por más de 7 años, natural de la zona. La comunidad donde vive Alvino es una zona rural, contando con servicios de agua y luz ubicado en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Alvino es la de realizar trabajos en tractor como chofer asi como también de camión, él cuenta con 15 años de experiencia en el rubro, además se dedica a la compra de fruta, ingresos adicionales que le permiten solventar el credito sin ningún problema. El destino del crédito será para ivertir en su negocio en compra de fruta, con ello le generara mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alvino, 47, lives in his own house (made of rustic materials) with his wife and his four minor children, ages 7, 3, 4, and 2.  The oldest is in elementary school in a national school in the district of Pomahuaca, where Alvino has lived for more than seven years.  He's a native of the region.

Alvino's community is in a rural area in the district of Pomahuaca in Jaén Province in the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru.  He has water and electricity.

Alvino's job is providing service driving a tractor and a truck, and he has 15 years of experience in this line of work.  He also makes a living buying fruit, an additional income that will allow him to pay back the loan with no problems.

The loan will be used to invest in his business buying fruit.  He'll generate more income and be able to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruit to sell

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita is married with three children. She operates a piggery while her husband works as a laborer in their community for a living. For three years running, Teresita is happy to say that this helped her family a lot while waiting for the salary of her husband. She borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro finance to purchase feeding supplies. In the future, she wants to have a better life with her family and plans to expand her piggery to raise more pigs.

loans.use: to purchase feeding supplies

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 49 years old and married with six children, four of whom are in school, Josephine works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, coffee, chips, etc.

Josephine has been in this business for two years. 

In the future, Josephine would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, coffee, and chips

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Juliet works hard to support her family.

She has a restaurant business in the Philippines and earns additional income from pig fattening. Juliet is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy meats, fish, vegetables and other ingredients for her restaurant business.

Juliet has been sustaining her business activities through her past 25 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy meats, fish, vegetables and other ingredients for her business

loans.name: Lenly

texts.en:
Lenly works hard to support her family. Lenly is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional bundles of fishing net.

Lenly has been in this business for 15 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional bundles of fishing net.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca faithfully paid back her previous loan, which she used for her business. She has been operating her own house rental business for more than five years, and she earns well from this. Having a bigger responsibility requires more effort to provide for their needs, especially for her child. The couple had to work hard, with the determination of having better income to provide their child with a better education, which they don't currently have.

To improve her profit, Rebecca would like to apply for a new loan for the maintenance of the boarding house. An amount of PHP 24,000 could already help her in the renovation and beautification of their place so that they could attract more boarders. She will also utilize the loan to add to the capital needed for her buy-and-sell business. She sincerely lets you know her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

In the future, Rebecca hopes to prosper and succeed in her business through all her hard work. She meets up every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the repair and maintenance of her room for rent.

loans.name: Satkiniso

texts.ru:
Саткинисо-женщина 60 лет,замужем. Она в течение долгих лет занимается животноводством. Саткинисо имеет свою маленькую ферму,она содержит несколько голов коров.Каждый день она доит их и продает молоко. Саткинисо после откорма скота,продает их на рынке,и взамен покупает молодых коров, так как у нее и ее супруга есть опыт по откорму скота их легче откармливать, они усиленно кормят специальными комбикормами и добавками, что те по скорее получали вес, ведь в основном ее клиенты покупают коров на убой и мясо.
 Саткинисо обратилась в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой,так как не хочет быть финансово зависимой от своего супруга и детей. Саткинисо хочет сама вести свой бизнес, хотя ее супруг ,дети и внуки поддерживают и помогают ей. Саткинисо надеется,что МДО Арванд откликнется на ее просьбу о помощи и выдаст кредит.
texts.en: Satkiniso is 60 years old and married. She has been raising livestock for a long time and has a small farm with a few head of cows. She milks them every day and sells the milk. Satkiniso fattens cattle, sells them at the market, and then uses the money to buy a young cow. She and her husband have experience fattening cattle and feed them heavily with special formula feed and supplements so that they quickly gain weight, as her customers mainly purchase cows for meat. Satkiniso applied for financial support with MDO Arvand because she does not want to be financially dependent on her spouse and children. She wants to run the business herself, though her husband, children, and grandchildren support and help her. Satkiniso hopes that MDO Arvand will respond to her request for help and give her a loan.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Abelia

texts.en:
Abelia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell dried sea cucumber business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Abelia has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Abelia would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Zulayho

texts.ru: Зулайхо 50-летняя жительница района А.Джоми. У нее среднее профессиональное образование, однако последние 10 лет она занимается только животноводством. Зулайхо живет в районе вместе с тремя сыновьями и невесткой. Ее сыновья занимаются и земледелием и животноводством. Семья Зулайхо в основном выращивает крупнорогатый скот. Зулайхо берет кредит, чтобы увеличить поголовье скота. Она хочет увеличить прибыльность бизнеса и таким образом улучшить финансовые обстоятельства семьи.
texts.en: Zulayho is a 50-year-old woman from the A. Jomi district. She has a specialized high school education, though for the past ten years she has only been raising livestock. Zulayho lives in the region with her three sons and daughter-in-law. Her sons plant crops and raise livestock. Her family mainly keeps cattle. Zulayho is taking out a loan to increase her livestock headcount. She wants to increase the profitability of her business and, in doing so, improve her family's financial situation.

loans.use: to buy and sell cattle

loans.name: Enkhtuya

texts.en: Mrs. Enkhtuya, 30 years old, lives with her husband and two children in Erdenet, the third largest city of Mongolia. She has been working as a quality control specialist at a carpet factory since 2010. Her husband has a position of senior officer where she works. Their elder son goes to high school while younger one stays at home. She is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cement and fiberglass for house renovations. After renovation, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and less pollutants are released into the air.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as bricks, cement and fiberglass to renovate her house.

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es:
Ana tiene 37 años de edad, estudió hasta el bachillerato, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja como agricultor, tiene 5 hijos, de los cuales  2  están estudiando.

Ana actualmente tiene una sala de belleza para ambos sexos, la actividad la realiza desde hace 12 años, aprendió este oficio por medio de un curso de cosmetología, y su horario de trabajo es de 8:00 AM a 5:00 PM.

El dinero del préstamo lo necesita para comprar ganado de repasto ya que en este momento posee un terreno donde tenerlos.


Sus sueños  son darle un estudio superior a sus hijos para que tengan mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Ana, 37, studied up through high school.  She lives with her partner, who works as a farmer.  She has five children, two of whom attend school.

Currently Ana has a unisex beauty salon; her work schedule is from 8 a.m. until 5 p.m.  She has done this work for 12 years and learned it through a cosmetology course.

Ana needs the money from the loan to buy grazing cattle because at the moment she has a plot of land to keep them.

Her dream is for her children to get a higher education so they have better opportunities.

loans.use: to buy grazing cattle

loans.name: Emprendedoras Del Manana Gunior Group

texts.es:
Viviana es una mujer de 32 años de edad, soltera, madre de tres hijos y su negocio es la venta de joyas por catálogo.
Ella es emprendedora, luchadora, responsable, y muy trabajadora su negocio lo realiza de forma ambulante utilizando una serie de catálogos para la venta en la zona sur  de su ciudad. Que es una zona histórica, emblemática, donde se encuentra el emblema de la batalla por la independencia de Bolivia que libraron las valientes mujeres bolivianas "Heroínas de la Coronilla" aquí se realizó la defensa más sublime de la libertad contra el ejército realista español en 1812.
Viviana es de tez morena, cabello castaño largo, estatura mediana, el deseo de cumplir sus metas la ha llevado a formar una banca de personas con necesidades similares para solicitar un préstamo y continuar con sus emprendimientos. (Viviana está de pie a la derecha de la imagen, suéter rojo). Su trabajo lo realiza de forma ambulante, realizando visitas a clientes, oficinas, amistades, etc. Y mostrándoles sus catálogos. Ella sueña tener una tienda grande para la venta de joyas y emjorar la calidad de vida de sus tres hijos, mediante la compra de joyas por catálogo para exposición y venta.
Es por esos motivos que Viviana solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de trabajo y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus tres hijos.
texts.en: Viviana is a 32 year old woman, single, mother of three children. Her business is selling jewelry by catalog. She is enterprising, tenacious, responsible and very hardworking. She works using a series of sales catalogs to sell door to door in the southern area of her city. This is a historical and very symbolic area, because the battle of the Independence of Bolivia fought by the brave Bolivian women "Heroines of the Coronilla", the most sublime defense of the liberty against the Spanish army in 1812, was fought here. Viviana is of dark skin, long brown hair, medium height. Her wish of meeting up her goals has made her join a group with similar needs in order to request a loan and continue with her enterprise (Viviana is standing at the right side of the photo wearing a red sweater). She works as a street vendor, visiting her customers, offices, acquaintances, etc. and showing them her catalogs. She dreams of having a big store to sell jewelry and improve the quality of life of her three children through the catalog purchase of jewelry to exhibit and sell. These are Viviana's reasons to request a loan in order to buy work material and improve the quality of life of her three children.

loans.use: to buy work material and to improve the quality of life of her three children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a motor for his mill.

loans.name: Hikmatullo

texts.ru: Хикматулло выходец из села района Хуросон открывает свое новое дело. Он начинающий предприниматель в возрасте 40 лет. Хикматулло начинает новый бизнес в сфере продаж продуктов питания и считает его прибыльным бизнесом. Хикматулло за счет животноводства и за счет денег, высланных братьями из России, накопил сбережение и построил помещение размером 12х4 для своего магазина. Теперь для купли продуктов питания ему не хватает 1500 долларов США и эту сумму он просит в кредит. У Хикматулло большая семья. У него жена, двое сыновей и дочь, а также вместе с ними живут его старые родители. Хикматулло ответствен обеспечивать свою семью. Начав новый бизнес, он сможет увеличить семейный бюджет и улучшить жизненные условия семьи.
texts.en: Hikmatullo is an immigrant from a village in the Khuroson region who is starting a new business. He is 40 and a new entrepreneur who is going to open a grocery shop, which he believes will be a profitable business. He has been saving money earned through animal husbandry and sent to him from his brothers in Russia and has constructed a 12 by 4 metre area for his shop. Now, in order to purchase inventory, he needs $1,500 USD and this is what he needs a loan for. Hikmatullo has a large family - a wife, two sons and a daughter, and his elderly parents live with them too. He is responsible for caring for his family and, once he has started his business, he will be able to increase the family budget and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy food products to open a grocery store

loans.name: Dildora

texts.ru: Дилдора молодая и трудолюбивая женщина. Она родилась в 1990 году. Дилдора не замужем и живет с родителями. Она 5 лет назад начала свой бизнес предоставлением услуги швеи. Дилдора работает в ателье. Она арендует помещение. Дилдора шьет разновидные платья по новым фасонам. Она хочет купить новую швейную машинку и вышивальную машинку, чтобы украшать платья клиентов разновидными вышивками. Дилдора запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони для покупки швейной машинки и вышивальной машинки. Этот займ будет содействовать развитию бизнеса Дилдоры и таким образом она станет успешной. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Dildora is a hardworking young woman who was born in 1990. She is not married and lives with her parents. Five years ago she started a business offering sewing services. She works in a shop where she rents space and sews many different dresses in the latest styles. She wants to buy new sewing and embroidery machines to decorate her client's dresses with different kinds of embroidery. Dildora applied for a loan of 7,500 somoni to buy sewing and embroidery machines. This loan will help her develop her business and become successful. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy sewing and embroidery machines and increase working capital

loans.name: Yoshimar Jeanneth

texts.es:
Yoshimar es una mujer de 28 años de edad, soltera madre de una hija y su negocio es el comercio de productos naturales para la nutrición.
Ella es emprendedora, alegre, responsable, persistente, conversadora y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona de villa Fátima. Ella finalizó la escuela secundaria y continuo con estudios en veterinaria, no pudo encontrar trabajo en esa área y se dedicó al comercio de productos naturales para la nutrición(soya, chia, avena, quinua, etc.).
Yoshimar es de tez morena, cabello largo castaño peinado a la moda, baja estatura, su lengua natal es el español.
