Su negocio lo realiza en un cuarto decorado como ‘sala de bienestar’, dentro de un mostrador se encuentran todos los productos que ella comercia, dentro de la sala existen sillones que sirven para el descanso de los clientes mientras ella les prepara diferentes; batidos, licuados, mezclas e infusiones para varias funciones como; el stress, antioxidantes, diuréticos, batidos de proteínas, etc.
Su sueño es tener un negocio estable y rentable que cuente con varias ‘salas de bienestar’ en diferentes regiones del país. Ella desea mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su hija incrementando sus beneficios económicos mediante la compra de productos naturales nutricionales por mayor, para abaratar costos.
Es por esos motivos que Yoshimar solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos naturales nutricionales por mayor para mejorar la calidad de vida de su hija.
texts.en:
Yoshimar is a 28-year-old woman. She is a single mother of one daughter, and her business is selling natural nutritional products.

She is enterprising, happy, responsible, persistent, conversational, and very hardworking. She has her business in the Villa Fatima zone. She finished secondary school and continued her schooling in veterinary sciences. She could not find work in that area and sold natural products for nutrition (soy, chia, oats, quinoa, etc.).

Yoshimar is of dark complexion, long brown hair cut fashionably, small stature, and her native language is Spanish. She runs her business in a room decorated as a "well-being lounge" In a display case you can see all the products that she sells. In the lounge there are chairs where her customers can rest while she makes different things for them: milkshakes, smoothies, mixes, infusions for a variety of purposes such as stress, antioxidants, diuretics, protein shakes, etc.

Her dream is to have a stable and profitable business with several "well-being lounges" in different regions of the country. She wants to improve her quality of life and that of her daughter by increasing their economic profits. This will be by purchasing the natural nutritional products wholesale in order to lower costs.

It is for these reasons that Yoshimar is requesting a loan to purchase the natural nutritional products wholesale to improve her daughter's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase natural nutritional products wholesale to sell, thereby improving her daughter's quality of life.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina tiene 41 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 01 hijo menor dependiente, vive con su conyuge en este mismo distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural, de la provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque.

Luz Marina se dedica a la venta de cerveza al por menor con más de 4 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en su domicilio, ella solicita préstamo para compra de cervezas, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor cantidad, y asi atender a todos los pedidos de su público consumidor, lo que le va a generar mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias, y por ende le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is 41 years old, lives with her partner and has a 1 minor child who depends on her. She lives with her spouse inside the Oyutun district in a rural area in the province of Chiclayo, located in the Lambayeque region.
Luz Maria is employed in selling beer retail and has over 4 years of experience in this field. The business is located in her home and she's requesting a loan to purchase beer. This investment will be used to obtain a larger quantity so she can fulfill all of her customers' orders, which will generate more income and thus allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase a larger amount of products (beers) to subsequently sell

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa has been a water distributor in her community for five years, and she earns well from this. She has had to work hard, buoyed by her determination to have a better income in order to provide her children with a better education.

Elsa has repaid her previous loan which she used for her business. To improve her service, she is requesting a new loan for PHP 30,000 to buy additional stocks of mineral water. The more mineral water displayed at her store, the better. She sincerely expresses her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

Elsa hopes for her business to enjoy future growth and for her family to be always happy and have sufficiency in everything. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the word of God that they study.*

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups of 15 to 30  that meet on a weekly basis to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for more stocks of mineral water to expand her product inventory.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
De la señora Rosa no hay mucho pro decir, solo sentir una gran admiración por una mujer de 63 años de edad que diariamente sale con su carrito, empujándolo por las calles vendiendo leche y canela a toda persona que se acerque a comprarle.

Es madre de 3 hijos mayores de edad y nunca les pide un peso, solo sabe trabajar y trabajar y ganarse su vida. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de leche y canecas para tener más capacidad de venta y aunque le pese para ella no es nada pues sabe que gracias a este negocio que empezó hace 9 años puede comer. 

Sueña con expandir su negocio poder vender otros productos lácteos.
texts.en:
There is not a lot to say about Rosa, only to feel a great admiration for a 63-year-old woman who goes out every day with her little cart, pushing it through the streets selling "leche y canela" [rice pudding] to everyone who approaches her to make a purchase.

She's the mother of three adult children, whom she never asks for a penny.  She only knows how to work and work and earn her own living.

She's requesting a loan to buy milk and jugs so she has more sales capacity.

Although it might be hard for her, it's nothing because she knows that she's able to eat thanks to this business she started nine years ago.  She dreams of expanding her business and being able to sell other dairy products.

loans.use: to buy milk and jugs for distribution

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products such as lipstick, makeup, etc.

loans.name: Amilcar Bladimir

texts.es:
Amilcar tiene 26 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está casado y su esposa se dedica a las labores del hogar, aún no tiene hijos por lo que solo una persona depende de él. 

Amilcar se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde y lo ha hecho desde hace 4 años, aprendió este negocio por medio de sus padres pues ellos hacían lo mismo, horario de trabajo no tiene pues se levanta en la noche a darle comida a los pollos. 


El dinero del préstamo lo necesita para comprar mas pollos y materiales para construir una nueva galera.  


Su sueño  es que su negocio de los pollos sea mas grande, tener una vivienda digna para su esposa y sus futuros hijos y está confiando en que lo hará posible con la ayuda de Dios y de los créditos.
texts.en:
Amilcar, 26, studied through high school.  He's married and his wife is a homemaker.  He has no children yet, so only one person is dependent on him.

Amilcar makes a living raising chickens for fattening, work he has done for four years.  He learned this business from his parents, because they did the same work.  He has no work schedule because he gets up at night to feed the chickens.

He needs the money from the loan to buy more chickens and materials to build a new coop.

His dreams are to have a bigger chicken business and to have a decent home for his wife and his future children, and he's confident this will be possible with help from God and the loans.

loans.use: to buy chickens and materials to build a new coop

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda, tiene 35 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 2 hijos, vive con sus hijos en una aldea del municipio de Quimistán, Santa Barbara. Ella tiene una pulpería como su fuente de ingresos donde vende productos alimenticios de la canasta básica. Este negocio lo tiene hace 5 años en su casa y ofrece los productos como ser arroz, frijoles, refrescos, churros, productos de higiene, manteca, pan etc. ha solicitado varios prestamos para mantener activo su negocio, actualmente solicita otro por 20,000 lempiras, y lo invertirá en la compra de productos de limpieza, pan, refrescos, granos básicos, manteca, churros, productos enlatados, jabón, etc. para surtir mas su negocio y mejorar sus ingresos. tiene como meta crecer como  comerciante y que su negocio llegue a ser auto sostenible y darle mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 35 years old, and she is a single mother of two children. She lives with her children in a village in the municipality of Quimistán, Santa Bárbara.  She has a small general store where she sells basic food basket products, and this is her source of income.  She has had this business in her home for five years, offering products such as rice, beans, soft drinks, churros, hygiene products, butter, bread, etc. 

She has requested various loans in order to keep her business active; and currently, she is requesting another for 20,000 Lempiras. She will invest it in the purchase of cleaning products, bread, soft drinks, basic grains, butter, churros, canned goods, soap, etc., in order to stock her business and improve her income.

Her goals are to grow as a businesswoman, for her business to become self-sustaining, and to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning products, bread, soft drinks, basic grains, butter, churros, canned goods, soap, etc., in order to stock her small general store.

loans.name: Erkhchuluu

texts.en: Mrs. Erkhchuluu, 43 years old, lives with her husband and daughter in Kherlen, the easternmost town of Mongolia. She has been teaching literature at a high school for 21 years. Her husband works as a platelayer at a railway company. Their two sons live in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Her elder son works at private firm and her younger one studies at the university. She is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to pay for her younger son's tuition and dormitory fees.

loans.use: to pay for tuition and dormitory fees for her younger son.

loans.name: Charita

texts.en:
Charita has been working with her husband on their own farm for many years to make a living. With her income generated from farm produce, she supports the needs of her four children. 

Planning to improve the farm, she took a new loan recently to purchase planting materials and to cover the costs of weeding. Charita hopes to increase her harvest so as to better take care of her family’s daily needs and to purchase additional farmland as well.

loans.use: to purchase planting materials and to cover the costs of weeding

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn has faithfully paid back her previous loan, which she used for her business. She has been operating her own direct selling business for years, and she earns well from this. She had to work hard, with the determination of having a better income, to provide her children with better education. Having a bigger responsibility requires more effort to provide for their needs, especially for her children.

To improve sales, Marilyn would like to apply for a new loan to purchase additional merchandise to increase her product inventory. At an amount of PHP 30,000, she could purchase more quantities of clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics and other products needed in her business. She sincerely wants you to know her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

In the future she hopes for an increase in her sales and profits, for she desires to give her family a better life. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies and merchandise products needed in her business.

loans.name: Gulnaz

texts.en:
Gulnaz lives in Rawalpindi. She is 42 and a housewife. She is blessed with a son. Her husband is a taxi driver by profession. He is a hardworking person. He works day and night to make sure that his family's needs are met. His taxi needs repair and maintenance due to constant usage, but he does not have sufficient savings for maintenance. 

Gulnaz has therefore requested for a loan from BRAC Pakistan, a Kiva partner, to help her husband pay for the repairs. They are thankful to the Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: To help her husband repair his taxi

loans.name: Levie

texts.en:
Levie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through Kiva partner NWTF in order to buy materials such as gasoline, fishing net and wood for her fishing business.

Levie has been in this business for 15 years. Levie earns more income from rice farming and raising pigs.

Levie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials such as gasoline, fishing net, wood,

loans.name: Simón

texts.es:
Simón tiene 30 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, por motivos de escasos recursos económicos él no pudo continuar con sus estudios, está casado y su esposa trabaja en la casa ya que tiene una tienda de productos de la canasta básica y a la misma vez hace los oficios del hogar, ellos tienen 3 hijos, dos estudian y el otro todavía no y dependen de Simón.

Simón se dedica a realizar diversas actividades productivas, como la agricultura, también apoya a su esposa a atender el negocio que tienen en casa.


Él necesita el crédito para ampliar su negocio y comprar arroz, frijoles, gaseosas, churros, azucar, etc. ya que tienen gran demanda de productos de la canasta básica, y él necesita tenerlo bien surtido para brindarle mejor servicio a sus clientes, también para comprar insumos  agrícolas.


Su sueño es establecer un negocio que le permita satisfacer las necesidades de su familia, de la comunidad, y que siga creciendo para mejorar su situación económica.
texts.en:
Simón, 30, studied up to sixth grade but wasn't able to continue attending school because of limited economic resources.

He's married and his wife works at home, because she has a general store.  She also does the household chores.  They have three children.  Two of them attend school; the other one, not yet.  They are dependent on Simón.

Simón does a variety of productive jobs, such as farming.  He also helps his wife take care of the business they have at home.

He needs the loan to expand his business and buy rice, beans, soda, chips, sugar, and so on.  There's great demand for staple products and he needs to be well stocked to provide better customer service.  He also wants to buy agricultural inputs.

His dreams are to set up a business that will allow him to satisfy the needs of his family and the community, and to continue to grow and improve his financial situation.

loans.use: to buy groceries to expand his business and to buy agricultural inputs

loans.name: Akouavi

texts.fr: mariée et mère avec 4 enfants en charge à 47 ans, Akouavi réside à Adidogomé. Elle vend  des habits. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois à grand marché. Elle revend par vente ambulante à dans les environs de son quartier et à domicile. Akouavi sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
Akouavi is 47 years old, married, and the mother of four children. 

She lives in Adidogomé and sells clothing. She buys new clothes two times a month in the big market. She resells clothing on foot in her neighborhood and out of her home. 

Akouavi is asking for a loan to grow her business so that she can satisfy her clientele and earn more money.

loans.use: buy a bale of used clothing.

loans.name: Chand Mahila Samuha Group

texts.en:
The Self-Help Group of Chand Mahila Samuha is being led by Memun (the lady who is standing with her hand raised). It comprises distinctive and hardworking women members who hail from Rohini, a small village in the Deoghar district of Jharkhand. These members, who run various small businesses, have collectively approached MESP (Micrograam’s field partner) for a loan of Rs. 53,000. 

Memun’s husband does a construction material trading business; he has been doing this business for the last 10 years. He even has a small brick manufacturing unit. Memun has three sons and two daughters. Her two sons are working as painters, the younger son is working as a plumber, the elder daughter has been married, and the youngest daughter is going to school. The family income is not sufficient to meet the family expenses, so Memun planned to take a loan from Kiva to invest in her husband’s business, which will help her to increase her family's monthly income.

The rest of the members need the amount to improve their livelihoods. All of these members have been running their own businesses for a long time now. The loan that they have asked for will help them in increasing their family incomes, and will also help them in planning a better future for their children. This will help them save their income and gear themselves up in case of emergencies. If the assistance they asked for is provided to them, it surely will change their lives. They will repay the loan in a stipulated time frame on a repayment schedule.

loans.use: to improve her husband's construction material trading business

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.ru: Нилуфар умная девушка. Она родилась в 1994 году. Нилуфар студентка 3 курса. Она учится в Медицинском колледже. Нилуфар планирует после окончания колледжа поступить на работу в больнице и работать там медсестрой. Она учится хорошо. Нилуфар не замужем. Она живет с родителями. Нилуфар запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Nilufar is a smart young woman.  She was born in 1994.  Nilufar is a student in her third year of college, and is studying at the medical college.  After completeing college, Nilufar plans to work in the hospital as a nurse.  She is a good student, and is unmarried.  She lives with her parents.  Nilufar is asking for a loan to pay for her tuition.  She awaits your kindness and is relying on your charity.

loans.use: to pay for education

loans.name: Mehrulloh

texts.en: Mehrulloh is a hardworking young man. He is a student of the first course. Mehrulloh was born in 1996. He has grown in a poor family. His father is a migrant in Russia. His mother is a sewer. She sews national women’s dresses and sells them in a local market. Mehrulloh graduated school and has applied to the National University of Tajikistan. Now, Mehrulloh is a student of the first course. He studies at the faculty of Law. He hopes that he is a successful student in the future. He must pay for his tuition, but he has not  the money. He is asking for a loan to pay for his tuition. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to pay for tuition.

loans.name: Chichek

texts.en:
Chichek is 35 years old. She is married with a child. Her child’s name is Nihad, and he is 13. Nihad goes to seventh class. 

Chichek and her husband have been IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) for 21 years from Fuzuli city, and now they are living in Gorgan village of the Fuzuli region.  

Chichek has been in an animal breeding business for 12 years. Today, for supporting her business, Chichek needs a loan in the amount of 2,300 Azerbaijan new manat. With this amount, she is planning to buy three cows.  

Chichek is thankful to the Kiva organization for the help and support. In the future, she wants to build a new stall for the cows.

loans.use: to pay for three cows

loans.name: Elenita

texts.en:
Elenita is a woman who stands out, as she is always searching for any possible way to feed her family. Over thirteen years ago she began working with her husband on their farm to make a living. She thanks God, as the results of her efforts have been very rewarding and her farm production good.

Based on this success, Elenita is asking for a 15,000 PHP loan through GDMPC to buy fertilizer for their farm. She is always looking to the wellbeing of her family and the grace of God.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for their farm.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a married woman and mother of six children from Dulag, Leyte. She runs a sari sari or variety store business selling various goods and items to the people in her area. Caroline's business was ruined when a typhoon hit the country several months ago. 

Now, she is starting to rebuild her sari sari store business. She is requesting a loan to buy additional goods to sell like canned goods, biscuits and snack foods, noodles, soap and toiletries, soda and other beverages. With this loan, Caroline will be able to improve her stocks which will attract more buyers in her store. 

In the future, Caroline hopes of making her business a success and a sustainable source of income. She adds that she wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional goods to sell like canned goods, biscuits and snack foods, noodles, soap and toiletries, soda and other beverages

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 50 years old and blessed with five children. She owns and manages a small variety store in her community, while her husband is a janitor in one of the government agencies. 

To further improve her business, she would like to avail herself of a loan of 5,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to buy more snack foods, canned goods, beverages, seasonings, laundry soaps and soft drinks to resell. She is hoping that this financial assistance will enable her to improve her business someday.

loans.use: to buy more snack foods, canned goods, beverages, seasonings, laundry soaps and soft drinks to resell

location.town: Brgy. Malasin Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Bartolomé

texts.es:
Bartolomé tiene 34 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado, debido a la pobreza que vivía dejó la escuela, está acompañado y su pareja le ayuda en la siembra de los cultivos, tiene 2 hijos que todavía no están en la escuela y nadie mas viven con ellos. 

Bartolomé se dedica a la siembra de maíz, pipían y plátano des de que tenía10 años de edad; oficio que aprendió con sus padres, le agradase a sus padres que le enseñaron ese oficio pues hoy le está sirviendo para sacar adelante a su familia, su día comienza a las  4:30 AM, para llegar al lugar donde cultiva camina 25 minutos, luego laborar 6 horas regresa a casa.     


Él necesita el crédito para comprar 20 sacos de abono, 2 litros de veneno foliar y para comprar 2 galones de herbicidas.


Su sueño es que sus hijos se gradúen en una carrera universitaria, repellar su casa pues es de adobe y
tener unas 2 vacas lecheras.
texts.en:
Bartolomé is 34 years old and attended school until the 9th grade. He left school because of his impoverished living conditions. He has a partner who helps him cultivate crops. He has two children who do not yet attend school and no-one else resides with them.

Bartolomé has been cultivating corn, squash and bananas since he was 10 years old, a task he learned from his parents. He is grateful to his parents for teaching him since today he is using this skill to help his family get ahead. 

His day begins at 4:30 a.m. It takes 25 minutes for him to arrive at his plot, where he works 6 hours before returning home.

He needs the loan to purchase 20 sacks of fertilizer, 2 liters of foliar poison and 2 gallons of herbicide.

His dreams are to see his children graduate from the university, to plaster his house since it is adobe, and to own two milk cows.

loans.use: to purchase 20 sacks of fertilizer, 2 liters of foliar poison and 2 gallons of herbicide.

loans.name: Amy

texts.en:
Amy is 37 years old and married with four children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  

Amy has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more stock of rice to sell.

Amy has been in this business for five years. In the future, Amy would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice to sell.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia works hard to support her family. Lilia is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through Kiva partner NWTF in order to buy fishnets and other fishing supplies.

Lilia has been in this business for 18 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fishnets and other fishing supplies.

loans.name: Ma. Nea

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Ma. Nea works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish selling. Ma. Nea is borrowing PHP 10,000 through Kiva partner NWTF in order to purchase additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Ma. Nea has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Marilou works hard to support her family.

She has a rice selling business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from dried fish and a general store. Marilou is borrowing PHP 11,000 through Kiva partner NWTF in order to  buy more sacks of rice to sell for her rice sellling business.

Marilou has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Akmal

texts.ru:
Акмал добродушный и жизнерадостный парень. Он женат, но пока не имеет детей. Поэтому всю свою душу он вкладывает в свою работу. Акмал живёт со своей женой в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Чтобы прокормить свою семью он занимается своим бизнесом. Акмал занимается деканством и животноводством. У него имеется земельная площадь. Из общей площади земли, некоторая часть земли составляет богарные земли, а остальная площадь это поливные земли. На этой земле Акмал занимается выращиванием моркови, картошки и зерновых культур.Также он работает на мельнице.  А его жена помогает ему ухаживать и растить скот. Так как земельная площадь у них большая, они также пасут на ней своих скот.

Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Акмал хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Акмал заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Akmal is a good-natured and cheerful young man.  He is married, but doesn't have children yet, and so pours all of his efforts into his work.  Akmal lives with his wife in a small home in a rural village.  In order to provide for his family, he runs his own business of dekhan farming and animal husbandry.  He has a plot of land, a small part of which is rain-fed, while the rest is irrigated.  On this plot of land Akmal raises carrots, potatoes, and grain.  He also works at a mill.  His wife helps him to look after and raise the cattle.  Because their plot of land is large, they also graze their cattle on it.  The business of animal husbandry provides a good income, and so Akmal wants to expand his business by increasing the number of cattle in his herd.  For this purpose he turned to Arvand for a loan to purchase cattle.  Akmal thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Christine

texts.fr: Christine a 57 ans, veuve et mère  avec 4 enfants en charge à Adidogomé. Elle fait le petit commerce en vendant des paniers. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois au marché d'Aklakou vers la ville d'Aneho et revend par vente ambulante  dans les environs de son quartier et à domicile. Christine sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
Christine is 57 years old. She lives in Adidogomé and is a widow with four dependent children. 

She sells baskets. She restocks her inventory two times per month in the Aklakou market near the city of Aneho. She resells on foot around her neighborhood and out of her home. 

She is asking for a loan in order to increase her profits.

loans.use: buy 60 baskets.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase supplies for snacks and meals

loans.name: Ajiwika Mahila Samuha Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Mejun (the group leader, standing with her hand raised in the middle), Sahida, Aasma, Tejun, and Sakina are the members of a Self-Help Group named “Ajiwika Mahila Samuha” in the village of Rohini, in the Deoghar District of Jharkhand. These women live with their husbands and children.
 
Mejun has a daughter and two sons who all are studying in school. Her husband is a daily wage worker and earns around 300 INR per day. Mejun is into goat rearing. She has about three goats. In her locality, there is good demand for goat meat, so she wants to improve her farm by adding more goats, for which she is seeking the loan. 

The group needs a loan to improve the potential of the small independent businesses that support their families. This loan will help these five families take a step towards a better life and provide better living conditions for their school-going children. They hope to be able to enjoy a smooth financial situation in the future.

loans.use: to buy goats

loans.name: Eppie

texts.en: Eppie, a 41-year-old mom of five children, has been growing and harvesting rice to sell in town and has had this business for over 20 years. This is the primary source of income for the family. With her generated income, she was able to support her children's education costs. Eppie took a new loan recently to purchase fertilizer and organic pesticides. Eppie is planning to expand her farm, hoping it will flourish and enable her to improve her children's lives.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and organic pesticides

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is married, and she works hard to support her family.

She has a dress-making business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Jocelyn is borrowing 27,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF in order to buy supplies for her dress-making business.

Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF, and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her dress-making business.

loans.name: Harrison

texts.en:
Harrison is a 35-year-old Ugandan married to Mary with whom he has three children between two and ten years old.

Harrison operates a drug shop (pharmacy) at Isunga. He realized there was a need for the service in the area yet there was no service provider. He has been able to earn a profit from the pharmacy and is thinking of expanding it. He does farming to get supplementary income and earns a salary as a police officer.

He has approached Ugafode for a loan of UGX 3,000,000 to buy more drugs for his pharmacy because his plans for the future include construction of a big health centre in the area.

However, he faces the challenges of competition and the high cost of drugs yet his community consists of low-income earners.

loans.use: To buy human drugs to sell in his pharmacy.

loans.name: Abra

texts.fr: Agée de 48 ans  Abra est divorcée et mère de 2 enfants en charge  résidant à Adidogomé. Elle a commencé son petit commerce en  vendant  des sacs écoliers et des draps de lit. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois grand marché de Lomé et revend sous un hangar à domicile.  Abra  sollicite  un crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
Abra is 48 years old and divorced. She lives in Adidogomé and is the mother of two dependent children. 

She started her small business by selling school bags and bed sheets. She restocks her inventory two times per month in the big market of Lomé. She resells in a warehouse and out of her home. 

Abra is asking for a loan in order to grow her business, satisfy her clientele, and earn more money.

loans.use: buy four bags and 14 bed sheets.

loans.name: José Jovanny

texts.es:
José tiene 35 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado, está casado y tiene 3 hijos de 10, 5 y 1 año de edad, los mayores estudian 3ª grado y preparatoria respectivamente, su esposa vende ropa de casa en casa por varias comunidades. 

José tiene 14 años de experiencia en el negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, lo aprendió con su madre y se dedicó a esto ya que no tenía las condiciones económicas para seguir estudiando, para realizar esta actividad debe trasladarse a diversos lugares y vender.


Él necesita el crédito para comprar frutas y verduras y así incrementar el negocio, de esta forma podrás cubrir la demanda de sus clientes y aumentará sus ingresos.



Su sueño es trabajar duro y ahorrar para mejorar su casa  que sus hijos tengan mas privacidad.
texts.en:
José is 35 years old; he attended to school through the ninth grade.  He is married and has three children who are 10, 5, and 1 years old; the eldest are in third grade and preschool, respectively.  His wife sells clothing door to door in several neighborhoods.  

José has 14 years of experience in the business of selling fruits and vegetables.  He learned it with his mother and he started working in this area as he did not have the financial means to continue his education.  In order to carry out his work he has to move to different areas to sell.  

He needs a loan to buy fruits and vegetables to stock his business;  this will allow him to cover his customers' demands and increase his earnings.  

His dream is to work hard and save to improve his house so his children will have more privacy.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to stock his business to he will be able to cover his customers' demands and increase his earnings.

loans.name: Fahriddin

texts.ru:
Фахриддин профессиональный музыкант из района А.Джоми. Ему 32 года. Он занимается музыкальной деятельностью около 15 лет. Его коллектив выступает на свадьбах и других торжественных мероприятиях по выходным. Остальные дни Фахриддин занимается своим бизнесом. У него имеется собственный продуктовый магазин. Он успешно совмещает оба разных деятельностей. 
Фахриддин женатый человек и у него 4-летний ребенок. С ними также живет его мать. Фахриддин талантливый певец, он унаследовал эту способность у своего отца. Сейчас Фахриддин хочет расширить свою музыкальную деятельность. Он запрашивает кредит, чтобы купить звуко-усилительный прибор Dynacord PowerMate. Такой аппарат стоит не дешево, однако он полностью оправдывает свою стоимость за счет качества звучания, надежности и универсальности. Поэтому Фахриддин очень надеется приобрести такую аппаратуру.
texts.en: Fahriddin is a professional musician from A. Jomi.  He is 32 years old and has been working in music for about 15 years.  His band performs at weddings and other special events on the weekends.  On days when he is not performing, Fahriddin runs his own grocery store.  He successfully combines these different careers.  Fahriddin is married and has a 4 year-old child.  His mother also lives with him.  Fahriddin is a talented singer - he inherited this ability from his father.  Fahriddin now wants to expand his music career, and is asking for a loan to purchase the mixer amplifier Dynacord PowerMate.  This device is not cheap, but its cost is fully justified by the quality of sound it produces, its reliability, and its versatility.  For this reason Fahriddien really hopes to purchase this device.

loans.use: To purchase the mixer amplifier Dynacord PowerMate

loans.name: Charito

texts.en:
Charito is a hardworking entrepreneur who has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy additional raw materials like abaca fiber, etc. for her abaca weaving business.

NWTF is listing Charito's business profile for a new loan in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials like abaca fiber for her business

loans.name: Hermine

texts.en: Hermine lives with her family in Stepanavan town in the  Lori region. After graduating from the university a year ago, Hermine started her work as an instructor. She provides individual English classes to her students in her house. She is very kind and, despite her young age, is a very qualified teacher among the locals in the town. She has applied for this loan to ask for financial support to be able to purchase a PC to provide lessons to her students. The loan has been approved within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for a computer to provide lessons to her students

loans.name: Sayda Maria

texts.es:
Sayda no puede contener sus emociones al ver su pulpería y recordar cómo ha ido creciendo gracias a su esfuerzo y al préstamo anterior que tuvo con KIVA y MiCrédito. Ella se siente muy agradecida con las personas que le extendieron la mano cuando necesitaba ayuda con la compra de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, entre otros productos, para poder incrementar sus ingresos. Además, con el mismo préstamo pudo reparar una refrigeradora, dándole la oportunidad de ofrecer un mejor servicio gracias a este avance.
Sayda a sus 36 años de edad es caracterizada por ser una mujer trabajadora, por lo que no deja su visión de seguir adelante. Ya con cinco años de tener su propia pulpería, sabe que va por buen camino, por lo que solicita de un nuevo préstamo para seguir invirtiendo en arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, entre otros productos, que tanto aclaman sus clientes. Su sueño es seguir creciendo profesionalmente para poderser autosuficiente y así brindarles un mejor futuro a sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Sayda cannot contain her emotions when she looks at her small grocery store and thinks back on how it has grown thanks to her efforts and to her previous loan with KIVA and MiCrédito.  She is very thankful to the people who lent her a hand when she needed help to buy rice, beans, and sugar, among other products, to be able to increase her earnings.  She was also able to repair a refrigerator with the same loan, which provided her with the opportunity to offer better services thanks to this progress.  

Sayda, at 36, is known for being a very hardworking woman, which is why she will not let go of her vision of getting ahead.  With her five years running her own small grocery store, she knows that she is on the right track, which is why she is requesting a new loan to keep investing in rice, beans, sugar, and milk, among other products that her customers are always requesting.  Her dream is to keep growing professionally so she can be self-sufficient and thereby offer her two children a better future.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, and milk, among other products

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: mariée et mère avec 6 enfants en charge à 45 ans, Afi réside à Adidogomé. Elle vend  charbon de bois, des produits alimentaires et des condiments . Elle achète s'approvisionne 2fois par mois à marché de Gapé. Elle revend sous un hangar à à domicile. Afi sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
Afi is 45 years old and lives in Adidogomé. She is married and has six dependent children. 

She sells charcoal, groceries, and condiments. She restocks her inventory twice a month in the Gapé market. She resells in a warehouse and out of her home. 

Afi is asking for a loan to grow her business, satisfy her clientele, and earn more revenue.

loans.use: buy three bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Edoh

texts.fr: Edoh a 40 ans, mariée et mère  avec 3 enfants en charge à Adidogomé. Elle fait le petit commerce en vendant des oignons. Elle s'approvisionne 3 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et revend à son emplacement  au marché d'assiyéyé. Edoh sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
Edoh is 40 years old and lives in Adidogomé. She is married and the mother of three dependent children. 

She sells onions. She restocks her inventory three times a month in the big market in Lome. She sells out of her stall in the Assiyéyé market. 

Edoh is asking for a loan in order to increase her revenue.

loans.use: buy one bag of onions.

loans.name: Santos Ismael

texts.es:
Santos tiene 42 años de edad, estudió hasta 6° grado, está acompañado y su pareja trabaja en una tortillería, tiene 3 hijos de 16, 12 y 6 años  de edad, los cuales estudian en la escuela. 

Santos tiene 15 años de experiencia en el cuido de ganado, también trabaja como vigilante en una hacienda, él decidió realizar estas actividades debido a que no pudo encontrar un buen empleo por la falta de preparación académica.



Él solicita el préstamo para  comprar dos novillos, con el cual espera obtener ganancias a futuro.

Sus planes son trabajar mucho para ahorrar y hacer una casa de ladrillo, ya que actualmente vive en una casa de bloque.
texts.en:
Santos is 42 years old; he has a sixth-grade education.  He is in a relationship and his partner works in a tortilla bakery.  He has three children who are 16, 12, and 6 years old who are in school.  

Santos has 15 years of experience caring for livestock.  He also works as a security guard at a ranch.  He decided to do these kinds of work because he could not find a good job due to his lack of academic preparation.  

He is requesting this loan to buy two heifers, which he hopes will yield earnings in the future.  

His plans are to work a lot to save and build a brick house, as he currently lives in a cement-block house.

loans.use: to buy two heifers, which he hopes will yield earnings in the future.

loans.name: Sadullo

texts.ru: Садулло трудолюбивый человек. Он имеет высшее образование. Садулло женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Его жена очень умная и добрая женщина. Она работает в частной организации. Садулло уже более 5 лет является сотрудником Имон Интернешнл. Он является одним из честных и трудолюбивых работником. Садулло всегда старается, чтобы его дети получили высшее образование. Его сын в этом году окончил среднюю школу и поступил в Национальный Университет Таджикистана. Он теперь студент 1 курса факультета Журналистики. Садулло запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора своего сына. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Sadullo is a hardworking man.  He has a higher education, is married, and is raising 3 children.  His wife is a very smart and kind woman, and works in the private sector.  Sadullo has been an employee of IMON International for more than 5 years.  He is one of the most hard working and honest employees of the company.  Sadullo always strives to provide a higher education for his children.  His son finished secondary school this year and started at the National University of Tajikistan.  He is now in his first year and is studying journalism.  Sadullo is asking for a loan in order to pay for his son's tuition.  He awaits your kindness and is relying on your charity.

loans.use: To pay for his child's tuition

loans.name: Jahongir

texts.ru: Чахонгир молодой и энергичный человек. Он в этом году успешно окончил среднюю школу и поступил в Политехнический Институт Технологического Университета Таджикистана. Чахонгир живет в большой семье. Их 6 человек в семье. Его отец трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации, а мать работает в государственном учреждении. Чахонгир должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Jahongir is a young and energetic fellow.  This past year he successfully finished his secondary schooling and started at the Polytechnic Institute of the Technological University of Tajikistan.  Jahongir lives with his large family of 6.  His father is a migrant worker in Russia, and his mother works for the government.  Jahongir needs to pay his tuition, but lacks the funds.  He is asking for a loan to pay for his tuition.  He awaits your kindness and is relying on your charity.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es:
Palino tiene 34 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 02 hijos dependientes; vive con sus hijos y su conyugue en el caserío de Suro, distrito Colasay, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. En dicho caserío la población se dedica a la agricultura siendo el cultivo de Pan LLevar el de mayor producción, a la ganadería y al comercio.

Paulino se dedica a la cría y comercio de ganado vacuno, él cuenta con invernas propias donde cría su ganado vacuno, Paulino se dedica al comercio del mismo, todos los viernes lleva su ganado vacuno que compra en su caserío y los caseríos cercanos para comercializarlos en el Puerto de Chiple, él cuenta con más de 05 años de experiencia en el rubro, además se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de Pan LLevar, cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales, Paulino necesita el préstamo par invirtir en su negocio (comprando una mayor variedad y cantidad de animales) y poder adquirir una utilidad aceptable para que mejore su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Paulino is 34 years old. He has a partner and two dependent children. He lives with his children and spouse in the village of Suro, part of Colasay district, in Jaén Province in the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Perú. The inhabitants of the village are farmers, cultivating primarily basic cereals, as well as livestock owners and merchants.

Paulino raises and sells cattle. He has his own winter pastures where he grazes his cattle. Every Friday he takes his cattle, which he buys in his own and surrounding villages, to sell in Puerto de Chiple. He has had more than five years of experience in this endeavor. In addition he also farms basic grains.

Paulino has very good personal and work references.  He needs the loan to invest in his business (buying a larger variety and quantity of animals) so that he can make a suitable profit and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a greater variety and quantity of animals.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.es:
Rogelio tiene 45 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de su cónyuge; tiene tres hijos en su poder (14, 8 y 4 años de edad), los cuales 2 de ellos estudian en la escuela del Distrito Santo Tomás de Cutervo; Rogelio vive en casa propia de material rustico de un piso en la parte rural de caserío La Unión, mantiene buenas relaciones con los miembros de su caserio y distrito Santo Tomas, provincia de Cutervo, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Rogelio es la cría y venta de ganado vacuno, posee 3 reses de su propiedad, tiene dos has. de inverna donde cría su ganado vacuno, se dedica a la actividad pecuaria hace 10 años y hace cinco años se dedica al cultivo de café 1,5 has. Variedad catimor, plantación de 3 y 5 años de edad; cuenta con mucha experiencia en el rubro, su ganado lo comercializa de manera trimestral los días domingos en plaza de ganado en distrito de Santo Tomas de Cutervo, donde se reúnen criadores, compradores de todo el distrito y sus caseríos para ofertar el buen ganado que posee cliente. El destino del crédito será para compra de una cabeza de ganado y sanidad del mismo, con ello obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rogelio is 45 years old. He has a stable household together with his wife. He has three children in his charge aged 4, 8 and 14 years old. Two of them study at the district school in Santo Tomás de Cutervo. Rogelio lives in his own one story house made from rustic materials in the rural part of the village of La Unión. He maintains good relations with the inhabitants of his village and the district of Santo Tomas, in the Province of Cutervo, Cajamarca Region in the North Andes of Peru.

Rogelio works raising and selling cattle. He has three cattle on his property which has two hectares of pastureland where he raises his cattle. He has been involved in this business for 10 years and has been growing coffee on 1.5 hectares for 5 years. He has Catimor varietal plants aging from 3 to 5 years. He has a lot of experience in the field.

He sells his cattle at sales every three months on Sundays in the livestock corral of the district of Santo Tomas de Cutervo, Cattle breeders and buyers from the villages of the whole district to make offers on the fine cattle that are offered.

The loan will be used to buy one head of cattle and shots for it. From this Rogelio will make more profit and be able to improve his family's quality of living.




L

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras 3 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres Luchadoras 3 está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité, es un grupo nuevo que tiene las esperanzas puestas en poder trabajar para mejorar sus vidas. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, el cual les ayudará a poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lidia, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que debe seguir trabajando para mejorar sus ingresos. Ella quiere emprender en la venta de lencerías, es por eso que pide este préstamo, ya que quiere comprar lencerías varias para poder empezar este negocio y poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The group named “Mujeres Luchadoras 3” (Determined Women 3) is in its first loan cycle with the Committee Program. This is a new group whose members are hopeful that their work will improve their lives. They have taken the poverty elimination survey, which will help them be able to improve their living conditions.

One of the members is Sra. Lidia. Her latest survey indicated that she was at a Stage 1 poverty level. This means that she should continue working in order to improve her earnings. Lidia wants to start a business of selling lingerie, which is why she is requesting a loan. She wants to buy various types of lingerie in order to start this business, which will enable her to help her family.

loans.use: to buy various types of lingerie to sell.

loans.name: Marjona

texts.ru: Марчона добродушная девушка. Она студентка 1 курса Таджикского Государственного Университета Политики и Бизнеса. Марчона с детства всегда мечтала поступить университет и получить высшее образование. В этом году она окончила среднюю школу и реализовала свою детскую мечту. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Ее мать работает в государственном учреждении, а отец трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Марчона запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Marjona is a good-natured young woman.  She is a student in her first year at the Tajik National University of Politics and Business.  Since childhood, Marjona has always dreamed of going to university and receiving a higher education.  This past year she finished her secondary schooling and accomplished her childhood dream.  She is unmarried and lives with her parents.  Her mother works for the government and her father is a migrant worker in Russia.  Marjona is asking for a loan to pay for her tuition.  She awaits your kindness and is relying on your charity.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Percy

texts.es:
Percy tiene 24 años, vive en casa propia de material rustico, es soltero, no cuenta con ningún hijo en su poder, tiene muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad, su comunidad está ubicada en el dsitrito de Cañaris, provincia de Ferreñafe, región Lambayeque, costa nrote de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Percy es la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, con una experiencia en el rubro de 6 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agricolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudara a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto, asi como tambien se dedica a la cria de ganado vacuno.
texts.en:
Percy is 24 years old; he lives in his own home made of rustic materials.  He has no children under his charge.  He has very good personal and professional references in his community.  His community is located in the district of Cañaris in Ferreñafe Province, Lambayeque Region, on Peru's northern coast.  

Percy is in the farming business, specifically growing coffee, with six years of experience in the profession.  He will use the loan he will be receiving on farming tasks, the application and incorporation of pesticide products, fertilizers, and labor for his harvest.  In this way, the loan will help him improve his crop physically, morphologically, and in terms of productivity, and will also provide him with a timely harvest, which will in turn give him a better yield and a better quality produce.  This means he will have no trouble selling his produce.  He also works in livestock, raising cattle.

loans.use: to use in farming tasks, the application and incorporation of pesticide products, fertilizers, and labor for his harvest.

loans.name: Rentsendorj

texts.en: Mr. Rentsendorj, 32 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been transporting goods between districts using his own truck since 2013. Before this, he used to work as a machinist at a road company. His wife is currently unemployed and stays at home, looking after their children. He is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to clean the garbage and repair fences on his newly purchased land. After cleaning and repairing fences, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place. Removing the garbage accumulated during the time of the previous owner of the land will create a more favorable environment for growing vegetables.

loans.use: to remove garbage and repair fences on his new land

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Шахло уроженка района Гончи. Ей 29 лет. Она замужем и живет в доме родителей мужа. Шахло собирается заняться животноводством, чтобы обеспечить себя работой и источником дохода. Таким образом она сможет немного улучшить финансовое положение семьи. Чтобы начать бизнес, Шахло необходимо закупить скот. Для этой цели она просит кредит. Она надеется на поддержку кредиторов Kiva и обещает, что ее бизнес будет успешным.
texts.en: Shahlo is a native of Gonchi, and is 29 years old.  She is married and lives in her husband's parent's home.  Shahlo is preparing to raise cattle in order to provide a job and a source of income for herself.  In doing so she can help in a small way to improve her family's financial situation.  In order to start her business, Shahlo needs to purchase cattle, and for this reason is requesting a loan.  She is relying on Kiva's support and promises that her business will be successful.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to start a new business

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn has been faithfully paying back her previous loan, which she used for her business. She has been operating her own sari-sari (variety) store for four years and she earns well from this. Having a bigger family requires more effort to provide for their needs, especially for her children. She had to work hard, with the determination of having better income, to provide her children with better education. 

To improve sales, Marilyn would like to apply for a new loan to purchase additional grocery goods to sell. With PHP 50,000, she could purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. She sincerely lets you know of her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

In the future, Marilyn dreams of buying her own car ,and she hopes to improve the general living condition of her family. She is an active community partner of Center for Community Transformation (CCT). She meets with her fellowship* group every Tuesday.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages to sell in her business.

loans.name: Sonia Veronica

texts.es:
Sonia vive en Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, ciudad muy conocida por ser comercial y turística. Sonia es una Señora de 29 años, casada y de este matrimonia han procreado 3 hijitos varones uno de 9,7 y 3 años, los dos niños mayores se encuentran estudiando en una escuelita cerca de casa, el pequeño aun pasa con ella. Su esposo trabaja fuera de la ciudad como operador de máquina en el proyecto de la represa Toachi Pilaton, mientras que Sonia cuenta con su pequeño taller de costura a quien lo dedica todos los días de la semana; aprendió de este oficio siguiendo cursos ya que siempre le llamó la atención la costura. Anteriormente contaba con dos máquinas ahora ha crecido gracias a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva, han mejorado sus ventas y ya tiene una señora a quien le paga por prestar sus servicios en la costura; se siente muy feliz ya que su taller está creciendo y está dando trabajo a otros. Incluso gracias a los ingresos de ella junto al de su esposo han podido comprarse su casa propia, pequeña pero acogedora, viven muy felices ya que manejando bien los negocios pueden salir adelante.
Sonia cose uniformes deportivos, camisetas, edredones y vestidos, también hace arreglos de costura, es conocida en el barrio por su buen trabajo. Se siente muy agradecida porque la institución le ha ayudado a crecer como microempresaria, anteriormente le ayudamos con un monto bajo, ahora solicitó un poco más ya que comprará telas y también hilos para incrementar su producción. Sonia está feliz por la atención que le han dado y dice que con esto van a mejorar mucho sus ingresos y así poco a poco terminar de pagar su casa.
texts.en:
Sonia lives in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, a city well known for its commerce and tourism.  Sonia is a 29-year-old woman who is married with three little boys from this marriage who are 9, 7, and 3 years old.  The two older children attend a grammar school close to their home; the youngest is still with her.  Her husband works outside the city as a machine operator on the Toachi Pilaton Dam project, while Sonia has a small sewing workshop that she works at every day of the week.  She learned this profession by taking classes as she has always been interested in sewing.  She used to have two machines, but now she has grown thanks to Fundación Alternativa and Kiva; her sales have improved and she now has a woman she pays for her sewing services.  She is very happy because her workshop is growing and she is providing others with work.  Thanks to her income combined with her husband's they were even able to buy their own small, but cozy home.  They live very happily because by managing their businesses well they can get ahead.  

Sonia sews sports uniforms, shirts, quilts, and dresses, and she also does tailoring.  She is known in the neighborhood for the quality of her work.  She is very thankful because the institution has helped her grow as a small businesswoman.  Previously they helped her with a small amount; she is currently requesting a little more as she will buy fabrics as well as threads to increase her output.  Sonia is happy because of the service they have provided to her and she tells us that this will improve her earnings greatly, which will allow her to finish paying off her home, little by little.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and threads to sew her garments.

loans.name: Ismael De Jesús

texts.es:
Ismael tiene 45 años de edad, por ser de una familia muy numerosa solo estudió hasta 6ª grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a las labores del hogar, tiene 7 hijos pero solo 5 viven en casa y están estudiando, por lo tanto todos ellos dependen de Ismael.


Actualmente, Ismael trabaja en la agricultura, lo ha hecho toda su vida, pues lo aprendió de sus padres, él se traslada 2 kilómetros a pie para poder llegar hasta donde tiene su parcela, 3 de sus hijos le ayudan en el trabajo, horario no tiene ya que regresa a casa hasta que termina de realizar las actividades programadas en el día.


Él necesita el crédito para comprar los insumos necesarios para la siembra de frijol, ya que la cosecha anterior no fue buena por la escases de lluvias.



Sus sueños son ver crecer a sus hijos, darles el estudio que él no tuvo, tener una vivienda digna para su familia, sabe que con la ayuda de Dios y los préstamo lo hará posible.
texts.en:
Ismael is 45 years old. He studied only up to sixth grade as he was born into a very large family. He is in a relationship and his partner devotes herself to the household duties. He has seven children of whom five are in school and live at home, therefore they are all dependent on Ismael.

Ismael currently works in agriculture, he has done it all his life since he learned from his parents. He walks two kilometers in order to reach his plot of land, three of his children help with the work, he has no set hours for work because he returns home only upon completing the activities scheduled for the day. 

He needs the loan to buy the inputs needed to plant beans, since the previous harvest was not good due to the scarcity of rainfall.

His dreams are to see his children grow up, give them the schooling he never had, and to have a decent home for his family. He knows it will be possible with the help of God and the loans.

loans.use: to buy the inputs needed to plant beans.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn has been operating her own computer shop for years, and she makes a good living doing so. She works hard, as she is determined to have both a higher income and a better education for her child.

Jocelyn has taken out and faithfully paid back previous loans through CCT that she used on her business. To continue improving service and her profits, she is applying for a new loan, this one for 50,000 PHP, for computer parts and needed maintenance on her shop.

In the future, Jocelyn wants to buy new appliances for her family and extend her business. She wishes to send Kiva lenders her sincere and heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance.

All CCT community clients are organized into fellowship groups of fifteen to thirty members who meet on a weekly basis. There they share stories of their work, repay microfinance loans and draw strength and inspiration from their study of the Word of God.

loans.use: to buy computer parts and perform needed maintenance on her shop.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Juan tiene 60 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado de educación básica, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 5 hijos de los cuales solo 2 viven en casa y los demás están casados.


Juan es agricultor, toda su vida ha trabajado en la siembra de maíz y frijol, se lo enseñó su padre, él no tiene otras actividades económicas. El lugar donde cultiva está cerca pero se le dificulta llevar los insumos al lugar, trabaja 6 horas diarias.


Él necesita el crédito para comprar abonos, semillas, herbicidas, foliares entre otros productos para sembrar maíz.

Sus sueños son seguir trabajando fuerte para ayudar a su familia, y que sus hijos sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Juan is 60 years old; he has a sixth-grade education.  He is married and his wife is a homemaker.  He has five children of whom only two live at home, with the rest being married.  

Juan is a farmer; he has worked growing corn and beans his whole life.  His father taught him how to do it.  He does not have any other businesses.  The place where he plants is close-by, but it is difficult for him to bring supplies there.  He works six hours a day.  

He needs this loan to buy fertilizers, seed, herbicides, and leaf-absorbed fertilizers, among other products to plant corn.  

His dreams are to keep working hard to help his family and for his children to be respectable people.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seed, herbicides, and leaf-absorbed fertilizers, among other products to plant corn

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en:
Juliana is applying for a loan of $600. She is married and her husband is a carpenter. She has animals at her house like pigs, chicken, goats and cows. She is taking this loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as red onions, noodles, sugar, coffee, salt, Fanta, and other items to sell. 

Juliana started her business in 2013 with working capital of $150. She hopes that as a result of the loan offered by Tuba Rai Metin, she will generate enough profit to open a big store in the future. She is happy with the loan offered to her by Tuba Rai Metin, and with the loan she will improve her business.

loans.use: To buy red onions, noodles, sugar, coffee, salt, Fanta, and other items to sell.

loans.name: Ryan

texts.en: Ryan has five siblings. He is single and lives happily with his family. Ryan wants to become a teacher someday. He works with determination to become successful for he believes that next to hardship is success. He joined GDMPC and borrowed a loan to cover the cost of school tuition fees for the first semester of this current school year. In the future, Ryan wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family and be able to share knowledge in his community.

loans.use: to pay school tuition fees for the first semester.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen is 54, married and the mother of two children. She and her family live in Rawalpindi.

Yasmeen’s husband has a fruit shop in the market near their house. For the past two years he has supported the family with the income he’s gotten from the shop. He sells a variety of seasonal fruits to his customers.

As it is summer, the demand for fruit has increased. Therefore Yasmeen has applied for a 50,000 PKR loan through BRAC Pakistan so her husband can buy more fruit to meet customer demand. He wants to make sure that he does not run out of produce and so lose customers.

Yasmeen and her husband are grateful to Kiva lenders and hope to build a better future for their family.

loans.use: To help her husband buy more fruit for his fruit shop.

loans.name: Lucas

texts.es:
Lucas tiene 55 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos los cuales ninguno vive con ellos pues formaron sus propios hogares.

Lucas  agricultor desde hace 38 años, antes de dedicarse a esta labor trabajaba como seguridad en la ciudad, además Lucas realiza viajes con un pick up que posee,  y trabaja 6 horas al día en el campo.


Él necesita el crédito para comprar una bomba fumigadora para regar su cultivo, además comprará abonos y otros fertilizantes.

Su sueño es obtener sus propios instrumentos de trabajo para el cultivo como bombas fumigadoras, aperos, tractor, entre otros.
texts.en:
Lucas is 55 years old.  He studied through sixth grade.  He is married and his wife takes care of domestic chores.  He has three children who all have their own homes, so don't live with him.

Lucas has worked as a farmer for 38 years.  Before he did this work, he worked in security in the city.  Lucas also takes trips with a pickup that he owns and works for six hours a day in the fields.

He needs this loan to purchase a fumigator pump to irrigate his crops and to purchase manure and other fertilizers.  His dream is to own his own work tools for his crops such as fumigators, agricultural tools, a tractor, and others.

loans.use: to purchase a fumigator pump to irrigate his crops and to purchase manure and other fertilizers.

loans.name: Blanca Leonor

texts.es:
La Señora Blanca forma parte del grupo de crédito Las Triunfadoras, este grupo está conformado por amigas quienes día a día luchan para sacar adelante a sus familias y lo logran con el apoyo de todas las socias. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad desde Diciembre de 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad gracias a la belleza arquitectónica, su gente es muy amable y gentil, son personas que mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
La Señora. Blanca tiene 37 años de edad, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos, dos de ellas son casadas y viven independientes, sus tres hijos menores tienen 12, 8 y 5 años y están estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad, su esposo labora en el extranjero y les ayuda económicamente, la casa en la que viven es propia.
Doña Blanca se dedica a la venta frutas y verduras de lunes a sábados sin un horario fijo, en su casa se dedica a la cría de ganado, pollos, cuyes y credos, también a la agricultura que es para la venta y para su hogar. El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de frutas de temporada. Su meta es tener una tienda en su casa.
texts.en:
Blanca is part of the credit group Las Triunfadoras, which is made up of friends who struggle every day to move their families forward and achieve it with the support of all the members.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, which has been a Word Heritage Site since December 1999 thanks to its beautiful architecture.  Its people are very friendly and gentle and they maintain the culture and traditions of their ancestors.  

Blanca is 37 years old, married, and has five children.  Two of her children are married and live independently.  Her three youngest children are 12, 8, and 5 years old and study at a school in the city. Her husband works abroad and helps her financially.  She owns the house they live in.

Blanca works selling fruits and vegetables from Monday to Saturday without a fixed schedule.  She also raises livestock, chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs in her home for sale and for her household.  She will use the loan to invest in the purchase of seasonal fruits.  Her goal is to have a store in her home.

loans.use: to purchase fruits.

loans.name: Davaadulam

texts.en: Mrs. Davaadulam is 56 years old and lives with her son and daughter-in-law in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. She has been working as a receptionist at a hotel for three years. Her son works as a goods loader at a beverage factory. Her daughter-in-law is a sorter of goods at a food factory. The house they live in has been deteriorating over the years and it needs some repair. So she is requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cement and fiberglass. After renovation, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place. They will burn less coal for heating and release less pollutants into the air.

loans.use: to buy building materials in order to renovate her house.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago tiene 36 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 04 hijos dependientes, vive con sus hijos y su conyugue en el caserío de Suro, distrito Colasay, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. En dicho caserío la población se dedica a la agricultura siendo el cultivo de Pan LLevar el de mayor producción, a la ganadería y al comercio.

Santiago se dedica a la cría y comercio de ganado vacuno, hace más de 10 años; necesita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de ganado vacuno, para engordarlo y luego venderlo, pues con la compra de ganado podrá obtener mayores ganancias y con esto mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Santiago, 36, lives with his partner and has four dependent children.  He lives with his children and spouse in the village of Suro in the district of Colasay, Jaén Province, in the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru.  The people of that village work in agriculture, especially farming basic grains; in ranching; and in commerce.

Santiago has earned a living raising and selling dairy cattle for more than 10 years.  He needs the loan to invest in buying dairy cattle to fatten and sell.  With the purchase of cattle he'll be able to earn more profit and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy dairy cattle

loans.name: German Antonio

texts.es:
German  tiene 21 años de edad, estudió bachillerato en mecánica automotriz, está casado desde hace 2 años  su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene un hijo  que está pequeño por lo tanto solo dos personas dependen de German.


 German es electricista, ya tiene 4 años de dedicarse a esta labor, él estudió un poco acerca de este trabajo pero fue un tío quien le enseñó todo sobre la labor.
Decidió realizar esta actividad por la necesidad de mantener a su familia, también en el tiempo que no está trabajando de electricista se dedica a la agricultura y es otra forma de la cual obtiene un ingreso. En el trabajo se involucra su esposa, el horario en que lo hacen es de 6 a 7 horas diarias.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar equipo para desempeñar el trabajo de electricista, comprará una pulidora, taladro y un equipo para soldar, esto le permitirá estar mejor preparado para desempeñar su trabajo. 

Sus sueños son lograr algún día poner su propia compañía de servicio eléctrico, pues es una labor  bastante demandada que le sirve para mantener a su familia, sueña también con que sus hijos logren sacar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
German, 21, studied body repair mechanics in high school. He has been married for 2 years, his wife works as a housewife and they have a young son. German's wife and son are the only two people who depend on him. 
German is an electrician and has worked as such for 4 years. He studied a little about the trade but it was an uncle who taught him everything. He chose to do this activity because he needed to support his family. When he is not working as an electrician, he works as a farmer to earn extra income with the help of his wife. They work on this 6-7 hours per day.
German needs the loan to purchase equipment for his job as an electrician. He will buy a polisher, a drill and soldering equipment. This will allow him to be better prepared to do his job.
His dreams are to open his own electrical service company some day, because it is a business in high demand that allows him to support his family. He also dreams that his children will get a university degree.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for his work as an electrician. He will buy a polisher, a drill and soldering equipment.

loans.name: Dalia Maritza

texts.es:
La Señora. Dalia forma parte del Grupo de crédito Las Triunfadoras desde hace 2 años, tiempo en el que ha fortalecido la amistad con cada una de sus compañeras. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad desde Diciembre de 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad gracias a la belleza arquitectónica, su gente es muy amable y gentil, son personas que mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
La Señora. Dalia tiene 38 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos de 16, 12 y 7 años, sus dos primeros hijos se encuentran en el colegio, y último hijo en la escuela, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando. 
Doña Dalia se dedica al cuidado de sus hijos pero para solventar los gastos de su casa se dedica a la cría de pollos a los que los vende en pie y algunos pelados. Su crédito es para ampliar su galpón de pollos y continuar creciendo en esta actividad. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Dalia has been a member of the Las Triunfadoras credit group for two years, in which time she has strengthened her friendship with each of her partners.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, which has been a World Heritage Site since December 1999 thanks to its beautiful architecture.  Its people are very kind and gentle and they maintain the culture and traditions of their ancestors.

Dalia is 38 years old and she is a single mother to three children who are 16, 12, and 7 years old.  Her two older children are in high school and her younger child attends school.  She does not own a house, so they rent.

Dalia is dedicated to caring for her children, but in order to meet the household expenses, she raises chickens which she sells on foot.  This loan will be use to expand her chicken shed and continue growing her business.  Her dream is to own her own home.

loans.use: to expand her chicken shed.

loans.name: Johanna Karina

texts.es:
La Señora Johanna forma parte del grupo de crédito Las Triunfadoras. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad desde Diciembre de 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad gracias a la belleza arquitectónica, su gente es muy amable y gentil, son personas que mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
La Señora. Johanna tiene 23 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido un hijo de 1 años de edad, su esposo es comerciante, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
Doña Johanna se dedica al comercio informal, vende una gran variedad de uniformes, cobertores, cobijas y mas artículos, esta actividad la realiza hace un año, también se encuentra cursando los estudios universitarios, está en tercer año de Contabilidad. El dinero de su crédito es para comprar cobijas, cobertores y uniformes para continuar creciendo en este negocio. Su meta es ser una profesional y crecer más en el negocio.
texts.en:
Johanna, 23, is part of Las Triunfadoras Communal Bank.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, a World Heritage Site since December 1999 thanks to its architectural beauty.  The people there are very friendly and nice, and they preserve the culture and traditions of their communities.

Johanna lives in a common-law relationship and has one child, age 1.  Her husband's a merchant.  They don't have their own house, so they rent.

Johanna earns a living in the informal sales sector.  She sells a wide variety of uniforms, quilts, blankets, and other items.  She has done this job for a year.  She's also taking classes in the university; she's in her third year of accounting.

The money from her loan is to buy blankets, quilts, and uniforms to keep growing with this business.

Her goal is to be a professional and grow more in her business.

loans.use: to buy blankets, quilts, and uniforms

loans.name: Soka

texts.en:
