Soka is 32 years old and a mother of two little children who are currently in school. She lives in a small village of Kampong Speu province, Cambodia. Over the last 14 years, she has been involved in farming, growing rice and selling the crops to local dealers. She is an active and honest rice farmer.
Soka wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Estrella works hard to support her family.

She has a photo lamination business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  Estrella is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her photo lamination business.

Estrella has sustained her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her photo lamination buisness

loans.name: Merardo

texts.es:
El Sr. Merardo tiene 61 años, es comerciante y tiene una despensa muy bien surtida en su casa, comenta que tiene muy buena clientela que siempre compra de el los productos que tiene.
Es un Sr. Muy trabajador que está luchando por poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida e ir mejorando sus ingresos. 
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos de primera necesidad como ser bebidas, comestibles, verduras, frutas, etc. Él agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Sr. Merardo, age 61, is a merchant who has a well-stocked food pantry in his house. He says that he has good customers who always buy the products that he offers. Merardo is a very hard worker who is striving to improve his living conditions and his earnings.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy basic necessity products such as beverages, foodstuffs, vegetables, fruits, and other items. Merardo is grateful for the opportunity he has received so that he can keep growing.

loans.use: to buy beverages, foodstuffs, vegetables, fruits, and other products.

loans.name: Mujeres Paraguayas Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mueres Paraguayas; es un grupo nuevo que está con muchas esperanzas de poder ayudarse las unas a las otras por medio del trabajo unido de todas. 
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cristina; quien a través de su esfuerzo y por medio de las ventas varias de artículos de mercería que hace de manera ambulante es que está saliendo adelante.
La Sra. Solicita este préstamo para la compra de ropas, remeras, pantalones, bermudas entre otros; lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called Mujeres Paraguayas is a group that really hopes to be able to help themselves and each other through the united work of all of them. One of the members is Cristina. Through her hard work and by selling various items of merchandise as as street vendor, she is getting ahead. 

She is asking for this loan to buy clothes, t-shirts, pants, shorts, and more. This will help her firm up her business plan, which will help improve her income.

loans.use: to buy clothes, t-shirts, pants, shorts and more.

loans.name: Nuevo Florecer  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Nuevo Florecer esta formado por 10 socias y 2 socios quienes viven en los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad esta bañada por 4 ríos los que le dan el nombre de Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, su centro histórico es una mezcla de la arquitectura moderna y colonial. Su gente es amable que aun mantienen su cultura y tradiciones, su vestimenta es muy colorida la que le da vida y color a sus calles, son personas trabajadoras que luchan el día a día para mejorar su economía y sacar adelante a sus familias.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Deifilia, tiene 47 años de edad, está divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 22 y 7 años, su primer hijo trabaja y le ayuda en la económicamente, su segundo hijo está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
Doña Deifilia se dedica a la venta ambulante de helados y jugos, esta actividad la realiza de domingo a domingo sin un horario, también trabaja limpiando casas y lavando la ropa. El dinero de su crédito es para comprar helados y jugos. Su meta es tener una tienda y  una casa propia.
texts.en:
The Nuevo Florecer credit group is made up of 10 women and 2 men who live in the surrounding area of the city of Cuenca. This city is bathed by four rivers  and is called Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos. Its historic center is a mixture of modern and colonial architecture. Its people are friendly and still maintain their culture and traditions. Their clothing is colorful and gives life and color to the streets. Its people are hardworking and they fight day to day to improve their economy and get their families ahead.

One of the members of this group is Deifilia. She is 47 years old. She is divorced and has 2 children from her marriage, aged 22 and 7. Her oldest son works and helps her financially. Her younger son goes to a little school in the city. She does not own her own home and rents. 

Deifilia works as a street vendor, selling ice cream and juices. She does this activity Sunday to Sunday with no schedule. She also works cleaning houses and washing houses. The money from her loan is to buy ice cream and juices. Her goal is to have a store and a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy ice cream and juices.

loans.name: Bella

texts.en:
Bella is 61 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 30,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of goods to sell, such as spices, noodles, egg, milk, sugar, etc.

Bella has borrowed and repaid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running her general store for five years and also earns an income from buying and selling charcoal.

Bella aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of goods to sell, such as spices, noodles, egg, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Srouy

texts.en:
Srouy is a 24-year-old married man with one little child. He lives in a community of Kampong Speu province, Cambodia. He is a farmer on a small farm, which is located near his house. On his farmland, he grows rice and sells the crops to the local dealers and customers at the local market. He has been in this career for four years. 

Srouy wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in his house now. Therefore, he is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, he can help his family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. He is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Nueva Esperanza se llama este grupo, está en su ciclo uno, es un grupo nuevo que pone ese nombre al grupo, ya que es una nueva esperanza para todas para poder mejorar sus vidas.
Leticia es integrante de este grupo, ella se dedica a hacer comidas variadas, que luego sale a vender de manera ambulante. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que está luchando por poder salir adelante y ayudar a su familia.
Leticia pide este préstamo para la compra de harinas, aceites, leches, entre otros; lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, y seguir con la venta de sus comestibles. Agradecen por esta oportunidad que están recibiendo de mejorar sus vidas.
texts.en:
The name of this group is Nueva Esperanza, It is in its first cycle. It is a new group giving itself that name, because it is a new hope for all of them to improve their lives. 

Leticia is a member of this group. She works making different foods that she then goes out to sell as a street vendor. She is a very hardworking person who is fighting to get ahead and help her family. Leticia is asking for this loan to buy flour, oil, milk and more. This will help her to firm up her business plan and continue to sell her food. They are grateful for this opportunity they are receiving to improve their lives.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, milk and more.

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen del Carmen está en su decimo ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas también están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza y a través de ella podrán conocer la situación de vida de cada una.
Erodita es integrante de este grupo, se dedica a la confección variada, es muy buena en lo que hace y es reconocida en el barrio por su trabajo. Es una luchadora y emprendedora mujer que quiere ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo y sacrificio. Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar telas e hilos en cantidad, ya que a través de ello podrá seguir con su trabajo, luchando por un futuro mejor.
Todas están muy agradecidas por la oportunidad de vida que reciben.
texts.en:
The group called Virgen del Carmen is in its tenth cycle of the women's committee program. They are also doing the poverty elimination survey and with they can come to know the situation of each of them.  

Erodita is a member of this group. She works doing different types of sewing. She is very good at what she does and known in the neighborhood for her work. She is a fighter and and and entrepreneurial woman who wants to help her family through her work and sacrifice. She is asking for this loan to buy large quantities of fabric and thread. With this, she will be able to continue with her work, fighting for a better future. 

All of them are very grateful for the opportunity they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread to use for sewing.

loans.name: San José  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal San José está formado por 13 socias y 1 socio quienes viven por los alrededores de la parroquia Santa Ana en Cuenca, este lugar es de clima frió y tiene hermosos paisajes, desde el parque central se puede observar gran parte de la ciudad de Cuenca. Su gente se dedica a la agricultura, cría de animales y comercio, mucha de su gente labora en la ciudad en diferentes cargos, se caracterizan por su hospitalidad, amabilidad y por mantener viva las costumbres y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Carmen, tiene 20 años de edad, es casada y aun no tiene hijos, su esposo labora como albañil, la casa en la que viven es propia.
Doña Carmen se dedica a los quehaceres de su casa y también a las labores del campo, cría pollos a los que los vende pelados y algunos en pie, la cosecha de la agricultura es para su casa y para la venta. El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en comprar pollos y ampliar su galpón de pollos. Su meta es  ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
San José Communal Bank is made up of thirteen women and one man who live in the area of Santa Ana Parish in Cuenca.  The area has a cold climate and beautiful scenery; much of the city of Cuenca can be seen from the main park.  The residents work in agriculture, raising animals, and commerce.  Many of the people work in the city in various jobs.  They're known for their hospitality and friendliness, and for keeping alive the customs and traditions of their communities.

One of the members of this bank is Carmen, 20.  She's married and has no children yet.  Her husband works in construction.  The house they live in is their own.

Carmen works in the home and in the field.  She raises chickens that she sells plucked or, sometimes, alive.  The harvest from the farm is for home consumption and to sell.

She's going to invest the money from her loan in buying chickens and expanding her chicken coop.

Her goal is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy chickens and to expand her chicken coop

loans.name: Presentacion

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KOSÑIPATA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Maranura, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Presentacion se dedica al negocio de venta de frutas, la socia vende platanos,cafe,mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar  frutas como piñas,platanos,cafe,mandarinas y naranjas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Presentacion is a member of the Communal Bank “Kosñipata” which is located in the District of Maranuara in La Convención Province, Department of Cusco. She manages her business of selling fruit. Presentacion sells bananas, coffee, tangerines, and oranges. She works from 8:00 A.M. to 7:00 P.M. Presentacion has been in business for several years and is doing very well. Her dream is to expand her land on which she grows crops.

Presentacion is requesting a loan in order to buy fruits such as pineapples, bananas, tangerines, and oranges, as well as coffee. She is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy pineapples, bananas, tangerines, and oranges, as well as coffee.

loans.name: Juleta

texts.en: Juleta lives in Suai. She is requesting a loan of $600 to improve her business. She sells petrol and gasoline. She started selling petrol and gasoline in 2006 with her own working capital of $16. She earns a good income from this business. She lives near the main road, so many people come to buy her petrol and gasoline every day. She is happy with the loan offered by Tuba Rai Metin. With this loan, she will improve her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy petrol and gasoline.

loans.name: Tursunoy

texts.ru: Турсуной живет вместе со своей семьёй в отдаленном регионе, далеко от города, среди высоких таджикских гор. Турсуной родилась в 1985 года. Она замужем и имеет 2 детей. Детям 3 и 5 лет. Ее муж строитель. Турсуной занимается скотоводством. Она в основном откармливает мелко-рогатый скот. Турсуной откармливает бараны несколько месяцев и продает на местном рынке. Она этим бизнесом занимается уже более 4 года. Ее муж помогает ей введению бизнеса. Она хочет увеличить оборотный капитал и увеличить доход.  Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони для покупки мелко-рогатого скота. С полученного дохода она будет улучшать условия проживания своим детям. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Tursunoy lives with her family in a remote area, far from the city, among the tall Tajik mountains.  Tursunoy was born in 1985.  She is married and has 2 children, who are 3 and 5 years old.  Her husband is a construction worker.  Tursunoy works in animal husbandry and raises primarily small-horned cattle.  Tursunoy fattens sheep for several months and then sells them at the local market.  She has been working in this business for over 4 years.  Her husband helps her to run the business.  She wants to increase her working capital and her income, and is thus asking for a loan of 7500 TJS to purchase small-horned cattle.  With the income she receives she will improve the living conditions of her children.  She awaits your kindness and is relying on your charity.

loans.use: To buy cattle to increase her working capital

loans.name: Maximiliano

texts.es:
Maximiliano hoy tiene cuatro hijos, es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, que procura para poder ayudar a sus hijos y a sus seres queridos. Es mecánico y comenta que le esta yendo muy bien ya que tiene muy buena clientela, quiere poder seguir creciendo, y es por ello que esta esforzándose cada día mas.
Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en comprar repuestos, y hoy quiere comprar una maquina hidráulica para usar en su taller.
texts.en:
Maximiliano now has four children.  He's a very hardworking and persevering person who tries to to be able to help his children and loved ones.

He's a mechanic and he said it's going very well for him because he has very good customers.  He wants to be able to keep on growing, so he's making an effort more every day.

Maximiliano said he used his previous loan to buy spare parts.  Now he wants to buy a hydraulic machine to use in his garage.

loans.use: to buy a hydraulic machine

loans.name: Fayzullohuja

texts.en:
Fayzullohuja is 18 years old. He wants to get higher education and has applied to university. Now, he is a first year student in the Finance and Credit faculty. Fayzullohuja is a smart young man who graduated school with excellent marks. Fayzullohuja often goes to the library and reads many books. 

Fayzullohuja dreams to be a successful specialist after graduating university. He is asking for a loan to pay for tuition. He awaits your mercy and generosity.

loans.use: to pay for tuition.

loans.name: Johanna Josefa

texts.es:
El final de una etapa para Johanna, significó un giro muy importante en su vida, ya que la ayudó a emprender con un negocio propio. Hace seis años, esta mujer luchadora se separó de su trabajo tradicional, para entrar a una puerta que le proporcionara ingresos mientras no tuviera un trabajo, esa puerta fue la venta de comida y refrescos. Actualmente es muy reconocida en su barrio por el buen servicio que ofrece, avance del cual se siente muy agradecida con KIVA, MiCrédito y con todos los que le prestaron anteriormente para comprar el arroz, la carne de cerdo y las verduras. Materiales que le ayudaron a esta mujer de 30 años de edad, quien sonriente y orgullosa de ella misma, nos cuenta que esto significa gran parte de su crecimiento personal y profesional.
Johanna llegó hasta quinto año de la secundaria, pero siempre ha trabajado para salir adelante, por lo que ha tenido una visión clara de su futuro. Ella sueña con llegar a tener un restaurante completo y llegar a otros barrios con su negocio, pero antes necesita trabajar fuerte, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar leche y nacatamales para vender todos los fines de semana. Afortunadamente cuenta con el apoyo de su mamá y sus ingresos trabajando en un hotel.
texts.en:
The end of a period for Johanna meant an important change in her life, because it helped her to start her own business. Six years ago, this striving woman left her traditional work to open a door that would provide income while she was out of a job. That job was the sale of food and beverages. Now she is well recognized in her neighborhood for the good service that she provides. She is very grateful for the help she received from Kiva and the field partner, MiCredito, and from all the lenders who lent her the money previously to buy rice, pork meat and vegetables. The supplies helped this 30-year-old woman. who, smiling and proud of herself, explains that this is a big part of her personal and professional growth.
Johanna attended fifth year of secondary school but has always worked to get ahead and she has a clear vision for her future. Her dream is to own a full restaurant and to reach other neighborhoods with her business, but before that, she needs to work hard. That is why she is asking for a loan to buy milk and nacatamales [a kind of Nicaraguan tamal consisting of corn, meat and rice wrapped in a banana leaf] to sell every weekend. Fortunately, she has the support from her mum and her income from working at a hotel.

loans.use: to purchase milk and nacatamales, a Nicaraguan dish similar to a tamale.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 40 years old and unmarried.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through Kiva partner NWTF in order to buy items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc. 

Marites has borrowed and repaid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Marites aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru:
Дилбар жительница Спитаменского района. Дилбар добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 40 лет.  В связи с семейными обстоятельствами ее личная жизнь не сложилась и она развелась. После неудачного брака она не вышла замуж,  и детей у нее нет.  Но не смотря на это она очень любит своих племянников и с любовью воспитывает их все свое свободное время посвящает им. 
Сама Дилбар торгует на рынке, она продает национальные лепешки. Лепешки Дилбар привозит с города , а иногда когда заказов много она их пикет сама в домашних условиях. Ей свое занятие очень нравиться. Спрос на национальные лепешки растут день за днем и клиенты у Дилбар умножаются вместе с ними. Особенно летом, когда свадебных мероприятии проводятся часто, почти что каждый день. В связи с этим Дилбар хочет умножить количество продажи лепешек, но ей для товарооборота немного не хватает денежных средств. Поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд за кредитом. На полученный кредит хочет купить продукты для изготовления лепешек. Она очень надеется на поддержку организации и заранее выражает свои благодарности Арванд.
texts.en: Dilbar lives in the Spitamen region.  Dilbar is a kind and hard-working woman of 40.  Because of her family's circumstances her personal life didn't work out, and she got divorced.  After her unlucky marriage, she didn't remarry, and has no children.  Despite all this, she loves her nephews and with love raises them and spends all her free time with them.  Dilbar is a vendor at the market, and sells Tajik cakes.  Dilbar ferries these cakes from the city, but when there are many orders she bakes them herself at home.  She really enjoys her work.  Demand for the Tajik cakes grows day by day, and Dilbar's clientele is multiplying with the demand.  Especially in summer, when weddings are frequent, demand is high almost every day.  Because of this, Dilbar hopes to multiply the number of sales of cakes, but lacks sufficient funds to support such high turnover.  For this reason she turned to Arvand for a loan to purchase items to make cakes.  She is relying on the support of the organization and in advance expresses her gratitude to Arvand.

loans.use: to purchase products to make cakes

loans.name: Lapacho Florido Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Lapacho florido está realizando la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde algunas de las integrantes están por debajo de la encuesta de eliminación, y deben esforzarse un poco más por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de ellas es la Roberta, quien en su encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, donde para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida, fue capacitada para realizar la venta de cosméticos en su barrio para generar más ingreso y no descuidarse ya que tiene niños pequeños y quiere poder darles una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de cosméticos, ya que de esa forma podrá emprender esta actividad que le ayudará a su familia.
texts.en:
Lapacho Florido Group is completing the poverty-elimination survey, in which some of the members are below the elimination line and must make more of an effort to improve their living conditions.

One of them is Roberta, who showed a level of one in her survey.  To be able to improve her living conditions, she was trained to sell cosmetics in her neighborhood to earn more income and to not neglect herself.  She has small children and she wants to be able to give her family better living conditions.

She's requesting this loan to buy cosmetics so she'll be able to start this job that will help her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of cosmetics

loans.name: Freddie

texts.en:
Freddie is 24 years old and married. They are currently residing in a rural community. He aims to earn and save more income to sustain their daily necessities and save some for future emergencies. Aside from farming, he also makes and sells hollow blocks to earn additional income. To make more stocks of hollow blocks, he would like to avail a loan of PHP5,000.00 in order to buy cement, gravel and sand needed.

Being patient and industrious, he believes that someday he will become financially stable and give his family a better future.

loans.use: to buy the cement, gravel and sand needed to make hollow blocks to sell.

location.town: Brgy. Malasin, Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Anabelle

texts.en:
Anabelle is very thankful for the financial assistance extended to her as she was able to purchase greater quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 24,000 PHP loan in order to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Anabelle hopes to improve in her business and she desires that her family will always be happy and sufficient in everything. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, and she draws strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Kurbonbi

texts.ru:
Курбонби позитивная и трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 35 лет. Она замужем и имеет четверых детей. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. С детства Курбонби мечтала стать учительницей, но так сложились обстоятельства, что она не смогла получить высшего образования из-за финансовой недостаточности в семье. Сразу после окончания средней школы Курбонби выдали замуж. И так она стала домохозяйкой. Но, даже находясь постоянно  дома,  она никогда не сидит без дела. Она вместе с мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым.

Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Курбонби вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Курбонби выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса она получает хороший доход. Муж Курбонби также работает в местной мастерской и  его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Курбонби с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Курбонби заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en: Kurbonbi is a positive and hardworking woman of 35.  She is married and has four children, and lives in a small rural village.  From childhood Kurbonbi has dreamed of becoming a teacher, but due to her family's poor financial circumstances, was unable to receive a higher education.  Immediately after finishing her secondary education, Kurbonbi married and became a housewife.  Despite the fact that she is always home, she is always doing something.  She and her husband strive to do everything possible to provide their children with every necessity.  In order to have constant income to provide for their family, Kurbonbi and her husband started their own business working in animal husbandry.  Kurbonbi raises cattle and sells their milk and meat.  This work provides her with a good income.  Kurbonbi's husband also works in the local repair shop, and his work provides additional income for the family.  Their combined income is sufficient to provide an average standard of living, and as of yet they have enough funds to cover all of their needs.  Kurbonbi and her husband now hope to purchase a few more head of cattle for fattening, and this reason she turned to Arvand for a loan to purchase cattle.  Kurbonbi thanks Arvand in advance for its support, the result of which will help increase her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Shumila

texts.en:
Shumaila is a 31-year-old housewife who has two children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. He transports people within Rawalpindi. He is hardworking and responsible. Currently he drives a rented rickshaw. But the income he generates is mostly consumed by paying his rickshaw rent which leaves him with a little amount for his daily family expenses. His children are school going and he finds it difficult to meet his daily expenses. 

He plans to buy a rickshaw of his own and save the money which he has to give out as rent. Therefore, Shumaila as a supportive housewife has requested for a loan to help her husband buy a rickshaw. They are thankful to the Kiva lenders for their help.

loans.use: to help her husband buy a new rickshaw.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is 32, married and a mother of four children. She is a caring and loving mother. Her husband drives a rickshaw. He has worked as a rickshaw driver for the last eight years. He is a humble and straight forward person. He is a loving father. His children go to school. 

As his children are growing up their needs are also increasing. Therefore he wants to buy a new rickshaw to rent it out and make additional income. Razia has requested for a loan to help her husband buy a new rickshaw. They plan to save this additional income for future purposes.

loans.use: to help her husband buy a new rickshaw.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bricks, cement, sand, zinc and perlins.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a 52-year-old micro-entrepreneur from Batasan, Quezon City, Philippines. She has been selling mainly fresh and frozen meat, fresh and dried fish and vegetables at a retail business for seven years, and she makes a good income from this venture. Having a big family requires a lot of effort to provide for everyone’s needs, especially for her three children. She is married and the couple is determined to work hard to provide their children with a better education than they currently have.

What she basically does is buy processed meat products from wholesalers and then she sells them per piece or pack for a profit. Products can range from fresh meat, hotdogs, processed pork, fresh vegetables and other products of the like. Customers are attracted to buy due to the low prices and the many options she offers. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 700 PHP in sales every day.

Maria is taking out a 10,000 PHP loan to buy additional vegetables, fish, fresh pork, dried food and frozen products and orders for her customers. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more frozen and fresh foods which are necessary to increase her inventory.

In the future, she hopes to expand her business, and to send all of her children to school to give them the best education she can afford. She also dreams of having their own house and lot. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and it is there where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for vegetables, fish, fresh and frozen products to sell

loans.name: Manar

texts.en:
Manar is a 22-year-old single young lady from Qalqilia. She lives with her family in a small, simple house. Her father is a farmer who plants seasonal crops on the family's land; he earns a good income but the business is not stable.

Manar is a student at the university in her last semester. She is studying Elementary Education so that she can become a teacher in the future. She would like to earn the BA degree and find a job as soon as possible to help her family with part of their expenses.

Manar took out a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to pay university installments for this semester. By taking this loan, Manar will be able to complete her studies and find a job sooner. Manar appears in the photo.

loans.use: to pay university installments for this semester.

loans.name: Jenily

texts.en:
Jenily is a hardworking entrepreneur who has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 22,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional raw materials for her business. Jenily has been in this business for 5 years. Jenily earns more income from raising pigs. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Jenily has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw materials for her business

loans.name: Epifania

texts.en:
Epifania is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Epifania is 57 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Epifania has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She requested an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more materials for her weaving business.

Epifania has been in this business for 20 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 48 years old and widowed with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, canned goods, groceries, etc. Marivic has borrowed and paid off 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from rice retailing.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, canned goods, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Muneera

texts.en:
Muneera is 35, married, and living in Rawalpindi. She has four sons and three daughters. Her husband has a crockery business where he sells different types of utensils like dinner sets, spoon sets, glasses, plates, bowls etc. He has been running this business for five years. Her husband is a polite and responsible person; he has many loyal customers. Since they have a big family it is getting difficult for her husband to fulfill their requirements and meet their daily expenses.

To overcome this situation, her husband has decided to buy more stock to increase sales and get more earnings. But due to lack of money, Muneera has requested a loan through Brac Pakistan to help her husband get the necessary financing. Her husband wants to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to help her husband buy more crockery items for resale to increase his earnings

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas De Boqueron Group

texts.es:
Las 15 integrantes de este grupo son mujeres jefas de familia que están luchando por sus familias, para poder darles todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener. Cada una esta dando lo mejor de si para crecer.
Mirta es una de ellas y también la presidenta, una mujer muy luchadora y trabajadora. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías de crochet, es por medio de este trabajo que lucha por poder salir adelante. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de agujas, hilos, y demás insumos para poder seguir con su crochet.
texts.en:
The 15 members of this group are women who are heads of family struggling to get ahead so they can provide for their loved ones everything they were unable to have.  Each member is doing her best to grow.

Mirta is one of the members and also the president of the group.  She is a very determined, hard-working woman.  She works making crochet handicrafts and earns a living this way.  The loan she is requesting is to buy needles, thread and other crochet supplies to continue her work.

loans.use: To buy needles, thread and other crochet supplies.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
La Sra. Catalina es divorciada y tiene dos hijos, uno de ellos ya mayor he independiente, y el otro aún está con ella.
Ella tiene un local de venta de ropas y calzados varios en un mercado, donde gracias a su trabajo tiene una casa cómoda y con todas las comodidades necesarias del hogar. Ella se destaca por ser una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que quiere seguir esforzándose por crecer. 
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de estantes y vitrinas para colocar varios otros productos que ha comprado para aumentar su stock de productos para la venta.
texts.en:
Catalina is divorced and has two children, one who is an independent adult and the other a minor who still lives at home.  She has a shop in the market where she sells clothing and shoes.  Thanks to her work she has a comfortable house and all the necessary comforts of home.  She is known for being a very hard-working, determined person who wants to make an effort to grow.

She is requesting a loan to buy shelving and display cases to exhibit the other products she has bought to increase her sales line.

loans.use: To buy shelving and display cases for her business.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Due to financial hardship, Martha has been engaged in buying and reselling various fruits and vegetables to help her husband in gaining income. She is 36 years old and blessed with three children. She aims to improve her business and increase her income to sustain their necessities and finance the education of her children. Having inadequate capital, she would like to avail a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy more stock of tomatoes, ginger, beans, egg plants, cabbages and squash to resell. Being a diligent mother, she believes that she will improve the business with this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tomatoes, ginger, beans, egg plants, cabbages and squash to resell

location.town: Brgy. Ganao, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Guillerma

texts.en:
Guillerma works hard to support her family. She is married and has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 20 years now.

Guillerma requested an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more materials for her business.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her business

loans.name: José Félix

texts.es:
José tiene 53 años de edad, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a la venta de huevos de gallinas, tiene 5 hijos de los cuales solo dos están en casa y los demás han formado sus propios hogares.


Él se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de aves de corral (gallinas ponedoras) realiza esta labor desde hace 12 años,  decidió realizar esta actividad ya que el trabajo agrícola no le era suficiente para sostener a su familia, además anteriormente trabaja en construcción. En su actual negocio se involucra su esposa quien le ayuda a vender los huevos que saca a diario. 


José necesita el crédito para comprar materiales para construir una galera y continuar criando aves (gallinas), comprará cemento, alambre de maya y lámina, el préstamo le ayudará a mejorar su negocio porque tendrá más espacio adecuado para que las aves se desarrollen bien.

Él sueña con que su negocio siga creciendo y ayudar a su familia en lo que sea necesario para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Jose, 53 has a live-in partner. His spouse works as a housewife and selling chicken eggs. They have 5 children, of whom only two live with them, the rest have formed their own homes.
Jose works as a farmer and breeding poultry (laying hens). He has been doing this for 12 years. He chose to do this activity because farming was not enough to support his family. Before, he also worked doing construction work. Nowadays, Jose's wife contributes to the business, selling the eggs they obtain every day.
Jose needs the loan to purchase materials to build a hen house to continue breeding poultry (hens). He will buy cement, mesh wire and metal laminated sheets. The loan will help him to improve his business because he will have more adequate space for the birds to grow up well.
His dream is for his business to keep growing and to help his family in whatever is necessary for them to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase materials to build a hen house and continue to breed poultry (hens). He will buy cement, mesh wire and laminated sheets.

loans.name: Teodula

texts.es:
Teodula de 60 años de edad, estudió hasta 1ª grado, debido a lo económico de sus padres decidieron que no estudiara, es viuda ya que su esposo falleció hace 10 años, ella vive con un hijo, su nuera y 2 nietos  

Teodula se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde que tenia 15 años, pues su papá le decía que era necesario que aprendiera a cultivar maíz, ella lleva el alimento a sus hijos hasta el lugar donde cultiva y luego regresa a cuidar el ganado.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar 15 sacos de abonos para 3 hectáreas de maíz 


Su sueño es repellar su casa pues es de adobe y pagar crédito y tener las puertas abiertas.
texts.en:
Teodula is 60-years old.  She went to school until 1st grade, then due to her parents' finances, they decided she shouldn't keep attending.  Teodula is a widow; her husband passed away ten years ago.  She lives with one son, her daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. 

Teodula has made her living in agriculture since she was 15-years old.  Her father told her that it was necessary for her to learn to grow corn.  She brings her children their food in the fields where they are planting and returns home to take care of the livestock. 

Teodula needs to the loan to purchase fifteen sacks of compost for three hectares of corn. 

Her dreams are to plaster her house, as it is made of adobe, to pay back her loan and leave her options open.

loans.use: to purchase 15 sacks of compost for 3 hectares of corn.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
El Sr. Victor tiene 53 años, está casado con la Sra. Mercedes de 44 años, él se dedica a la producción y ventas de chipitas y palitos salados para una marca renombrada hace 7 años, cada día más tiene pedidos de producción de parte de la empresa.

El Señor solicita el préstamo para la compra de almidón, el cual es su materia prima principal de su productos, obteniendo dicha materia prima cumplirá con la demanda de su comprador principal, agradece por la oportunidad que recibe y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Victor, 53, is married to Mercedes, 44.  He makes and sells bake rolls and pretzels for a well-known brand and has been in business for seven years.  Every day he receives more production orders from the company.

He is requesting a loan to buy corn starch which is one of his main ingredients for the products.  If he buys the ingredient he will be able to meet the demands of his main buyer.  He is grateful for this opportunity which will be very helpful to him.

loans.use: To buy corn starch.

loans.name: San Luis Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Luis está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo nuevo de la ciudad de Concepcion, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aún se encuentra en crecimiento. 
La Sra. Blanca es una de las integrantes, ella es de una zona alejada del centro mismo de la ciudad donde sale a vender a sus productos de limpieza, aparte de ello también estudia en la facultad y realiza ventas de productos varios de primera necesidad. Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de materiales para su venta, como ser artículos de limpieza y productos de primera necesidad. Y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo con su negocio y dar así a su familia lo que necesitan para tener una vida sin privaciones.
texts.en:
The Communal group called San Luis is on its first cycle in the "committee of women" program. It is a new group in the city of Concepcion, which is in an area a bit far from the central zone and which is still growing.
Blanca is one of the members of the group. She lives in an area far from the center of the city where she goes to sell her cleaning supplies. She also goes to college and sells basic products. She is asking for a loan to buy articles to send, such as cleaning supplies and basic products. In this way she will continue to grow her business and be able to provide for her family so they can lead a life without deprivation.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning supplies and basic products to sell.

loans.name: Eleanor

texts.en:
Eleanor is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of two children from Dulag, Leyte. Eleanor has been engaged in the hog-raising business for more than 4 years now. This is her source of income.

Eleanor is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets to raise, as well as feeds and supplements for the pigs. With these purchases, she will be able to improve her hog-raising business. In the future, Eleanor has hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise, as well as feeds and supplements for the pigs

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge vive con su mamá y hermanos en la zona de San Lorenzo, el aun no trabaja solamente se dedica a estudiar, está cursando el primer año de la carrera de Agronomía.
Jorge tiene como proyecto criar pollos para poder ayudar a su madre ya que la misma es jubilada   de la docencia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su universidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Jorge lives with her mum and siblings in the area of San Lorenzo. He doesn't work yet, but studies full time. He is on his first year of college, studying agronomy.
Jorge's project is to raise chicken so he can help his mother, who is a retired teacher. He is asking for a loan to invest in the payment on the university fees so he can continue studying.

loans.use: to pay the university fees.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
Renacer se llama este grupo de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso, está en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para conocer la situación de cada una.
Una de ellas es la Sra. María quien tiene un local de ventas de ropas y bijouteries, es una mujer muy trabajadora que está luchando para poder crecer y salir adelante. Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de ropas varias , lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This group, from the city of Mariano Roque Alonso, is called "Renacer" (Revival). It is in its third loan cycle in the committee program, where all the members are doing the survey on the elimination of poverty in order to understand the situation of each one.

One of the members is Señora Maria, who has a shop where she sells clothing and costume jewelry. She is a very hard-working woman who is striving to be able to grow and advance. She is applying for this loan to purchase various items of clothing, which will help her to concretize her business plan, which will help her to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy various items of clothing to sell

loans.name: Ammie

texts.en:
Ammie is a 51-year-old widow. She has three children and she works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines. Ammie has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. She requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

In the future, Ammie would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph, a father of three, lives in the remote village of Makwa in Thika, an area known to have a high demand for poultry products. Joseph practices mixed farming, growing bananas, tea and a variety of food crops. Of all the activities in which he is involved, poultry farming is closest to his heart. Waking up every morning to collect eggs makes him very proud. Feeding his poultry is his hobby.

Joseph has always wanted to increase his poultry farming operation because the demand is overwhelming, but the biggest challenge has been lack of capital. Joseph has traits of a mobilizer, and he decided to mobilize other small scale farmers who share this common problem. Together, they joined Juhudi Kilimo, a micro finance organization that uses a co-guarantee mechanism to provide agricultural-based loans. Joseph is seeking a loan to buy additional poultry. With the loan, he will be able to buy more poultry and satisfy the overwhelming demand.

Through the loan he will significantly increase his sales and this will translate to more profits. Demand for chicken is high in Thika; it is a popular meal for many people, and fast food joints are always full. Increased profits will allow Joseph to improve his living conditions and get out of the poverty-stricken situation he is currently in. Other than profits, he will also benefit from poultry manure, which has higher nitrogen than other livestock manure.

Through the loan, Joseph sees a brighter future. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy additional poultry

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a 46-year-old farmer from Kyenzigye, Uganda. He is married to Betty and they have 4 children.  He grows sugarcane which he uses to produce local gin. He has been doing this since 2000. He also grows vegetables to get additional income.
John has applied for a loan of 3,000,000 UGX to hire laborers to clear land to plant tomatoes and cabbages so that he can generate more income selling products in the market.
His plans for the future are to educate all of his children and to acquire more land. He is grateful to UGAFODE for the financial services rendered to the rural poor.

loans.use: hire laborers to plow land and plant tomatoes.

loans.name: Hernan

texts.es:
Hernan es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, comenta que su meta es ser un profesional capaz y responsable, útil a las personas de la sociedad.
El vive en con sus padres y comenta que el día de mañana le gustaría poder ayudarles por medio de sus estudios.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad, lo que le permitirá seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Hernan is from the city of Carapegua. His goal is to be a capable and responsible professional, useful to people in society. He lives with his parents and says that in the future he would like to help them through his studies.
He is asking for this loan to pay the university fees so he can continue studying.

loans.use: to pay the university fees.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Sra. Maria tiene 45 años, está casada con el Sr. Isabelino de 48 años y tienen 3 hijos, el señor trabaja como mecánico industrial para varias empresas.
La Señora Maria tiene un taller de costura donde confecciona prendas de vestir para varias para diferentes empresas y algunos negocios extras.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas e insumos para la confección de prendas de temporada, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria is 45 years old. She is married to Sr. Isabelino, age 48, and they have three children. Her husband works as an industrial mechanic for several businesses.

Sra. Maria has a sewing workshop where she produces articles of clothing and does alterations for different companies as a means of obtaining extra business. She is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of fabrics and supplies for making seasonal clothing. This will enable her to continue her work as before.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and sewing supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her clothing business.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos es una padre de familia dedicado, tiene 42 años de edad, es casado y vive en Chincha junto a su familia. Es una persona con muchos deseos de superación, siempre ha luchado para sacar adelante a su familia. Desde hace más de 2 años trabaja en una prestigiosa empresa y le va muy bien porque siempre trabaja con mucha dedicación, para obtener excelentes resultados.
Juan Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar materiales para la educación de sus hijos como útiles escolares, uniformes, cuadernos, entre otros. De esta manera se sentirá más tranquilo sabiendo que sus hijos tendrán todo lo necesario para seguir estudiando. De esta manera más adelante podrá cumplir su gran sueño: "Ver a sus hijos convertidos en grandes profesionales".
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is the dedicated father of a family. He is 42 years old, is married, and lives in Chincha with his family. He is a person with great desires to achieve. He has always worked hard to raise his family. He has been working for a prestigious business for more than two years, and it is going very well for him because he always works with great dedication in order to obtain excellent results.

Juan Carlos is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support that they have offered him, he will be able to buy materials for the education of his children, such as school supplies, uniforms, and notebooks, among other items. In this way he will feel very untroubled knowing that his children will have everything necessary to continue going to school. In this way he will be able in the future to accomplish his great dream: to see his children become great professionals.

loans.use: to buy school materials for his children

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
Jonalyn lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She earns income by operating her own rice farm to support the needs of her two children. She has been doing this for over fifteen years, and she earns good income through her farm. For a 45-year old mother, there’s nothing that would make her happier than to see her children succeed in their studies. 

Without hesitation, Jonalyn borrows a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy fertilizer and cover her farm's maintenance costs.
Her plan for the future is to improve their farm as well as the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and cover her farm's maintenance costs.

loans.name: Pierre Angelo

texts.es:
Pierre es un joven emprendedor, tiene 19 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Cañete junto a su familia. Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante, desde hace 2 años trabaja como Costurero y le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, trabajador, honesto y sobre todo porque siempre realiza excelentes trabajos. Su mayor motivación en la vida es su familia, es por ellos que siempre lucha para poder brindarles un futuro mejor.
Pierre está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprarse una laptop para de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida. Gracias a ellos seguirá luchando para más adelante poder empezar a estudiar la carrera de Derecho y pueda convertirse en un gran profesional.
texts.en:
Pierre, 19, is a young enterprising man. He is single and lives with his family in Canete. He is a person with a big desire to get ahead in life. He has been working as a tailor for 2 years and he is doing well because he is responsible, hard working, honest and, especially, because he does excellent work. His biggest motivation in life is his family. It is for them that he strives to be able to provide a better future for them.
Pierre is grateful to Kiva lenders because with their support he will be able to purchase a laptop, which will improve his quality of life. Thanks to their help he will continue to strive to get ahead and he will be able to start studying for a law degree, to become a great professional.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El Sr. Carlos es de la ciudad de Pilar, dueño de una despensa con carnicería, comenta que se dedica a esta actividad hace más de 5 años, está casado y por medio de su trabajo está luchando para dar a su familia lo que necesitan para una mejor calidad de vida.
 Es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que se está esforzando día a día por el bien de su familia. Pide este préstamo para la compra de frutas, verduras, bebidas, carnes y demás, de manera a poder seguir trabajando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Señor Carlos is from the city of Pilar. He is the owner of a grocery store with a butcher shop. He comments that he has worked in this business for more than 5 years. He is married, and through his work he is striving to be able to give his family what they need in order to have a better quality of life.

He is a very hard-working and entrepreneurial person who is striving every day for the good of his family. He is requesting this loan for the purchase of fruits, vegetables, beverages, meats, and other items, so that in this way he can continue working as he has been doing.

loans.use: to buy fruits, vegetables, beverages, meats, and other items to stock his store.

loans.name: Pachacutec Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “PACHACUTEC”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosa ella es conviviente y tiene 66 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de truchas, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.
Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de comida, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de internet.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the Communal Bank “Pachacutec” which is located in the District of Cusco in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco.

One of the members is Sra. Rosa. She is 66 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has one child. She works at her grocery business, but she also has another business in which she sells trout. Rosa sells basic necessity products such as rice, sugar, milk, and oil. She works from 8:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M. Rosa has been in business for five years and is doing very well. Her dream is to expand her grocery business. She is requesting a loan in order to buy milk, sugar, oil, and rice.

The members who appear in the attached photos had their pictures taken after the group meeting because they requested permission to be absent for work reasons. The other members engage in businesses such as selling food, selling clothes, operating a grocery store, and managing an Internet business.

Rosa appreciates those who have helped to fulfill her dream in this manner, so she promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, oil, and rice.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El comité lleva por nombre Kuña Guapa, lo que en español quiere decir “mujer trabajadora“ inician el ciclo 12. Es un grupo de mujeres que desde hace más de 3 años vienen trabajando con la Fundación, y por medio de su esfuerzo y lucha están mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
Adriana forma parte de este grupo, es una persona que se esta esforzando por salir adelante, y poder ayudar a su familia a través de su trabajo. Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas a cuotas, y comenta que gracias a la forma en que trabaja tiene ya muy buena clientela que siempre compra de ella. Adriana quiere capacitarse para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Pide este préstamo para poder comprar mas variedades de prendas lo que le permitirá dar una mejor variedad de productos a sus clientes. 
Todas están agradecidas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de capacitarse y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The committee named Kuña Guapa, which means "a hard working-woman," is beginning its 12th loan cycle.  This is a group of women who have been working with the Fundación Paraguaya for more than three years.  Through their effort and struggle they are improving their life conditions.

Adriana, a member of this group, is a person making great efforts to get ahead and to help her family through her work.  She earns a living selling clothing on a payment plan, and notes that thanks to this she has good customers who always buy from her.  Adriana wants to become able to help her family and loved ones.  She is asking for this loan to buy a greater variety of clothing, so that she can offer more products to her customers.

All the women are grateful for the opportunity they are getting to become more competent and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy various clothing items to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to maintain cocoa fields.

loans.name: Mirasol

texts.en:
Mirasol works hard to support her family. Mirasol is married and has a dried fish-making business in the Philippines. She requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of fish to make dried fish. Mirasol has been in this business for 13 years now.
In the future, Mirasol would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of fish to make dried fish.

loans.name: Khusan

texts.ru:
Хусан жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 39 лет. Он женат и имеет четверых детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку.  Сам Хусан живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он имеет среднее образование, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Жена Хусана также не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Хусан занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Также Хусан подрабатывает дехканином, работает на поле. От данного бизнеса он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Хусану в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота.  Сейчас Хусан хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Хусан очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Khusan is a happy and hardworking 39-year-old man.  He is married and the father of four children.  He contacted MDO Arvand when he heard of the possibility of receiving financial support.  Khusan lives with his family in a rural area.  He has a secondary education.  However, he couldn't attend university because of his family's difficult financial situation.  Khusan's wife did not receive any education either.  She is a homemaker, taking care of the house and raising the children.

In order to provide for his family, Khusan runs his own animal husbandry business, feeding and selling cattle.  Khusan also works on a dekhan farm doing farm work, an activity from which he derives a good income.  Khusan's wife helps him with the family business by selling the milk they get from their cows.  Khusan now wants to increase his cattle headcount in order to expand his business.  For this reason he has turned to MDO Arvand and applied for a loan which will allow him to buy some cattle.  Khusan is really hoping for a positive outcome, and thanks MDO Arvand in advance for all their support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Farruhjon

texts.ru: Фаррухчон родился в 1995 году. Он окончил среднюю школу в прошлом году, и поступил в технический лицей. В этом году он окончил лицей и поступил в Таджикский Государственный Университет Коммерции. Он теперь студент 1 курса. Фаррухчон учится на договорной основе. Он должен оплатить за свой учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Его родители простые рабочие и не в состоянии помочь ему. Он будет погашать займ на счет своего заработка. Он научился в лицее отремонтировать машин и в свободное от занятий время он будет работать. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1100 долларов США для оплаты учебы. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Farruhjon was born in 1995. He graduated from high school last year, and enrolled in technical college. This year, he graduated from that college and he is now enrolled as a first-year student at the Tajik State University of Commerce.  Farruhjon is enrolled on a contractual basis. He must pay his tuition fees but he has no money to do so.  His parents are ordinary workers and they are not in a position to help him.  Farruhjon will repay his loan using his own earnings. During his year in technical college, he learned car repair and will be working during his spare time.  He is requesting a loan of 1,100 USD to pay his tuition fees.  He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition.

loans.name: Alfonzo Miguel

texts.es:
Alfonzo en una persona muy trabajadora, tiene 27 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Chincha junto a su familia. Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante, desde hace más de 2 años se dedica al negocio de lavandería y le va bien porque siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace y ya es muy conocido por todos sus clientes y una persona muy confiable.
ALfonzo está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá mejorar su vivienda como pintarrajear las paredes de su domicilio, de esta manera estará elevando el nivel de vida de su familia y seguirá luchando día a día por el bienestar de sus padres. Más adelante tiene planeado empezar a estudiar la carrera de Mecánica.
texts.en:
Alfonzo is a hard-working person, he is 27 years old, single, and lives in Chincha with his family. He is a person with a strong desire to get ahead. For more than 2 years he has earned a living through a laundromat business. It is going well for him because he always works hard in everything he does. He is well-known by all of his customers, and a trustworthy person.

Alfonzo is very grateful for the Kiva lenders because with the support they have given him he will be able to improve his house by plastering the walls of his home. In this way he will be raising his family's level of life, and he will keep fighting day after day for the welfare of his parents. In the future, he plans to start studying to be a mechanic.

loans.use: to plaster the walls of his home.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 59 years old and married with six children. She earns a living by having a pig-fattening business in the Philippines. Julieta is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Julieta has been in pig fattening for 6 years and also earns additional income from food vending. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy works hard to support her family. Nancy is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like grained rice, young coconut, sugar, milk, etc.

Nancy has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, Nancy would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like grained rice, young coconut, sugar, milk, etc.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en: Josefina lives in Suai and most of her daily income is from selling fish and sea weeds. Her husband is a fisherman. She is now requesting for a loan of  $800.00. With the loan she will buy a fishing net and other materials for her husband to do his activities as a fisherman. After her husband gets fish, she will bring it to the  market to sell. Josefina started to do her business in 1995 with her own working capital of $88.00. She is happy with the loan that is offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her because with the loan she will improve her business in the future. She also has animals like cows, pigs and chicken.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and other materials.

loans.name: Mazhar

texts.en:
Mazhar is the age of 38, living in Dinga, Gujrat, with his family including two children. 
He has been running a beauty saloon for the last ten years. He has grown old along with his instruments. His worn out instruments need to be replaced with new ones. He wants to buy new instruments but his financial condition does not allow him to buy new instruments. 
Due to his low purchasing power, he requested a loan so that he can become empowered and he can easily buy new instruments such as swissors, combs, shaving machine, front mirror and revolving chair etc.
Mazhar hopes that this loan will work positively and he would be able to make savings for household expenses. Mazhar thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy new instruments such as swissors, combs, shaving machine, front mirror and revolving chair etc. for beauty salon.

loans.name: Mujeres De Esperanza  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Mujeres de Esperanza, está formado por 6 socias y 1 socio, laboran en diferentes actividades económicas las mismas que les permiten solventar los gastos de sus hogares y sacar adelante a sus familias. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es la tercera de mayor importancia económica del país, desde 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, esta bañada por 4 ríos, su gastronomía es muy variada y cautiva el paladar de propios y visitantes.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Rosa, tiene 38 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 5 hijos de 20, 15, 13, 8 y 2 años, su primer hijo trabaja y  estudia en el colegio, dos hijos están en el colegio y dos en la escuela, su esposo labora como jornalero, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
Doña Rosa se dedica a la venta de cosmético y a la preparación y venta de helados que los vende recorriendo la ciudad, estas actividades le dan la oportunidad de estar con su familia y a su vez aportar económicamente. El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en comprar de frutas, azúcar y leche para la elaboración de sus helados  y en cosméticos. Su meta es comprarse un terreno para hacer su casa.
texts.en:
The Mujeres de Esperanza [Women of Hope] communal bank is made up of 6 female members and 1 male member. They work at different economic activities that allow them to pay their household expenses and get ahead with their families. The members live in different parts of the city of Cuenca. This city is the third most economically important in the country. It has been a World Heritage Site since 1999. It is bathed by 4 rivers and has a varied cuisine that captures the palate of its people and visitors. One of the members of the group is Rosa. She is 38 years old and lives in a common-law marriage and has five children, aged 20, 15, 8, and 2 years old. Her oldest child works and attends high school, 2 children attend high school and two go to primary school. Rosa's husband works as a daily laborer. They don't own a house, so they rent a property.
Rosa sells cosmetics and also prepares and sells ice-creams. She sells them as a street vendor. These activities allow Rosa to be with her family and also contribute financially. She will invest the money in the purchase of cosmetics and also fruits, sugar and milk to make ice-creams. Her goal is to buy a piece of land to build her house.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics, fruits, sugar and milk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies and a new food cart.

loans.name: Lureve

texts.en: Lureve is from the village of Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur, Philippines.  41-year-old Lureve is married and has two children. She has been planting and harvesting rice for sale. She also raises pigs to sell and earns additional income from it. Recently, Lureve joined GDMPC and she gained access to financial services. With the income she generated from her farm, she was able to support her family. Recently, she took a new loan to buy fertilizer. She wants to have a better living in the near future with her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 30 years old with three children aged 10, seven, and four. His main business is the sale of spare parts for motorcycles and bicycles. He has approached UGAFODE for a loan of 1,000,000 UGX to buy spare parts to restock his shop. He hopes his customer base will increase and so will his profits. His plan for the future is expand his business. His main challenge however is the low stock turnover and competition from other businessmen who deal in the same business. He is confident he will beat this if he diversifies his stock with the loan funds.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for motorcycles and bicycles.

loans.name: Elina

texts.es:
La Sra. Elina tiene una despensa, esta casada hace 10 años y tiene un hijo pequeña que va a la escuela. Comenta que por medio de su trabajo quiere dar a su hijo una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Elina quiere que su hijo el día de mañana sea una persona instruida y profesional en un futuro no muy lejano.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en bebidas en general, embutidos y otros, etc.) así ofrecer gran variedad de productos a sus clientes. Está agradecida por la oportunidad que está recibiendo y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Sra. Elina manages a food pantry. She has been married for 10 years and has a young child who is attending school. Elina says that through her work, she is able to provide her child a decent life without having to be deprived. In the future, Elina wants her son to become an educated and professional individual some day.

She is requesting this loan in order to invest in beverages, cured meats, and other items so that she can offer a wide variety of products to her customers. Elina is grateful for the opportunity she has received since it will be of great help.

loans.use: to buy beverages, cured meats, and other products.

loans.name: Grupo Los Trabajadores De Cienagrande Santa Lucia Utatlan Group

texts.es:
De 19 años de edad ya con grandes aspiraciones en dar a conocer a su comunidad y a todos los que la visitan la actividad que el realiza con tanto esfuerzo y dedicación, soltero y vive con su padres con el deseo de superar en la vida e alcanzar grandes sueños que el quiere realizar en la vida, para poder cambiar las condiciones de vidas de su familia. (Herber  es la que se encuentra de 1ra de izquierda a derecha de la fotografía)
	
El trabajo que el realiza con tanto esmero es la compra venta y de cortes típicas dicha actividad lo realiza en su casa y en lugares cercanos de su comunidad donde el vive, la segunda actividad que el realiza es el cultivo de habas y venderlas negocio que realiza con un hermano por más de cinco años porque les genera una ganancia para el bienestar de su familia y mejorar las condiciones económicas de su familia y comunidad.

El ha sido un ejemplo en su comunidad y es por ello que un grupo de mujeres se han unido a Herber para poder emprender sus negocios para que cada uno de ellos pueda supera y tener ingresos importantes.

El uso que el le dará al préstamo que el está realizando es para la compra de ropa típica par luego venderlas en los alrededores de la comunidad donde el vive. Uno de las aspiraciones de el es tener un local en el mercado de su comunidad y ver que su comunidad mejoren las condiciones de vida de sus familias.
texts.en:
Herber is 19 years old and aspires to show off his community to those who come visit. he puts a lot of effort and dedication into this activity. He is single, lives with his parents, he wants to get ahead in life and realize his dreams so that he can change the life conditions of his family (Herber is the first one from left to right).
 
The activity he works on with a lot of effort is to buy and sell ethnic clothing, he works from home and in places close to the community where he lives. The second activity that he works on is to grow beans and sell them, business that he has worked on with his brother for more than five years, as it generates a profit to benefit their families and improve the economic conditions of their families and the community.

Herber has set an example in his community and for this reason a group of women have joined him to start their businesses and each of them get ahead and obtain important income.

The loan will be used to buy ethnic clothing to then sell them around the community where he lives.  One of his dreams to have a stand at the community market and see that in his community the life conditions get better.

loans.use: To buy ethnic clothing for sale

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion Group

texts.es:
17 son las integrantes de este grupo, son mujeres que se esfuerzan por sus familias y sus seres queridos. Ellas están en su ciclo 26 del programa de comités, además están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una persona que se destaca es la Sra. Celina, quien vende prendas de segunda mano, y que gracias a su esfuerzo se ha hecho de clientela. Comenta que le está yendo muy bien, ya que las prendas usadas son muy aceptadas y más económicas, por eso la gente lo prefiere. Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas de segunda mano para la venta, ya que de esa forma tendrá una buena variedad que poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
17 members form this group, they are women that work hard for their families and their loved ones.  They are in their 26th cycle and in addition they are part of the poverty elimination survey.
One of them is Celina, who sells second hand clothing and that with her effort she has made good customers.
